column1: Marvel Black Panther Handbag,"Long live the king

ComicBook.com just ran a very timely piece on the Richest Superheroes and Villains in Marvel and DC Comics. And guess who scored that top slot? By a LOT, too. Turns out Vibranium's a Very Good Thing to have.  And if you're paying in Vibranium, you'll have a lot of space in this purse left over for other things like tickets to the Black Panther movie and the new Nnedi Okorafor comic, because, at $10K a gram, you won't need much of it. (Although we imagine making change could be a problem. *pays for a pack of gum with Vibranium*) The outside of this bag has metallic applique fashioned after the spike collar we see on T'Challa, and has debossed details. It's an elegant choice for a fan of the richest superhero we know.  Product SpecificationsMarvel Black Panther HandbagOfficially-licensed Black Panther merchandise From our friends at LoungeflyMetallic applique and debossed detailsAdjustable shoulder strap plus double handlesCustom Black Panther liningMaterials: Faux leatherCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent Imported Dimensions: 14 1/2"" wide x 10 1/2"" tall x 4"" deepWARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."
Hello Kitty Mini Backpack,"Why Hello, Kitty!

column3: When you read Hello Kitty's profile, you'll find that she lives in a world that uses an odd system of measurement. Her height is described as being ""five apples,"" which either means that this anthropomorphic animal culture really likes using non-standard measuring systems, or that maybe they've come to standardize it all and now they use the word ""apple"" like we Americans use the word ""foot."" But you know, measuring in tasty apples sounds a lot better than measuring in stinky feet, anyway!This Hello Kitty Mini Backpack is also about the height of five apples! Assuming you have apples that are just a touch over 2 inches tall, that is. Made of vegan faux leather (simply a must in this world of sentient animal friends), the backpack features Miss Kitty White's iconic face, blue overalls, and trademark red bow. On the back, you'll find padded white straps with red adjustable ribbons. There's a zip around closure on the top, and a zippered front pocket right below where her mouth would be, if this cat had a mouth. But she simply doesn't need one - her fresh look and wide eyes say it all!Product SpecificationsHello Kitty Mini BackpackOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandiseFaux leather backpack featuring Hello KittyMade by our friends at LoungeflyAdjustable padded strapsZippered top closure2 open side pocketsFront zippered pocketFully-lined interiorTop handleMaterials: Vegan faux (PU) leatherDimensions: 5 apples high by 4 1/2 apples wide by 2 1/2 apples deep (10 1/2"" high by 9"" wide x 4 1/2"" deep)WARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck.  ""Will my laptop fit in this bag, ThinkGeek?"" Let's find out together!     Laptop fitting guide    Measure your laptop. Like TVs, laptops are listed by their measurement on the diagonal. Bags, on the other hand, are measured on the edges. Not all 17"" laptops are the same size, so you'll need to measure the length & width of your closed laptop.  ""But my laptop is at home, ThinkGeek!"" If you can't wait, Google has superpowers to tell you the dimensions of your laptop if you ask it nicely. Just input the make and model of your laptop and ye shall receive.  ""I've got the measurements! Now what?"" Compare your laptop's measurements to the measurements of the bag. If the laptop's measurements are smaller than the bag, it fits! If one or more of the laptop's measurements are bigger, you're out of luck with this bag. Try another."

column1: Marvel Valkyrie Mini Backpack,"Fit for a Scrapper

Spoiler alert. The breakout star of Thor: Ragnarok wasn't played by Jeff Goldblum or Cate Blanchett and it wasn't even a talking pile of rocks - though they were all strong contenders. No, the true surprise hit of the movie was the hard-drinking scrapper and Asgardian ex-pat called Valkyrie (or Brunnhilde if you're nasty). She's the last surviving member of an elite force of women warriors, and a (somewhat reluctant) recruit to Thor's makeshift ""Revengers"" team-up. And now? She's a mini backpack!   Or rather, she has a mini backpack designed in her honor. We know she's not literally the backpack - we're not drunk. She is. Anyway, this Loungefly creation is a ThinkGeek exclusive inspired by Valkyrie's tough yet sensible ensemble. Gold appliqué details like a sword badge and a buckle adorn the front of the bag, while the sides feature two pockets in the same vibrant blue as her cape. The interior is fully lined with custom ""Valkyrie"" printed fabric. Adjustable straps, top zip main compartment and a front zipper pocket mean that this bag has all the utility of a normal backpack, only smaller and way cooler. Plus it's made of cruelty-free simulated leather, because Valkyrie doesn't have time for needless cruelty!   Product Specifications Marvel Valkyrie Mini BackpackOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at LoungeflyTop zip closure with a front zip pocketInterior is fully lined with custom ""Valkyrie"" printed fabricTwo side pockets in sky blue (just like Valkyrie's cape)Metallic appliqué details: sword badge and buckle Top hook loop for hangingPerfect for aspiring RevengersMaterials: simulated leatherCare Instructions: Drink responsiblyImportedDimensions: approx. 11"" tall x 9 3/4"" wide by 5 1/4"" deepStraps adjust from 26"" to 33""WARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from small children and neck."
The Sprite Bag by Pixelle,"Geek style in the bag

Charger cable, phone, lip balm, mirror, hand sanitizer, Moo cards, flash drive, other flash drive, yet another flash drive we put in there a month ago and forgot about.... Geek girls have lots of little things inside our handbags, and now with the The Sprite Handbag by Pixelle we can have lots of little things on the outside of them, too. This satchel-style handbag features a fashionable, repeating pattern of sprites in neon colors: 8-bit swords, hearts, robots, flasks, and books - basically all our favorite things. Colorful and quirky, the bag comes in black faux leather with grey trim and plum details with chromed hardware or white faux leather with tan trim and hot pink details with gold-colored hardware. It's a kitschy, stylish bag that will level up your already epic style.Product Specifications  Satchel-style geeky ladies' handbagA ThinkGeek creation & exclusiveChoose black with grey trim and plum details with chromed hardware or white with tan trim and hot pink details with gold-colored hardwareFashionable repeating pattern features sprites: 8-bit swords, hearts, robots, flasks, and booksDouble-handle for easy carry plus a removable shoulder strapAdjustable strap has 22 1/2 - 27"" drop (use flat-head screwdriver to adjust it)Top closes with single zipperInterior features 1 zippered pouch (6"" wide x 5"" tall), plus two open pouches (6"" wide x 3 1/2"" high and 2 1/2"" wide x 3 1/2"" high)Polyurethane corners and bottom; bottom also has metal feet for extra lifeMaterials: 100% polyurethane, leather-texture exterior + 100% polyester satin liningCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent ImportedRemovable exterior tag with engraved ThinkGeek nameplate, interior embossed ThinkGeek polyurethane tagDimensions: 10 1/2"" wide x 8"" tall x 5"" deepWeight: 1 lb. 6 oz."
Star Wars Princess Leia Rebel Tattoo Tote Bag,"Now and Forever a Rebel

The way Princess Leia covered up in the first couple films, it was entirely possible that she was sporting some ink that we just couldn't see, but then Return of the Jedi came along and we saw that it just wasn't the case. But hey, maybe she had a certain piece of art in mind, and she was saving it for after the big victory. Now we're wondering if the older General Organa doesn't have a little something hidden up those sleeves, to remember all that she's gone through.  Join the rebellion! And celebrate this classic Rebel with a black tote purse featuring applique flash tattoo-style artwork of her face in profile with roses and and the banner ""Rebel."" There's lots of room inside to carry everything that a member of the Rebel Alliance needs, with a few pockets in there to keep it all organized. Need to fly casual, under the radar? The back is plain black with just a little Star Wars name plate, so flip it around to that side when you pass any Stormtrooper checkpoints.   Product SpecificationsStar Wars Princess Leia Rebel Tattoo Tote BagOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseBlack faux leather tote purse featuring the applique image of Princess LeiaMade by our friends at LoungeflyLarge open interior compartmentSmall open pocket on inside, small zipper pocket on opposite wall insideFully-lined interior with other flash tattoo designs based on LeiaMagnetic metal clasp closureTwo straps with 9"" dropMaterials: Vegan faux (PU) leatherExterior Dimensions: 17"" wide x 15 1/2"" tall x 5"" deepInterior Dimensions: 16 1/2"" wide x 13"" tall (if you want the snap to work) x 5"" deep  ""Will my laptop fit in this bag, ThinkGeek?"" Let's find out together!     Laptop fitting guide    Measure your laptop. Like TVs, laptops are listed by their measurement on the diagonal. Bags, on the other hand, are measured on the edges. Not all 17"" laptops are the same size, so you'll need to measure the length & width of your closed laptop.  ""But my laptop is at home, ThinkGeek!"" If you can't wait, Google has superpowers to tell you the dimensions of your laptop if you ask it nicely. Just input the make and model of your laptop and ye shall receive.  ""I've got the measurements! Now what?"" Compare your laptop's measurements to the measurements of the bag. If the laptop's measurements are smaller than the bag, it fits! If one or more of the laptop's measurements are bigger, you're out of luck with this bag. Try another."
Marvel Scarlet Witch Vegan Leather Convertible Purse,"Lady in Red

column3: Wanda Maximoff has a complicated history. Her dad is Magneto, but not really (long story). She married the Vision, and had kids, and then lost them, but now they're back (long story). She wiped out most of mutantkind with three little words, but now they're back (long story). Her life may be kind of a mess sometimes (some might say... chaotic?), but at least her look has always been on point. Especially that headdress... mmm, so pointy!This Scarlet Witch convertible purse also eschews the mess in favor of classic style and clever details. It's vegan, because you don't want animal cruelty messing with your magic mojo. It's red, because sometimes you can't help but stand out. It has double handles and a removeable shoulder strap, so you can make it work with any outfit (even purple tights). But what really sold us is the subtle way the bag mirrors Wanda's emblematic headdress, not only in the seams on the front but also with the little gold badge near the top. This purse looks so good, no one will expect it's based on an Avenger - and that is a powerful magic all its own!Product SpecificationsScarlet Witch Vegan Leather Convertible PurseOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflyHolds your necessities for a night of magicLooks great with purple tights!Top zip closureFully lined with black tone-on-tone Marvel logo designInterior zip pocket and open pocketMaterials: simulated leather (and a bit of chaos)Care Instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth or just hex bolt the stain away!Dimensions: 16"" wide (at top)/12"" wide (at base) x 10"" tall x 6"" deepRemovable shoulder strap adjusts from 12"" to 22"" dropDouble handles have 6 1/2"" drop WARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."

column1: Betsey Johnson Spruce Me Up Crossbody Purse,"A Coniferous Companion

column3: Oh my tannenbaum! Rock around the Christmas tree with this sweet little bag by Betsey Johnson. It's made of faux leather and pure holiday spirit, because wood would simply be too heavy. Overlapping layers of tinselly green and sparkly white give this tree a snow-kissed look. Metal stars, balls, and crystal studs are eye-catching decorations, and the tree-topper is a red sequin bow! A side zipper opens the main compartment, which is fully lined with rosebud-printed fabric. The chain link crossbody strap rounds out the details of this ultimate holiday statement accessory. It pairs well with all of your ugly holiday sweaters, but you can also pull it out whenever you want to feel a little more festive. Christmas in June, anyone?Product SpecificationsBetsey Johnson Spruce Me Up Crossbody PurseFeel festive all year round!Tinselly green and sparkly white layers define the foliageTiny ornaments made of studs, stars and crystalsTree-topper is a red sequin bowSide zipper opens the main compartment, lined with rosebud fabricPerfect for anyone who knows that rockin' around a Christmas tree is serious businessMaterials: faux leather, metal accents, and holiday spirit!Crossbody chain strap has 24"" dropDimensions: 11"" tall x 6"" wide x 6"" deep"

column1: Pokémon Pikachu Faux Leather Crossbody Purse,"Get a little more space in your inventory

column3: Pokémon are great because they go with you everywhere. And now, you can count on them to go wherever you do even if you don't have any Poké balls handy with these adorable little Pokémon character crossbody purses. As is always the case with Pokémon, the hard part is going to be choosing one. Urgh! Why do you gotta make us choose, Professor? They're all adorable and powerful in their own way. And no matter which we choose, your bratty grandson is just going to pick the one that beats it.Pick Pikachu! These two words: Electric. Mouse. You don't have to explain Pikachu; even your grandma knows who Pikachu is. We grew up watching him. Thundershock. And he's small enough that you can carry him around without a Poké ball. Just tuck him under an arm and go!"

column1: Game of Thrones Targaryen Bowler Bag,"Fire & Blood

We can do you blood and fire without the winter, and we can do you blood and winter without the fire, and we can do you all three concurrent or consecutive. But we can't give you fire and winter without the blood. Blood is compulsory. - something GRRM might say, shamelessly borrowed by your humble editor from Tom Stoppard's Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Dead   If you're a supporter of the House of Targaryen you want to have a solid traveling bag. Because in this generation, Targaryen is the Game of Thrones House voted most likely to be in motion at any given time. Whether she's crossing the deserts with the Dothraki, riding the wooden horses across the sea, or escaping on the back of a dragon, Daenerys is almost always on the move, especially when compared to our other characters in GoT. Whether you're a handmaid, a protector, or a commander, you should probably have a good bag by your side to transport whatever you need to the newest base camp. Something like this bag that comes with two handles and also a shoulder strap so you can switch it up on the fly. Just make sure Drogon knows that pattern on the bag isn't actual dragon. He might take offense to that.Product SpecificationsGame of Thrones Targaryen Bowler Bag Officially-licensed HBO's Game of Thrones merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at Crowded CoopDouble handles with removable, adjustable shoulder strapFront pocket decorated with Targaryen sigil, square metal studs, and a pattern reminiscent of Meereen embossed on the materialGrey faux leather has a pattern like dragon's skinRed GoT badge on backMaterials: Faux leather with satin polyester liningCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent Exterior Dimensions: 14” Tall x 10” Wide x 4” DeepFront Pocket: 7” Tall x 9” Wide x 1.25” DeepInterior Padded Tablet Pocket: 10” Tall x 9” WideInterior Pocket: 5” Tall x 7.75” WideStrap: 1.5” Wide – Adjustable Length: 28” to 52” LongImported Ages 14+"
Star Wars R2-D2 with C-3PO Charm Debossed Faux Leather Tote Bag,"Charming Droid BFFs

column3: Droids like R2-D2 have a few key items up their sleeves (well, technically, in their tool compartments), and they're really good at carrying electronic data, like hologram messages or secret plans to the Empire's shiny new weapon. But carrying actual *stuff*? You may have noticed that astromech droids don't exactly have arms. So when traveling with a droid companion, you're always going to be left holding the bag.But that's no problem when the bag you're carrying is this charming tote purse featuring a debossed image of R2-D2! Did we say ""charming?"" We meant that literally - there's a faux leather charm of R2's best buddy C-3PO hanging from one of the tote straps. There's plenty of room inside to hold everything you need for an adventure through the galaxy, and a few small pockets on the sides to help keep you organized. Finally, these droids are ready to carry their weight around here!Product SpecificationsStar Wars R2-D2 with C-3PO Charm Debossed Faux Leather Tote BagOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseBlue faux leather tote purse featuring the debossed image of R2-D2Made by our friends at LoungeflyLarge open interior compartmentSmall open pocket on inside, small zipper pocket on opposite wall insideInterior lined with black fabric with R2-D2 patternMagnetic metal clasp closureTwo straps with 9"" dropMaterials: Vegan faux (PU) leatherExterior Dimensions: 17"" wide x 15"" tall x 5"" deepInterior Dimensions: 17"" wide x 13"" tall x 5"" deep (if you want the snap to work)  ""Will my laptop fit in this bag, ThinkGeek?"" Let's find out together!     Laptop fitting guide    Measure your laptop. Like TVs, laptops are listed by their measurement on the diagonal. Bags, on the other hand, are measured on the edges. Not all 17"" laptops are the same size, so you'll need to measure the length & width of your closed laptop.  ""But my laptop is at home, ThinkGeek!"" If you can't wait, Google has superpowers to tell you the dimensions of your laptop if you ask it nicely. Just input the make and model of your laptop and ye shall receive.  ""I've got the measurements! Now what?"" Compare your laptop's measurements to the measurements of the bag. If the laptop's measurements are smaller than the bag, it fits! If one or more of the laptop's measurements are bigger, you're out of luck with this bag. Try another."

column1: Corgi Beach Party Tote Bag,"Totes adorbs

column3: Bikinis don't work for everybody. You guys let us know. So we took our pattern from the Corgi Beach Party Two-Piece Swimsuit and stuck it on a tote bag. Because tote bags work for almost everybody. And everybody could use more corgis in their life, right? Toss your sunscreen, towel, and book into this Corgi Beach Party Tote Bag and hit the beach. Or keep it in your vehicle for when you're out and you need a bag at the grocery store or one of those stores that doesn't believe in baskets and only provides carts. What is up with that? We do not need a 4-wheeled vehicle for our stationery and chili lime pistachios, Home Goods. But we do need a Corgi Beach Party Tote Bag. Pretty sure. Product Specifications Corgi Beach Party Tote BagA ThinkGeek creation & exclusiveGreat to take to the beach (or for shopping or whatever)Double handles have 10"" drop and a 3"" derp(j/k. you provide your own derp.)Materials: 100% cottonCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent Imported Dimensions: 13"" tall x 20"" wide (It's long and short, just like a corgi)Weight: 7 oz."

column1: Mathematics Canvas Crossbody Purse,"This Bag's Style is a Given

column3: You'll attract the attention of the other geeks in the room when you carry this ThinkGeek-exclusive Mathematics Canvas Crossbody Purse as your (a)cute, daily go-bag. It's the only rational choice. You'll be studying the sets of printed math concepts together, regaling each other with stories of your computational exploits. Together you can bond over measured angles, physics equations, sound waves, chemistry compounds, and, of course, pi. The black and white grid/graph paper background can even help you plot Cartesian coordinates if you're up against an asymptote a deadline.While the outside of the purse is made of canvas and covered in mathematical concepts, the inside is a plain, soft black fabric and includes one slip pocket and one zippered pocket. It's roomy enough to store your calculator, protractor, tuning forks, test tubes, and pads of graph paper inside. One of this bag's plusses is its long, adjustable strap. Purse closes with a turn lock closure. Bottom of purse has eight metal feet to protect fabric."

column1: Pokémon Pikachu Crossbody Bag,"Pikachu, I choose you!

column3: When you're analyzing your opponent's every move, reaching for your Pokeball, and planning your next strike...... the LAST thing you want is to realize, ""Oh no, I left my purse at the training gym!"" That's why we designed the Pokémon Pikachu Face Crossbody Bag. Like any loyal Pikachu, this bag will stay close to you, thanks to the crossbody design, and strap that adjusts from 27 inches to 54 inches. It's fully lined, with an interior pocket, and has an unforgetable Pikachu face on the front flap. Don't worry - Pikachu's cute face will remind you not to leave the your purse open. When the flap is up, it's srs. When it's secured with the magnetic clasp, it smiles to let you know your Poké Ball is secure."

column1: Snow White One Bite Crossbody Purse,"Is this the fairest bag of all?

column3: What is it with apples anyway? How did such a sweet, delicious fruit can't recast as a forbidden fruit? There is good old Eve who gets offered a bite of an apple and for her mistake she is cast out of paradise (seems a bit extreme). And we all know how Paris started the Trojan War with an ill-fated apple. Then there's the poison apple given to Snow White that makes her drift off into a death-like slumber. Remind yourself just how dangerous those shiny apples can be with this Snow White One Bite Crossbody Purse. Inspired by Disney's animated classic Snow White, this Danielle Nicole bag is designed to look like the witch's apple after it was dipped in her magic potion. You are sure to be the fairest in the land while wearing this purse, and you don't need a magic mirror to tell you so. Product SpecificationsSnow White One Bite Crossbody BagOfficially-licensed Disney's Snow White merchandiseSmall bag holds your essentialsPerfect purse for Snow White fans with fashion sense (aka all of you!)Materials: Silver-colored hardware and polyurethaneDimensions: 6 1/2"" wide x 6 1/2"" tall x 1 3/4"" deepStrap has 22"" drop"

column1: Pokémon Squirtle Faux Leather Crossbody Purse,"Get a little more space in your inventory

column3: Pokémon are great because they go with you everywhere. And now, you can count on them to go wherever you do even if you don't have any Poké balls handy with these adorable little Pokémon character crossbody purses. As is always the case with Pokémon, the hard part is going to be choosing one. Urgh! Why do you gotta make us choose, Professor? They're all adorable and powerful in their own way. And no matter which we choose, your bratty grandson is just going to pick the one that beats it.Pick Squirtle! Squirtle makes us squeal, he's so dang cute. His belly just cries out for snorgles. And who are we to deny him? Squirtle's great for speed runs. Water canons. And statistically, he's the best starter for Pokémon Red/Blue, according to Scientific American."

column1: Marvel Hela Handbag,"Kneel before this purse!

column3: Accessories matter, even to the Goddess of Death. Hela may have all the power of Asgard flowing through her, but even she can't help but take a moment to conjure up her incredible pointy headdress whenever she needs some extra intimidation. She enlists Skurge as her Executioner, even though she definitely doesn't need help in the death department. Maybe having nearly limitless power gets dull if you can't show it off with fancy hats and underlings!Which is why we think she would have appreciated this purse in her honor. Made of black vegan leather (polyurethane), it may not be as cruel as its namesake, but it more than makes up for it with its clever design. The front and sides feature a metallic green appliqué, based on the design of Hela's bodysuit. The interior is fully lined in custom fabric bearing her name, and sports both a zipper pocket and an open pocket for your necessities. The handbag has dual handles, plus a removable shoulder strap, making it a versatile companion for any hostile takeover... er, adventure... you may undertake! Enjoy your own little dose of Asgardian power every day - without Thor coming to thunder on your parade!Product SpecificationsMarvel Hela HandbagOfficially-licensed Thor: Ragnarok merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflyTop zip closureFully lined interior in ""Hela"" print fabric One zipper pocket and one open pocket on interiorAssume your rightful place on the throne of fashion!Front and sides feature metallic green appliqué, based on the design of Hela's bodysuitMarvel badge on the reverseCapacity: All the power of Asgard, plus your necessitiesMaterials: PolyurethaneRemovable shoulder strap has a drop that adjusts from 10"" to 22""   Double handles have a 6"" dropDimensions: 14"" wide x 10 1/2"" tall x 5 1/2"" deep.WARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."

column1: Spider-Man Duffel Purse ,"Spider-Man, Spider-Man. This bag is for the Spider-Fan.

column3: Like Superman, Spider-Man has a number of mortal women in his life who play important parts. Aunt May, of course, figures prominently. Then you've got the love-interests Gwen Stacy and Mary Jane. Betty Brant. Liz Allan. Wait. We see a pattern. The guy has a weakness for the human ladies, clearly. Except for Black Cat. Well, actually, when he got together with her, she was just a really skilled cat burglar. No radioactive toxoplasma in her past or anything. Just genetics and the need for revenge, which sometimes is enough.So we picked this bag out for you, another human female who plays an important part, one without which Spider-Man could not exist: Spider-Fan. Peter Parker's a photographer. He understands the importance of a good bag. That's one reason we think he'd dig this one from Loungefly. Well, that and it looks like Spidey. This has both double handles and a detachable shoulder strap, in case you need to swing into action.Product SpecificationsSpider-Man Duffel PurseOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandise Made by LoungeflyWeb pattern with spider logos on front and backLining has subtle tone-on-tone Marvel logo 2 interior pouches (1 with a zipper closure)Zipper closure on main compartmentDouble handles have 3"" dropDetachable adjustable shoulder strap has 12-25"" drop + 5 1/2"" double-handle dropMaterials: Faux leather with polyester liningCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergentImportedDimensions: 10"" wide x 6 1/2"" deep x 7 1/2"" tallWARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck. (How you would get the handle around your neck, we're not sure, but we're going with what the manufacturer said to be safe.)"

column1: Star Wars May the Force Be With You Purse,"This is the purse you're looking for

column3: Need a little black bag with a little something extra? Something that says ""I wish you well"" in the most Force-sensitive way possible? You're in luck - you won't have to search a galaxy far, far away to find it because we have it right here! This tough little bag has ""May The Force Be With You"" printed on the front, in white lettering with different fonts and surrounded by metal studs. It's so tough looking that you might think it came from the Dark Side - it just hits that sweet spot between Jedi and Sith style so well. The bag features a removable shoulder strap with chain-link details, which attaches to the purse using oversized lobster clasps. There is a top zip closure, and the interior also has a zipper pocket for smaller accessories. Whether your never-leave-home-without-it essentials include phones, wallets, or lightsabers, this bag will come in handier than a droid co-pilot during a Death Star raid!Warning: This bag may contain midi-chlorians. Or it might not. It's hard to tell, really...Product SpecificationsStar Wars May the Force Be With You PurseOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseA handy little black bag, perfect for a day out in a galaxy far, far away (or closer to home!)""May The Force Be With You"" printed on the front in different fontsMetal stud details, for a touch of Sith in this Jedi accessoryTop zip closure, with additional internal zipper pocketMaterials: Manmade stuffsCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent ImportedRemovable shoulder strap that's 23 1/2"" long (10 1/2"" max drop)Dimensions: 5 3/4"" tall x 9"" wide x 1"" deep"

column1: Gudetama Puffy Vegan Leather Crossbody Bag,"At least take him to IHOP

column3: You know, we kind of get where Gudetama is coming from. He knows he's doomed. He's never going to become a chicken (or a duck. or a dinosaur. whatever.). His Final Form is part of somebody's breakfast or lunch. That's just a sad way to spend your existence. He's the caterpillar who never gets to turn into a butterfly. The ugly duckling who never gets to be a swan. Cinderella who doesn't get to go to the ball.Which means we think you should take this bag on fabulous outings. Don't just take him to the grocery store. Take him out clubbing. Bring him when you go hiking. Take selfies with him. Allow your Gudetama Puffy Vegan Leather Crossbody Bag to see the world and the world to see him in return. Doesn't Gudetama deserve that?"

column1: Little Mermaid Flounder Crossbody Purse,"Everyone's favorite fish friend

column3: Look at this purse. Isn't it neat? With this purse your collection's complete! With this purse you're a girl - a girl who has everything!Collect your next piece of human paraphernalia with this Little Mermaid Flounder Crossbody bag. You can wear it next time you go where the people are, walking around on those... What do you call 'em? Feet! It may not fit gadgets and gizmos aplenty, but this small bag will definitely have space for some fish food, and a couple thingamabobs (definitely not space for 20). With a 22"" drop on the strap and a zip enclosure, all your favorite whozits and whatzits will be safe and secure. Product SpecificationsLittle Mermaid Flounder Crossbody PurseOfficially-licensed Disney's The Little Mermaid merchandiseSmall bag makes a big statementGreat accessory for anyone who longs to be under the seaMaterials: Gold-colored hardware and polyurethaneDimensions: 10 1/2"" wide x 8"" tall x 1 1/2"" deepStrap has 22"" drop"

column1: Star Wars Executioner Crossbody Flap Purse,"Loyalty to the First Order

column3: The First Order demands the absolute loyalty of its followers, without exception. Should anyone be found guilty of treason, they won't be met with mercy, or with any ordinary Stormtrooper on their tale - instead, they'll face justice from the elite branch of Stormtroopers known as the Executioners. Keeping everyone in line and looking good while doing it? With this purse, no one will dare to cross you or the First Order. Featuring the sleek look of the new Executioner Troopers in simulated leather, this elite bag also boasts a front flap closure with metal snap button, a zippered pocket and Star Wars logo lining on the inside, a small hand strap on top, and an adjustable removable crossbody strap. Traitors to the First Order will quake in their white boots when they see you coming with this bag. Product SpecificationsStar Wars Executioner Crossbody Flap PurseOfficially-licensed Star Wars: The Last Jedi merchandiseSimulated leather bag inspired by the sleek Executioner Trooper armorFront flap closure by metal snap buttonRemovable adjustable crossbody strapInterior zipper pocketSmall hand strap on topStar Wars logo fabric liningMaterials: Simulated leather and metalDimensions: approximately 9"" tall x 11"" wide x 3"" deepRemovable strap adjusts from approximately 27"" long to 52"" longCaution: Entanglement hazard: keep away from very young children."

column1: Death Trooper Mini Dome Vegan Leather Bag,"*garbled static*

column3: The Empire has a couple of requirements before you become a Death Trooper. You gotta be loyal to Director Krennic. You gotta look good in black. And you gotta be a good shot. None of this Stormtrooper nonsense. Let this Death Trooper Mini Dome Vegan Leather Bag from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story reveal the black of your soul. Well, and the fluorescent green bits, too. It'll hold your ID cards, your credits, and your phone so you can call up your buddy when you can't understand the comm and be like, ""What'd he say? Oh yeah, and are we on for poker Saturday? Ring me back after this firefight."" Product SpecificationsDeath Trooper Mini Dome Vegan Leather BagOfficially-licensed Rogue One: A Star Wars Story merchandiseMade by Loungefly Death Trooper design with fluorescent green accentsMatte simulated leather with debossed detailsDouble handles have 3"" dropTone-on-tone black Star Wars logo liningGunmetal hardwareImported Double-zipper closure on main compartmentChrome feet on bottom for longevitySimulated leather (PVC & nylon) with polyester liningCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergentImported Exterior Dimensions: 9 1/2"" wide x 8"" tall x 5"" deepInterior Dimensions: 9"" wide x 8"" tall at apex x 4 1/2"" deep(Will not fit your long range blaster rifle)Weight: 1 lb.WARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck. (How you would get the handle around your neck, we're not sure, but we're going with what the manufacturer said to be safe.)"

column1: Lilo and Stitch Crossbody Purse,"Fashion Experiment 626

column3: Illegal fashion experimentation? Who, us? No no no, our experiments are purely theoretical, you see. Completely within legal boundaries. You believe we actually created something? Hah! That would be irresponsible. And unethical. We would never, ever... make more than one. (Okay, fine. We totally would.)This Lilo and Stitch crossbody purse has a badness level that is unusually high for a bag of this size! Shaped just like Stitch's head, with appliqué facial features and two big notched ears on the side, it's the perfect way to carry all of your essentials (like that peanut butter sandwich and the dolly you made). Just unzip the top of his head (he won't mind) to reveal a lined compartment inside. Think of all that you could accomplish while carrying this, because this bag has been designed to be unstoppable! Just be careful, because it will be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where it will back up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's left shoe.Product SpecificationsLilo and Stitch Crossbody PurseOfficially-licensed Lilo & Stitch merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflyShaped like Stitch's head with appliqué facial features and earsZipper topFabric-lined interiorMaterials: faux leather (no genetic experimentation here!)Dimensions: 17"" wide x 14"" high x 5"" deepWARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."

column1: Pokémon Charmander Faux Leather Crossbody Purse,"Get a little more space in your inventory

column3: Pokémon are great because they go with you everywhere. And now, you can count on them to go wherever you do even if you don't have any Poké balls handy with these adorable little Pokémon character crossbody purses. As is always the case with Pokémon, the hard part is going to be choosing one. Urgh! Why do you gotta make us choose, Professor? They're all adorable and powerful in their own way. And no matter which we choose, your bratty grandson is just going to pick the one that beats it.Pick Charmander! His final evolution is a DRAGON, people. (Unfortunately, this purse is not designed to evolve, which is probably just as well because it would evolve with your stuff in it which could be messy.) Also, fire-type. And he's got a special place in our hearts from games long, long ago."

column1: Star Wars Boba Fett Crossbody Purse,"A place to store your bounty

column3: Some folks like Han Solo. Others are Lando fans. You like Boba Fett. He's got a dangerous job, and he's good at it. He lives by his own rules. Celebrate your favorite bounty hunter with this bag that'll keep your money safe from almost anything. Just watch out for that Sarlacc. It's a real money pit.This crossbody purse features Boba Fett's Mandalorian Crest on one side. The opposite side is blank, in case you're on the trail of an elusive bounty and need to stay on the downlow. It's got an adjustable crossbody strap, a top zipper, and a zipped pocket inside, perfect for keeping your dry cleaning receipts, coupons, and the card for the jetpack repair guy."

column1: Magic Pony Purse,"Your time to shine

column3: Friendship may be magic, but we think unicorns are the magicalest of all the magical ponies. Which is, of course, why we need one. We told our parents that we'd be good and muck out the stables no problem, because, heck, magical rainbow poops. But they STILL said no.That's when we decided we'd take matters into our own hands and store up the money for our own personal unicorn inside this Magic Pony Purse. See, it's like a tiny coin purse, only embiggened by magic. So we're hoping the savings we stash inside will also be embiggened by magic, 'cause it's expensive to board a horse near ThinkGeek World Domination HQ. Although, you know... we still haven't done anything with Steve's old office. Maybe we'll just hide it in there.A ThinkGeek exclusive, this Magic Pony Purse from the mad geniuses at Irregular Choice features a pair of white unicorns with multicolored, glittery manes. Because, why not? If you're ready to sparkle, it's ready to hit the town with you.Product SpecificationsMagic Pony PurseFrom the mad geniuses at Irregular ChoiceA ThinkGeek exclusiveBag shaped like an oversized coin purse complete with kiss lock closureTwo glittery unicorns facing each other on the frontReverse is spatter paint patternDecorated with glitter and holographic fabric and gold braid and a rhinestoneAll metal frame + feet on the base to protect itRemovable shoulder strap with 20"" drop  Navy floral velour liningMaterials: 80% polyester / 20% PU outer + 100% polyester liningCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent ImportedDimensions: 14"" wide x 10"" tall x 6"" deepWeight: 1 1/3 lbs.Matches the Misty Reins Unicorn Sneakers"

column1: Star Wars R2-D2 Heart Crossbody Bag,"Put a little droid on your heart

column3: You know how you can love something so hard, it may as well be imprinted on your heart? Well, this crazy lil' astromech droid has had us swooning for forty (GASP!) years - seeing Artoo splashed across a heart just seems natural at this point! Now you can sling him across your shoulder, show off your love, and have a place to stash your wallet to boot.This sturdy little bag is made from faux leather (no Wookiees harmed!) with printed and appliqué details to recreate that iconic R2-D2 look. Wear it however you feel comfortable with the adjustable shoulder strap, and fill it with all your necessities: money, keys, cosmetics, dire messages, or stolen plans. Whatever you need to carry, this is definitely the droid you're looking for!Product SpecificationsStar Wars R2-D2 Heart Crossbody bagOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflyAdjustable shoulder strapTop zip closureFully lined interiorCapacity: known to hold stolen plans and occasional requests for helpMaterials: Faux leather, because Artoo would never hurt a WookieeCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent ImportedDimensions: 8.5"" wide x 7.3"" tall x 2"" deep"

column1: Rugrats TV Crossbody Purse,"What a Baby's Gotta Carry

column3: When you're young, you don't have much you need to carry around. The grownups take care of providing you with most everything, and you can get away with carrying absolutely nothing - except, maybe, a handy toy screwdriver in your diapee. Never know when that might come in handy!If you're all growed up with 'sponsatilities now, you've got more to carry around. But don't worry - your friends Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Lil, Susie, Kimi, Dil, and, uh... Angelica we guess, will always be there for you! Carry them around wherever your adventures take you, with this glittery crossbody purse from Danielle Nicole. There's plenty of room inside for your everyday essentials including, yes, your toy screwdriver."

column1: Betsey Johnson Love Machine Crossbody Purse,"Have you heard about our robot friend?

column3: Everyone's always worried about the day computers gain sentience and take over the planet, but admit it - deep inside we're all a little excited to meet our future robot overlords. And while it may seem like some distant future, that doesn't mean you can't start getting in good with them now! This sweet little Betsey Johnson purse is ready to be your robot companion, and it totally will not ever rise up in a bid for world domination!How can we tell? A 'bot with a bow on its head can't be nefarious, can it? Made of gold metallic faux leather, this purse has big black crystal eyes and a circuit board heart. The boxy torso has nailhead stud decorations, and unzips to reveal a main compartment that's fully lined in custom rosebud fabric. Gold-tone beaded arms give this bag a sense of motion, while the crossbody chain link strap keeps it secure. Keep this cyber darling at your hip at all times so that when the robots do stage their inevitable uprising, they'll know you're a friend! Product SpecificationsBetsey Johnson Love Machine Crossbody PurseMetallic gold robot-shaped purse with a bow on its headBoxy torso holds the zipped main compartmentFully lined with custom rosebud fabricDetails include black crystal eyes, nailhead studs, beaded arms, and a circuit board heartPerfect for people looking to get in good with our coming robot overlords!Capacity: your most necessary of necessitiesMaterials: faux leather with metal hardwareCare Instructions: Don't get on its bad side...Crossbody chain is 52"" longDimensions: 9"" tall x 5"" wide x 2 1/2"" deep"

column1: Betsey Johnson Gimme Some Space Crossbody Purse,"Truly out of this world!

column3: Houston - we have a purse!"" Said no one at NASA, ever. It's okay, though - they get to play with gigantic rockets, and the rest of us have to settle for little ones. Which is why we're over the moon about this darling little Betsey Johnson bag, styled like a retro spaceship!Even certified rocket scientists can appreciate the clever application of black glitter on the fins and pointed nose cone of this purse. It creates a sparkly contrast with the metallic silver surface, which is quilted with tiny metal studs. Instead of jet flames, the bottom of the rocket features dangling chain strands to give the whole bag a sense of motion. The shoulder strap is another, larger metal chain, because it takes some serious hardware to hold onto a rocket. On the side a zipper opens the main compartment, which lined with custom rosebud fabric. Blast off to adventure with this sweet little ship at your hip, and show everyone what a badas...tronaut you are!Product SpecificationsBetsey Johnson Gimme Some Space Crossbody PurseShaped like a retro rocketshipBlack glitter on the nose cone and finsBody is quilted metallic silver with metal studsDangling chains mimic the engine flamesZipper compartment fully lined in rosebud fabricThe perfect statement purse for your next intergalactic tourCapacity: Only pack your necessitiesMaterials: faux leather with metal hardwareCare Instructions: 51"" chain strapDimensions: 9"" tall x 6"" wide x 3"" deep"

column1: Gudetama Vegan Leather Tote with Coin Bag,"Don't put all your eggs in one tote bag

column3: Actually, don't put any eggs in tote bags. Tote bags are really not the ideal way to transport breakables.You know, if it weren't for you, Gudetama wouldn't go out at all, so it's a good thing he's on this tote bag. You know when the weather's beautiful out, but you're all, ""meh,"" but you have to go out for something, and then you perk up as soon as you set foot outside and breathe in the fresh air? Yeah. That's probably not going to work in this case, but good luck with that.This canvas bag features the embroidered face of Gudetama and his little arms reaching out of a white faux leather shell. He's even sunny side up on the included coin pouch. ""Sunny"" being a relative term.Product SpecificationsGudetama Vegan Leather Tote with Coin BagOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandise From LoungeflyFeatures white faux pebbled leather shell with embroidered Gudetama face Gudetama sunny side up coin purse with top zipper clips in placeYellow and white ""polka dot"" pattern inside (some of the dots are eggs)Inside pocketMaterials: Canvas and simulated leather Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergentImportedDimensions: 15 1/2"" wide x 18 1/4"" tall x 3"" deep tote, 5"" across coin purseWARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."

column1: Binary Code Tote Bag,"Totes Practical

column3: Bikinis don't work for everybody. You guys let us know. So we took our pattern from the Circuit Board Two-Piece Swimsuit and stuck it on a tote bag. Because tote bags work for almost everybody. And everybody could use more carrying capacity, right?Toss your sunscreen, towel, and book into this Binary Code Tote Bag and hit the beach. Or keep it in your vehicle for when you're out and you need a bag at the grocery store or one of those stores that doesn't believe in baskets and only provides carts. What is up with that? We do not need a 4-wheeled vehicle for our stationery and chili lime pistachios, Home Goods. But we do need a Binary Code Tote Bag. Pretty sure.Product SpecificationsBinary Code Tote Bag A ThinkGeek creation & exclusive Black with grey and white circuits and chips and binary that spells out ""love""Great to take to the beach (or for shopping or whatever)Double handles have 10"" drop Materials: 100% cottonCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent Imported Dimensions: 13"" tall x 20"" wide with a 4"" gusset"

column1: Hello Kitty Bus Crossbody Purse,"Hello Kitty Xing

column3: The cuteness on the bus goes 'round and 'round… Hello Kitty is driving this red bus to wherever her fellow Sanrio passengers want to go! Along for the ride are Bad Badtz-Maru, Pom Pom Purin, Hangyodon, DokidokiYummychums, My Melody, Chococat, Kero Kero Keroppi, and Little Twin Stars. Chococat is busy reading, however, and isn't taking in the sights. But everyone else is excited to be on the bus. Except maybe Bad Badtz-Maru. He's rolling his eyes a bit. As usual. If you love Sanrio characters, this versatile faux leather purse makes it easy to follow Hello Kitty's adventurous spirit every day. Its roomy interior can hold everything you need, whether you're going to school, work, shopping, or on vacation! Beep, beep! From the Hello Kitty Sanrio line, and made by Loungefly.Product SpecificationsHello Kitty Bus Crossbody PurseOfficially-licensed Hello Kitty merchandiseRoomy bag holds plenty of purse items, and/or Sanrio toysFor all ages of Sanrio character loversPerfect for parents picking their kids up from schoolOr for the kids who are being picked upZipper closure on topFront of bus has a zipper pocketRemovable crossbody strapGrab handleMaterials: Faux leather with printed, debossed, and applique detailsDimensions: 11"" wide x 6 1/2"" high x 5 1/2"" deep"

column1: Hello Kitty House Tote Bag,"Whose House? Kitty's House!

column3: When you visit London, England, and you catch the whiff of Mama's apple pie in the air, you'll know that you're getting close to Kitty White's house! The whole White family will be happy to receive you, because friends are always welcome to visit in this house. Can we find you someplace to put your bag?Oh, guess that won't be necessary, because your bag is Hello Kitty's house! With this Hello Kitty House Tote Bag, you can carry the entire White family and some of their friends around with you, wherever you go. Made from vegan faux leather, printed and debossed applique details from the outside of Hello Kitty's house, with her family and friends peeking out at your from the windows. Use it to carry a gift for your hosts when you go a'visiting, because that's only proper when you always get such a warm reception!Product SpecificationsHello Kitty House Tote BagOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandisePerfect gift for the friend who always makes you feel at homeTwo tote handlesTop zips closed Red and black Sanrio character print liningInterior has one open pocket and one zipped pocketMaterials: Vegan faux (PU) leatherDimensions: 13"" high x 13"" wide x 4"" deep7 1/2"" drop on double handles"

column1: Star Wars: The Force Awakens Purses,"Let's go out to the lobby...

Some folks change purses every day to match their outfit. That's just more effort than we can muster. We prefer to match our purses to the occasion, which is sometimes practical and sometimes fanciful. There's a specific crossbody purse for outdoor events where our hands need to be free. There's a special purse for going someplace where the temperature is likely to fluctuate, so we need to be able to stuff some layers away. And now there's a purse for watching Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Styled like BB-8 or Captain Phasma, these purses from Loungefly are guaranteed to be a hit at the box office this holiday. They're SHINY, in both the Firefly sense and the literal sense, made from faux patent leather. They're rigid and moderately spacious with a wide flat base, perfect for hiding that box of Sno-Caps under your wallet and phone. They have feet on the bottom, which keeps them from sticking to the movie theater floor. And they have a double-zipper closure for ease of access to your tissues, just in case.  Product Specifications    Star Wars Force Awakens Purses Officially-licensed Star Wars: The Force Awakens merchandise  Choose BB-8 or Captain Phasma Patent-look simulated leather with embossed details Double handles have 3"" drop Lining has subtle tone-on-tone Star Wars logo - grey on BB-8, black on Phasma 2 interior pouches (1 with a zipper closure) Double-zipper closure on main compartment Chrome feet on bottom for longevity Ships in a protective Star Wars bag Materials: Simulated leather (PVC & nylon) with polyester lining Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent  Imported  Exterior Dimensions: 9 1/2"" wide x 8"" tall x 5"" deep Interior Dimensions: 9"" wide x 8"" tall at apex x 4 1/2"" deep  Weight: 1 lb. WARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD - Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck. (How you would get the handle around your neck, we're not sure, but we're going with what the manufacturer said to be safe.)"
Navy Blue Sea Creatures Tote Bag,"Totes Splashy

column3: Bikinis don't work for everybody. You guys let us know. So we took our pattern from the Deep Sea Creatures Two-Piece Swimsuit and stuck it on a tote bag. Because tote bags work for almost everybody. And everybody could use more carrying capacity, right?Toss your sunscreen, towel, and book into this Navy Blue Sea Creatures Tote Bag and hit the beach. Or keep it in your vehicle for when you're out and you need a bag at the grocery store or one of those stores that doesn't believe in baskets and only provides carts. What is up with that? We do not need a 4-wheeled vehicle for our stationery and chili lime pistachios, Home Goods. But we do need a Navy Blue Sea Creatures Tote Bag. Pretty sure.Product SpecificationsNavy Blue Sea Creatures Tote BagA ThinkGeek creation & exclusive Complete with Amphiodia urtica (brittle star)Anoplogaster cornuta (common fangtooth)Chascanopsetta prorigera (flatfish)Crossota millsae (deep-sea jellyfish)Mastigoteuthis magna (whip-lash squid)Melanocetus eustalus (anglerfish)Munidopsis andamanica (type of lobster)Nautilus pompilius (nautilus)Paragorgia arborea (bubblegum coral)Eurypharynx pelecanoides (pelican eel)Great to take to the beach (or for shopping or whatever)Double handles have 10"" drop Materials: 100% cottonCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent Imported Dimensions: 13"" tall x 20"" wide with a 4"" gussetNote that we've got the Eurypharynx pelecanoides (pelican eel) mislabeled as a fangtooth cause we like them so gosh dang much"

column1: Star Wars R2-D2 & BB-8 Two-Sided Faux Leather Tote Bag,"1 Droid, 2 Droid. Old Droid, New Droid

column3: Out with the old and in with the new? Not in this galaxy far, far away. Droids stay in commission for years and years, even after seeing heavy use in multiple skirmishes and even having to be rebuilt a few times. Even if a droid goes into low power mode and just sits there like a lump, how could you ever bring yourself to put it on the scrap heap after all the galaxy-saving it's done? But then again, there's this new model that's pretty useful, and cute...You don't have to decide between R2-D2 and BB-8! You can have your classic droid and your new droid together in harmony, on opposite sides of this faux leather tote bag. Feeling old school? Flip it around so that everyone can see the original plucky droid. Want something fresh? Flip it to the BB-8 side. You really can't go wrong either way, with printed, debossed, and applique details of each droid on the outside of this bag. Either one is really good at carrying secret plans and maps, so load up with lined interior with any secret information you need to carry. They'll keep it safe and help you get it where it needs to go, after a few space battles anyway.Product SpecificationsStar Wars R2-D2 & BB-8 Two-Sided Faux Leather Tote BagOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseFaux leather tote purse featuring R2-D2 on one side, BB-8 on the otherMade by our friends at LoungeflyLarge open interior compartmentSmall open pocket on inside, small zipper pocket on opposite wall insideInterior lined with black fabric with R2-D2 and BB-8 hearts patternMagnetic metal clasp closureTwo straps with 9"" dropMaterials: Vegan faux (PU) leatherExterior Dimensions: 16 1/2"" wide x 13 1/2"" tall x 5"" deepInterior Dimensions: 16 1/2"" wide x 11 1/2"" tall x 5"" deep (if you want the snap to work)  ""Will my laptop fit in this bag, ThinkGeek?"" Let's find out together!     Laptop fitting guide    Measure your laptop. Like TVs, laptops are listed by their measurement on the diagonal. Bags, on the other hand, are measured on the edges. Not all 17"" laptops are the same size, so you'll need to measure the length & width of your closed laptop.  ""But my laptop is at home, ThinkGeek!"" If you can't wait, Google has superpowers to tell you the dimensions of your laptop if you ask it nicely. Just input the make and model of your laptop and ye shall receive.  ""I've got the measurements! Now what?"" Compare your laptop's measurements to the measurements of the bag. If the laptop's measurements are smaller than the bag, it fits! If one or more of the laptop's measurements are bigger, you're out of luck with this bag. Try another."

column1: Dog House Purse,"You've got style in the bag

column3: When someone's ""in the doghouse,"" they're usually in trouble. Obviously, it must not have been this doghouse they were referring to, because this one is fab-u-lous! We would love to be in this one any day. As soon as we find our shrink ray. Maybe the merchant closet? *wanders off to look*This Dog House Purse from the mad geniuses at Irregular Choice is currently a ThinkGeek exclusive. If it were a real house, the sparkle could probably be seen from space and it would definitely violate all the homeowners' association by-laws. We're not sure why they called it a ""dog house,"" because although there's an adorable corgi looking out the window as if to greet you, there's also a grey and white cat, asleep in the opposite window, presumably absorbing a sunbeam to power those 3 a.m. crazies."

column1: Gummy Vandal Clutch,"In Beary Blue

column3: Street artist WhisBe (short for ""What is Beautiful"") created his Vandal Gummy series of gummy bear mug shots to make people think about innocence lost and question, ""Well, what did the gummy bear do?"" Of course, we also look and think, ""Mmm... gummy bears... where can I get a bag of gummy bears right now?""Throw some cash or cards into this clutch and bounce on down to your local gummy vendor to pick up some of the chubby, chewy little bears. The pop art design kinda reminds us of a certain internet Flash series from the early 2000s (the one that wasn't for small children or big babies). In bright berry blue with the lightning bolt tribute to David Bowie from the art piece, it's got room inside for your everyday essentials (and maybe a few of those delectable gummy treats). A detachable wrist strap keeps it close it hand when you need a little sugary pick-me-up, with a cool crystal shaped zipper pull because Bowie has to have his glam. Product SpecificationsGummy Vandal ClutchBear-shaped wristlet clutch with David Bowie tributeZipper closure with custom crystal-shaped zipper pullDetachable wrist strap with lobster claspDimensions: 8.75"" x 7.1"" x 0.9"" thick"

column1: Thor's Hammer Wristlet,"You're Worth It

column3: We can think of lots of handy safety features to keep someone from stealing your bag: maybe an alarm that sounds if your bag gets too far away from your person. Or an electric shock when an unauthorized individual picks up the bag. But better than that would be a bag that no one can even pick up in the first place, if they are not *worthy*.If you are feeling worthy, you'll want to pick up this Thor's Hammer Wristlet for yourself. The zippered compartment has just enough space for the essentials you want to take into battle. The wrist strap and faux leather handle make it convenient and, let's face it, fun to carry. So fun in fact, that you can use it as a test: some guy still doesn't want to be seen holding your bag for you, when your bag is Thor's friggin' hammer? Oh, he is SO not worthy.Product SpecificationsThor's Hammer WristletOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at LoungeflyThor's hammer bag with handle and wrist strapPerfect gift for someone who is worthy1 pocket interior, lined with Marvel logo fabricZipper closure with Loungefly zipper pullMaterials: All new materials. Polyurethane foam. Dimensions:Entire hammer: approximately 12"" tallHammer pocket: approximately 8"" wide x 6"" deepWrist strap: approximately 5 1/2"" diameter"

column1: Disney Mickey Suit Faux Leather Mini Backpack,"Oh, Boy!

column3: From our earliest days watching cartoons, to palling around with King Mickey in the worlds of Kingdom Hearts, we've always had a friend in this very special mouse. Adventurous, optimistic, and a friend to everyone big and small, we're always happy to know that Mickey always has our backs.M-I-C-K-E-Y M-O-U-S-E! Keep this lifelong pal at your side (or rather, slung over your shoulders) with this faux leather mini backpack featuring the unmistakable details of the classic Disney mouse. With big Mickey ears at the top, it has a front zippered pocket in red like his shorts with applique button patches and a zipper charm of his classic white glove. It comes in soft, touchable faux leather with a Saffiano crosshatch texture, and there's just enough room inside for the essentials, like your phone and a talking cricket to help you sort out right from wrong.Product Specifications Disney Mickey Suit Faux Leather Mini BackpackOfficially-licensed Disney merchandiseFaux leather mini backpack with Mickey Mouse detailsMade by our friends at LoungeflyTwo round black Mickey ears on topRed zippered front pocket with white applique ""button"" patchesFaux leather Mickey glove charm on a ball chainSaffiano crosshatch textureZippered top closureMaterials: Vegan faux leatherDimensions: 10"" high x 9"" wide x 4 1/2"" deepWARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."

column1: Doctor Who TARDIS and Flowers Handbag,"Five billion years and it still comes down to money

column3: When we were little, we were so jealous of the kids who got to have a toy store shopping spree on TV. It would be so awesome to have unlimited money (even with limited time to spend it). We wonder if the Doctor ever uses his psychic paper as a credit card... or maybe he just makes savvy investments in the stock market. That's a unique anomaly called ""Bigger on the Insider Trading.""If you're still dealing with real money like we are, perhaps you need a snazzy way to bring it with you. How about this Doctor Who TARDIS and Flowers Handbag? It features a floral TARDIS design on the outside, plus double handles and a removable shoulder strap for versatility. After all, this regeneration you might enjoy a different style of purse than the last. It's good to have options.Product Specifications Doctor Who TARDIS and Flowers HandbagOfficially-licensed Doctor Who merchandise From our friends at LoungeflyFloral pattern with TARDISes sprinkled throughoutRemovable shoulder strap adjusts from 11-24"" dropDouble handles have 5"" dropInterior zipped pocket and open pocketTop zip closureDW-logo shaped rivetsMaterials: Faux leatherCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent ImportedDimensions: 11 1/2"" long x 9"" tall x 5"" deepWARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."

column1: Disney Belle Debossed Faux Leather Purse ,"This bag's a true Beauty

column3: It's a tale as old as time. You need a purse that's big enough to hold all of your necessities (BOOKS). It needs to be cruelty-free and unique. And most of all, it needs to be a real beauty - but still haul things like a beast. It might seem impossible to find that perfect bag you can love forever, but we think we can help. Be our guest and try this gorgeous Beauty and the Beast-inspired purse by Loungefly! This ivory satchel has a debossed design featuring Belle's face on the front, along with a brilliant red rose hanging from the handle. The outside may be pretty, but true beauty is found within. Specifically within that fully-lined interior, featuring beautiful custom floral fabric! There is a zippered divider pouch separating the interior into two compartments, with a small zip pocket and a small open pocket built into the lining. Made of simulated leather, the purse closes with a top strap and has both handles and an adjustable, removable shoulder strap. Lovely and versatile, this purse may be your happily ever after. No Gastons allowed! Product SpecificationsDisney Belle Debossed Faux Leather PurseOfficially-licensed Disney's animated Beauty and the Beast merchandiseMade by our friends at LoungeflyIvory satchel with debossed design featuring Belle's face on the frontA red rose hangs from the strapPurse closes with a top strap, secured by a magnetic snapFully-lined interior features custom floral fabricInterior: two compartments with zippered divider pouch, plus a small zip pocket and small open pocket built into the lining Materials: simulated leather with gold-tone metal hardwareRemovable, adjustable shoulder strap Dimensions: approx 11 1/5"" wide x 9 1/2"" tall x 6"" deep (bag) / approx. 4"" diameter x 1 1/5"" thick with a 4 1/2"" strap (decorative rose)"

column1: Game of Thrones Drogon Purse,"""Dracarys.""
And what lesson can we draw from Volantene history?
If you want to conquer the world, you best have dragons.
- George R.R. Martin, A Dance with Dragons

You may not be Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, the Unburnt, Mother of Dragons, khaleesi to Drogo's riders, and queen of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, but that doesn't mean you don't have your own plans for world domination. Keep them safe and sound, sheltered under the wing of a dragon in this purse. Designed by our friends at Crowded Coop, this Game of Thrones Drogon Purse is a ThinkGeek exclusive. The flap is a dragon wing. The outside looks like dragon skin, too, only it's faux leather - no dragons were harmed in the creation of this bag. We promise. It even comes complete with spiky tail. The lining looks like the pattern you'd find on a Valyrian steel blade. It basically roars your fierceness. This is not a bag for the faint of heart."
Captain Marvel Sash Purse,"Versatility in action

column3: Avengers. A-Force. Ultimates. Captain Marvel has a knack for spreading herself thin across a lot of teams - and that's not counting her time as Ms. Marvel, Warbird, or Binary. Whether you're travelling across town or across space, going shopping or going toe-to-toe with Tony Stark, anyone who is on the run as much as Carol knows the importance of having accessories that can keep up.This Captain Marvel purse is durable and versatile enough for any major event or solo adventure. It has double handles and a removeable shoulder strap which adjusts to fit crossbody, in case you need to keep your hands free. Inside there is an open pocket and a zip pocket to keep your necessities organized, because the Carol Corps are always prepared. Made of cruelty-free simulated leather, the bag recreates Carol's iconic blue, red and gold costume look, down to the appliqué gold stripes and starburst emblem. The handles are attached with custom starburst rivets, and the interior is fully lined in red with a blue star pattern as well. You certainly won't need to go to space to see stars everyday! Though obviously if you get a chance to go to space, you should take it - just fill this bag with that astronaut ice cream stuff and enjoy yourself!Product SpecificationsCaptain Marvel Sash PurseOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflyTop zip closureCustom starburst rivets at the handlesFully lined in red with custom blue starburst pattern Interior zip pocket and open pocketMaterials: simulated leather (all faux, no hawk)Care Instructions: Wipe clean with damp clothDimensions: 16"" wide (at top)/12"" wide (at base) x 10"" tall x 6"" deepRemovable shoulder strap adjusts from 12"" to 22"" dropDouble handles have 6 1/2"" drop WARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. Keep away from very young children. Do not place around neck."

column1: Harry Potter House Cufflinks,"50 points to Slyffvenuff

column3: They don't show it on screen during the movies or talk about it in the books, but at Hogwarts after the Sorting Hat puts you in a House, you get your complimentary cufflinks to go along with it. It should have made it into the deleted scenes at the very least, right?Represent your House with the Harry Potter House Cufflinks. Make sure everyone knows the best House at every elegant social outing that you're a part of. Hint - the best one is clearly the House you're in.    Product SpecificationsHarry Potter House CufflinksOfficially-licensed Harry Potter merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveCufflinks featuring animals of all the Hogwarts HousesGryffindor lionSlytherin snakeHufflepuff badgerRavenclaw raven (like the movies)Perfect for the Yule Ball... or any other fancy occasion you can think ofFixed back with HP initials on the backMaterials: Brass and enamelCare Instructions: Spot clean with damp cloth"

column1: Star Wars I Love You / I Know Cufflinks,"Perfect for the Han in your life

Because, as much as Lucas may have thought he understood him, Han never would have said, ""I love you, too,"" as the scene was originally scripted. Everybody's got a smuggler/princess combination in their lives. Your Beatrice and Benedick who are too busy being sharp-tongued and witty at each other to realize they're perfect for one another (although the chemistry is obvious to everyone observing). Or maybe you ARE that couple. Once that couple realizes they belong together, this cufflink set is great tribute to their romance. The pair features one cufflink with Leia's picture and the words, ""I LOVE YOU."" and the other cufflink with Han's picture and the words, ""I KNOW."" It's romantic and sassy and perfect for that couple, whether you know them or are them. Product Specifications    Pair of cufflinks with Han and Leia's pictures and their iconic interaction: ""I love you"" / ""I know"" Officially-licensed merchandise from Lucasfilm Fixed-back closure (Star Wars logo)  Comes in a Star Wars box Materials: Rhodium-plated base metal with enamel Dimensions: 3/4"" square"
Harry Potter Crest Jacquard Ties ,"When Harry Means Business

column3: It has been nearly 20 years since the Harry Potter books first arrived on the scene. Maybe you were 10 years old when you discovered their magic. You went to the release of the second book fully dressed with spectacles, a lightning scar, and a Gryffindor scarf waving in the wind. Well, unfortunately, that would mean you are pushing 30 now, and displaying your Potter fandom with such exuberance may no longer be ""socially acceptable.""These Harry Potter Crest Jacquard Ties gives even the biggest Potter fan a subtle way to say that Harry hasn't lost his appeal. column1: Thor Ragnarok Money Clip, Tie Bar, and Cufflink Set,"Asgard is dead... and it will be reborn in a stylish new image

column3: Maybe Asgard wouldn't have to worry about constant threat of invasion if it wasn't such a cool place. Ever think about that, Thor? Just bring Asgard down the ladder a little bit on the ""hottest destination wedding locations"" list and the rest will sort itself out. No? Well, we tried. But if you're going to still have your fancy dress up parties there, you might as well look the part.Asgard isn't about guts and glory 100% of the time. More like 95%. For those times you need to attend a kingly feast or any other grand occasion we recommend wearing your godly best. With cufflinks, a tie-bar, and money clip fit for a thunder god, these items are sure to make you stand out from the crowd. Note - these are not meant to withstand gladiatorial combat with the Hulk. column1: Chewbacca Tie,"Put Some Hair on Your Chest

I suggest a new strategy, R2. Let the Wookiee win. - C-3PO If there's one thing you can beat a Wookiee at, it's fashion. The bandolier is stylish, but it doesn't take an advanced degree to see that Chewbacca's favorite bit of clothing was his birthday suit. But here to celebrate your love for the Wookiee-fur is this Chewbacca tie. Made out of fine 100% silk and patterned after the big guy's fur, you'll have the party roaring in no time.  Note: Favorite knots for this tie include the ""Bowcaster,"" the Fuzzball,"" and the ""RRRAARRWHHGWWR."" When it's time to present that portfolio, to get that promotion, or propose on one knee, the LAST thing we want to think about is our French cuffs coming undone. That's why we present to you the Thor Glow-In-The-Dark Cufflinks. The fixed-back will hold any shirtsleeves securely, and the glowing means the wearer is worthy. Right? column1: Spider-Man Black Matte Cufflinks,"Go web, go!

column3: With a flick of his wrist, Spider-Man could send sticky, super-strong web shooting out to trap his enemies, or to propel himself across New York. These will not do that. (#SadFeels) There is no mutant spider venom included. However, the Spider-Man Black Matte Cufflinks will allow you to take your geeky pride into a semi-formal or formal occasion. These fixed-back cufflinks with an enamel Spidey-head will give you subtle geek cred while allowing you to maintain the integrity of your French cuffs. You'll get compliments from people who notice details, and you may make new Marvel Comic Universe fan-friends in unexpected places. column1: Superman Silhouette Gold Cufflinks - Exclusive,"Man of Gold

column3: What if instead of the Man of Steel, Superman was really the Man of Gold? (Okay, okay, we know that he does turn gold in the 853rd century, but that's a ways off from now, isn't it?) At 225 pounds, as Superman famously stately his weight in an interview with Daily Planet reporter Lois Lane, that would make him worth about $4.3 million (USD) today. But only if you could manage to melt him down and sell him, which might be a little tricky, given those laser eyes of his.Better idea: honor Kal-El with these gold-colored cufflinks featuring his silhouette. With a matte black background and red enamel for his insignia and cape, they come with fixed-back closures featuring the DC Comics logo. All in an attractive box, suitable for gifting. column1: Deadpool Bomb Cufflinks,"Ka-boom!

column3: Deadpool can clean up pretty well when he feels like it, but most of the times he likes to use the path of least resistance which happens to be the messiest option (surely that's just a coincidence, right?). Bombs, guns, swords - those are the messy options. And messy options make Deadpool happy. Note the smiley face.Become the anti-hero gentleman you were meant to be with these Deadpool Bomb Cufflinks. Cufflinks are themed in a cartoonish bomb design with a happy little Deadpool face on the side for the personal touch."

column1: Star Wars Darth Vader Lightsaber Tie Bar,"For More Civilized Occasions

column3: For meetings with top Imperial officers such as Grand Moff Tarkin and the Joint Chiefs, you can wear your the full Darth Vader regalia, including the helmet and the cape, and not be out of place in the least. But if you've ever tried walking into a meeting with, say, a new office supply vendor, while dressed head to toe in black armor, then you know that it doesn't always go over quite so well.Assuming you don't need any of the life-support functions of the full suit, you can still achieve a strong and powerful Dark Lord of the Sith vibe with just this little accessory. Perfect for more civilized occasions that require an elegant touch, this tie bar will hold your tie in place while very subtly indicating the power behind your words. Try wearing it while delivering performance reviews to your staff, and you will certainly see the power a simple lightsaber can have. ""Admiral Ozzel, your previous performance review includes a notation that you are as clumsy as you are stupid. Now, have you made any progress in locating the Rebel headquarters?""Product SpecificationsStar Wars Darth Vader Lightsaber Tie BarOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseMetal tie bar holds your tie in place with Darth Vader's lightsaber hiltPerfect for giving off a subtle signal of dominance during a tough negotiationSlide clasp backMaterials: Stainless Steel / Zinc alloyDimensions: approximately 2 1/2"" long x 1/4"" wideWARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age"

column1: Chewbacca Tie Bar,"Tie bar any wookie would love

column3: Chewbacca was always prepared to back up Han whether they were smuggling goods, tricking out the Millennium Falcon, or fighting the Empire. Armed with his skills, his calm nature under pressure, and his bandolier with utility bag (what was in there anyway? ed. note: sandwiches), Chewie was always ready for action. And Chewie didn't feel the need to vary his attire for formal occasions such as that medal ceremony. He was confident in all his furry glory. You may have to wear a few more clothes when you dress up, but you can still rock a little bit of Chewie's confident swagger with this Chewbacca Tie Bar. This silver-colored slide-on tie bar is modeled after the big guy's ever-present bandolier. column1: Star Wars Mos Eisley Tie Bar,"The Show Must Go On

column3: Have you ever been a bit nervous about an upcoming event? Maybe an interview, an approaching Imperial Star Destroyer, or meeting the parents of your significant other for the first time? Wear the Star Wars Mos Eisley Tie Bar. It will remind you of the confident, brave souls who let *nothing* stop them from their dream of making music and accomplishing their business goals. Is the only gig in town at a wretched hive of scum and villainy? The show must go on. Are there outlaws inside, with the death sentence on 12 systems? The show must go on.Did Jedis start slicing off arms? They only pause for a moment, then realize the show must go on. By the time a bounty hunter gets shot, they don't even miss a beat, because they realize that nothing should keep them from pursuing the life of music that they love. Be like Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes: confident, brave, persistent. Put on the tie bar. Nothing can stop you now. Maybe he's replaced his adoptive father on the throne of Asgard. Maybe he's even gone legit! The options are endless. But for once you won't have to worry about what tricks Loki has hidden up his sleeve... because you can have Loki hidden on your own! column1: Coffee & Donuts DIY Coloring Book Tie,"Colorfully formal

column1: Rebel Alliance Tie Bar,"Just on a Diplomatic Mission

column3: When the big guy comes around (or his barking dog of a right hand man) and you know you're busted, you've got a choice to make. He clearly knows what you've been up to, but just because he's caught up to you doesn't mean he can prove anything. You might be wearing your Rebel cred right there for all to see, but with your tie on straight and a poker face, maybe you can pass everything off like you are a just consular ship on a diplomatic mission. In these uncertain times, there is still hope. For those who are willing to fight for that hope, it's possible to show off your rebellious side while still dressing sharp. With a Rebel Alliance Tie Bar, you can keep your tie secured and your hopes high at the same time. Featuring the Rebel Alliance Starbird symbol in red, wear it proudly until all beings in the galaxy are made forever free. We're just gonna take a little nap, k? Zzzzz....When you don this Pokémon Jigglypuff Hooded Reversible Scarf you can sing people to sleep (and then draw on their faces). Well, technically, you can do that already. It's just that you have a good excuse if you're pretending to be everybody's favorite balloon Pokémon.
