column1: Crit Success D20 Beanie and Scarf Set,"Good for Icewind Dale

column3: Exposure to the elements is never a good thing, and after several hours you can find yourself exhausted. Now, a DC 10 CON saving throw isn't hard to hit if you've been playing for a while (we're assuming you're not still level 1), but why take the risk?Bundle up in this Crit Success D20 Beanie and Scarf Set. The hat features a d20 patch stitched onto the cuff (naturally, you've rolled a 20). The scarf features eight d20s, having rolled a pair of 4s, 7s, 17s, and 20s on either end. Not too shabby."

column1: Wonder Woman Knit Pom Pom Beanie and Scarf Set,"Do not reflect bullets (that requires Mittens of Submission)

column3: The Amazon is known for its rainforests, and one wouldn't typically think to wear a knit hat and scarf into the jungle. But if you are looking for a way to say, ""I love me some butt-kicking, super-powered, life-saving Amazonian demigoddess,"" while sweating profusely then have we got the cold-weather accessories for you. Or, you know, you could wear this cold-weather gear where it's COLD. That works, too. Wrap up in power with this Wonder Woman hat and scarf set. Both feature 4"" pom poms and the double-W logo in gold faux leather on a color-scheme pulled from the DCEU."

column1: Nightmare Before Christmas Graveyard Knit Scarf,"Something is missing, but what?

column3: We have a feeling that if Jack left presents that were actually practical he wouldn't have almost ruined Christmas. It's cold out there, the people need warmth, and not in the form of anything that wants to eat them. That may be a tall order, but we can probably work within those boundaries. And our warehouse monkeys appreciate it when we do.This Nightmare Before Christmas Graveyard Knit Scarf will keep you warm and darkly stylish. One side features the silhouettes of tombs and mausoleums in a graveyard scene with Jack's grinning face at either end. The other side is plain. This makes it an excellent option if you have boring things to attend with boring people and might need to flip it in a hurry."

column1: Nightmare Before Christmas Tattoo Lightweight Scarf,"Wrap Yourself in Holiday Ink

Perhaps you've considered getting a beautiful piece of Nightmare Before Christmas artwork as a tattoo, but although there are many different designs that would be most delightful, the idea of something so permanent is a little bit frightful. For you may love the holiday-bending claymation classic, but maybe having just one unchanging art design feels a bit like having a whole town dedicated to just one holiday!  If there's an empty place in your bones that calls out for something unknown, we would like to answer back with this Nightmare Before Christmas Tattoo Lightweight Scarf! When it comes to surprises in the moonlit night, it excels without even trying. Featuring flash tattoo designs of Jack, Sally, Zero, Oogie Boogie, and more against a starry (and batty) night sky, its gauzy lightweight material is perfect for any and all seasons. It goes great with a black-and-white pinstripe suit, a jolly red coat, or anything else! Blowing up entire planets! Geez!Next time you are feeling a bit of the chill in the air, wrap yourself up with this lightweight Star Wars Sugar Skull scarf is made with black polyester fabric and features the helmets of Darth Vader, Boba Fett, and a Stormtrooper, each colorfully decorated in the style of calaveras (aka sugar skulls). column1: Bob's Burgers Tina Butts Knit Scarf,"Uhhhhhhhhhhhhh
Brrr. It sure is cold in here. I wish some strong, chivalrous man would lend me his jacket... or pants.
- Tina, ""The Belchies""

Or, like Tina, maybe you don't really need a man for that. You can keep yourself warm with this Bob's Burgers Tina Butts Knit Scarf. Nobody's going to doubt your favorite body part when you're wearing this. Both sides say BUTTS in a huge font. Twice for good measure. (That's four total butts, for those playing at home.) And this scarf also features a headshot of our favorite strong, sensual woman, Tina."
Star Wars Floral and Galactic Empire Kimono Wrap,"That's a wrap

column3: The planets in the original Star Wars trilogy aren't really known for having ecosystems amenable to the sorts of flowers we see here on Earth. Desert. Ice. Swamp. But life finds a way. In our imagination, these little ones are blossoming on a log near Yoda's hut or in a greenhouse on the Death Star. Stormtroopers gotta eat their vegetables, you know. This Star Wars Floral and Galactic Empire Kimono Wrap is super subtle - that is, until somebody notices the Imperial Crests. Then it's game over. At that point, they're going to want you to stand still so they can check out all the awesome designs. So it's probably best to wear this when you aren't in a hurry. column1: R2-D2 and C-3PO Blanket Scarf,"You're being put into carbon-freeze

column3: Hopefully where you live you won't be dealing with your poor Tauntaun freezing to death. If you did, we would first recommend multiple scarves, and then we would suggest maybe migrating to warmer climates for the winter. However, should you decide to brave the frigid temperatures of the outdoors we would strongly recommend a blanket scarf. Bonus points if it reps one of your favorite fandoms. Oh, what a coincidence, we have just the thing!The R2-D2 and C-3PO Blanket Scarf flies your geek flag in a toasty warm wrap around your neck. column1: Star Wars Stormtrooper Blanket Scarf,"Only Imperial Stormtroopers Are So Fashionable

column3: Standard-issue Stormtrooper armor looks sleek and offers the wearer tons of protection. Glancing blaster bolts are deflected by the hard exterior, and the climate control features make it ideal for everywhere from desert planets to icy wastelands, and even in the vacuum of space. Still, there are some weak points, and that neck is looking a little exposed under the helmet there. Is there something we can do about that?Customizing your look is usually a big no-no for Imperial Stormtroopers, but what Commander could be mad at you for throwing on this Star Wars Stormtrooper Blanket Scarf? With a woven pattern of Stormtrooper helmets, it fits right in with your standard uniform and protects that super-vulnerable neck area. It'll catch the enemy's eye long enough for you to fire off some of those trademark super-accurate shots of yours and get the upperhand - however many shots that happens to be.Product SpecificationsStar Wars Stormtrooper Blanket ScarfOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseBlanket-style scarf featuring Stormtrooper helmet designDesign repeated in inverse colors on the backGrey fringe on the ends Materials: 100% AcrylicCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry.ImportedOne size fits most Stormtroopers (even the short ones)Dimensions: 24"" x 80"" (including fringe)"

column1: Binary Geek Knit Scarf,"Geek with a capital G

column3: We enjoy staying warm. We also like confusing people with binary. So imagine how happy it made us here at ThinkGeek World Domination HQ when we figured out that we could do both with a single item.

column1: Meet the Binary Geek Knit Scarf. Black and white, it spells ""Geek"" in binary on both sides. And if any of the zeroes out there ask you what your scarf is up to with all those zeroes and ones, perhaps you can introduce them to one of our very first tee shirts?"
Pi By Numbers Knit Scarf,"You've got pi on you

column3: Despite what our Algebra 2 teacher tried to turn it into, mathematics can be beautiful. The first time you graph a parabola in geometry. The recognition of the Fibonacci sequence in a fern. The moment you get to the Q.E.D. bit in a particularly vexing proof. There's beauty in symmetry and simplicity, and there's beauty in Chaos Theory. Let math keep you stylin' and warm with this Pi By Numbers Knit Scarf. One side has the first 435 digits of Pi (not including the 3) - we mean, well, the scarf HAS the 3 on it, it's just that we didn't count it as a digit. Moving on. The reverse features 8 Pi symbols aka the Greek letter. And if some dolt makes fun of you for your math scarf, tell 'em what goes around comes around."

column1: Neon Dragon Beanie and Scarf Set,"No, four: two, two, four.

column3: See, really, two is enough. We're going to give you a scarf and a hat. Two. What are you going to do with four, anyhow? You don't have two heads, do you? Yeah yeah. We know you're eating. But, look. Bryant sent us to tell you he wanted you to see this. This black hat and scarf set is like a subtle nod to fellow fans of a particular cult movie about the future. To anybody else, you just have a teal blue dragon on your hat and scarf, which seems fine by us. And since it's basically always raining out there, it can't hurt to have an extra hat and scarf set, right?"

column1: I Need My Space Beanie and Scarf Set,"Gift them some personal space

column3: If you have an introvert space geek in your life and you don't know what gift to get them, we have your answer right here. Nearly everybody needs cold weather gear. (Sorry, San Diego.) And somehow at the end of the season, half of it disappears. So it makes for a solid gift. And this hat and scarf set come packaged in a little gift box, ready to go.Because you can't wrap 835,958 gallons of liquid propellant and solid rocket boosters, we suggest you give them the next best thing: this gift set. Because after somebody hugs you is not the right time to let folks know you need some space. Let your apparel shout it out before extroverts get within reach. And with these cute starfields incorporated into the design, they'll know it's not personal. (The truth can be our little secret.)"

column1: Wonder Woman Art Deco Lightweight Scarf - Exclusive,"Diana Prince Style Moderne

column3: There's a subtle art to blending in with your surroundings. You might just be an Amazon Princess from a secret island far from the world of men, but with the right disguise, they'll never know it. Until you demonstrate that super strength you're hiding within, anyways.A super subtle way to accessorize yourself like Diana Prince. Rather than a tiara on your head (which is cool, but will definitely make you stick out a bit), the Wonder Woman designs are hidden within the art-deco-style print on this red infinity scarf. And since it's made of lightweight, airy fabric, it doesn't weigh nearly as much as those heavy metal accessories, either. Only the most perceptive of mortals will see your true nature."

column1: Star Wars Yoda and Friends Floral Lightweight Infinity Scarf - Exclusive,"Cozy and well-equipped should you be

column3: We can't all carry a 900-year-old Jedi Master on our back, have our favorite Astromech droid by our side, and a slightly neurotic protocol droid looking out for us. Frankly, traveling with that threesome might prove trying in short order, anyway. We have a lovely alternative, however! This Yoda and Friends Floral Lightweight Infinity Scarf, available exclusively at ThinkGeek, features a floral print with Yoda, R2-D2, and C-3PO repeated among the flowers. Wear it to dress up an outfit, or for protection from the sand during surface excursions on desert planets. May the Force be with you!Product SpecificationsYoda and Friends Floral Lightweight Infinity Scarf Officially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveBlack floral print infinity scarf with Yoda, R2-D2, and C-3PO repeated among flowers Perfect for dressing up an outfit or protection from windblown sand on desert planetsMaterials: 100% PolyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold, do not bleach. Line dry. Low iron.ImportedDimensions: 20"" x 38"" tube (it's an infinity scarf so the 38"" is 76"" of fabric doubled over)"

column1: Space Invaders Knit Scarf,"Does not protect from stuff falling out of the sky

column3: Space Invaders was a monumentally important video game. For the first time, high scores were saved. For the first time, the targets shot back. For the first time, music wasn't just at the beginning and end of a game, but played (repeatedly) as you played - speeding up as the game sped up. Yup, without Space Invaders and all the hard work of creator Tomohiro Nishikado, video games as we know and love them would not exist. Honor the iconic game with this Space Invaders Knit Scarf. Perfect for retro defenders of Earth everywhere, this black woven scarf features neon aliens, bases, and ships, with the Space Invaders logo woven into the one-sided design. This'll protect your neck from the wind, but you'd better go hide under a bunker if stuff starts falling out of the sky."

column1: Pusheen Scarf,"A Cat Who Likes Water??

column3: Adorning the lovely Pusheen Scarf is the legendary aquatic creature known as the Mer Kitteh. This mythological beast gives its blessing to all feline creatures who manage to avoid bath time, which is, of course, all of them. Except for them tricksy Turkish Vans. Mer Kitteh sightings have been known to bring fresh-smelling litter, purrfect grooming, and adorable kitten playmates to all who bear the Pusheen symbol. So get this scarf, wear it when you're near the sea, and wait for Mer Kitteh to bless you. It will happen.Product Specifications Pusheen ScarfOfficially-licensed Pusheen merchandiseInfinity scarf with Pusheen Mermaid and seashell printPerfect for the cat lover who can't get their Kitteh in a tub to save their souls. One Size Fits All (just don't put it on your cat)Materials: 100% PolyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash. Do not iron. Do not machine wash.ImportedDimensions: 19"" wide x 32"" long (doubled over)"

column1: Beauty and the Beast Stained Glass Lightweight Infinity Scarf,"Wrap yourself in enchantment

column3: There's so much iconic imagery from Disney's animated version of Beauty and the Beast, and we're being reminded of it by the live-action movie's release. Do you remember the opening sequence told the backstory in stained glass, in much the same way windows in many churches and castles tell stories?Tell the story of your fandom with this Beauty and the Beast Stained Glass Lightweight Infinity Scarf. This scarf is as lightweight as the last petal that falls gently from the rose. And, much like true love, it's infinite. Aww. 100% polyester, it draws its imagery from that stained glass opening sequence animation art, and contains so many colors it'll pretty much go with anything. Including a yellow ballgown.Product SpecificationsBeauty and the Beast Stained Glass Lightweight Infinity ScarfOfficially-licensed Beauty and the Beast merchandiseImages taken from the opening sequence of the animated versionMaterials: 100% PolyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry.ImportedDimensions: 22"" x 38"" tube (it's an infinity scarf so the 38"" is 76"" of fabric doubled over)"

column1: Star Wars X-Wing Fighter Art Deco Lightweight Scarf,"Red Five, Squaring Off!

column3: Whether you're trying to blow up the Death Star at the Battle of Yavin or at the Battle of Endor, or you're battling the First Order, show your support of the Rebel troops with this Star Wars X-Wing Fighter Art Deco Lightweight Scarf. Its sheer design mimics the emptiness of space, where the X-wing is at its best, shooting down TIE fighters. Don't forget your astromech droid co-pilot! The black and white scarf is almost 4 feet wide by 6 feet high, making it versatile for folding over or wrapping around your whole body. It's a stylish accessory to the standard issue Rebel fleet uniforms, and it will remind you to always stay on target.Product SpecificationsStar Wars X-Wing Fighter Art Deco Lightweight ScarfOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseFilters the light of the Tatooine sunsFor all members and supporters of Red SquadronGreat for keeping the sand out of your face on Tatooine or JakkuPattern features X-wing fightersAnd geometric art deco designMaterials: 100% polyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Hang to dry.ImportedDimensions: 44"" wide x 72"" high"

column1: Star Wars Dark Side Tattoo Lightweight Scarf,"Fashion even Vader would love

column3: Darth Vader is not really known for showing off much skin with his fashion choices. Which is a good thing for everyone, we think we can all agree, right? Tattoos wouldn't really be a possibility or... desirable. If you were to get a peek at his skin do you think it would have any tattoos? Maybe he would have Emperor Palpatine's face in a heart on shoulder? Or he would have Anakin loves Padme on his chest? Get your own tattoos inspired by the world of Star Wars without a single needle with this lightweight Star Wars Dark Side Tattoo Scarf. This 100% polyester scarf is great for a windy day but not heavy enough for a visit to Hoth. With a black background and a variety of Dark Side inspired designs, people are sure to know your allegiance. Product SpecificationsStar Wars Dark Side Tattoo Lightweight ScarfOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise Lightweight scarf is perfect for fashionFor those thinking about a Star Wars tattoo but not ready to commitIncludes images of the Death Star, Emperor Palpatine, Darth Vader, Boba Fett, a Stormtrooper, and moreMaterials: 100% PolyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash onlyDimensions: 44"" x 72"

column1: Star Wars BB-8 Blanket Scarf,"The Scarf That Everyone's After

column3: From the runways of Coruscant to the deserts of Jakku, everyone wants to get their hands on BB-8! This spunky little droid with a secret is so hot right now, junk bosses are willing to pay up to 100 rations to procure the perfect accessory. But even at that price, a scavenger like Rey won't part with BB-8 once he's by her side, and really, we can't blame her. BB-8 is loyal, friendly, and perfectly complements her desert chic look. (We also hear that he compliments it, but we don't speak binary.)Get your hands on the most sought-after accessory in the galaxy: this BB-8 blanket scarf! Woven with BB-8's white, grey, and orange stripes, with black circles for his holographic recorder, projector, and computer interface units. You'll be the envy of everyone when you wear it... just don't blame us if all of the attention brings the First Order to your doorstep. They just want this scarf for themselves! Product SpecificationsStar Wars BB-8 Blanket ScarfOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseBlanket-style scarf featuring BB-8 designWhite fringe on the ends Materials: 100% AcrylicCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry.ImportedOne size fits most humanoids and droidsDimensions: 24"" x 80"" (including fringe)"

column1: Atari 2600 Knit Scarf,"The quest for the Gold continues...

column3: So Winter Games may have been a Commodore 64 game from Epyx, but it was ported so many times (even to DOS!) most of us experienced it on a different system. Bobsled, ski jump, speed skating, biathlon, luge, slalom, and, of course, hot dog aerials. Thank you for not giving us Atari folks the unforgiving figure skating events. *hattip*This Atari 2600 Knit Scarf shows you're old school. Kids today get their fancy Ubisoft Steep Road to the Olympics. But back in our day we could win the gold with just a joystick and a single button. However, given our age, our lungs are also much more susceptible to pneumonia, so we're gonna bundle up in this scarf."

column1: Exploding Kittens Rainbow Ralphing Cat Scarf,"Hrnngggg!

column3: What goes down might come back up on your carpet... when you have a cat. So if your kitty decided that your beautiful rainbow scarf full of fun delicious yarn was too tempting to resist, don't worry. You'll get it back. Even if you don't want it back. Too bad!Straight from your Exploding Kittens card deck to your pretty, pretty neck, it's the Rainbow-Ralphing Cat! Vomiting up a beautiful spectrum of color so that you can have a nice accessory to wear? How thoughtful! And dangling from the end while you wear it is the pretty white kitty with large blank crazy eyes. Roll the scarf up nicely and shove it back in when you're done wearing it, so that kitty can live to vomit on your stuff another day."

column1: Star Wars Rebel Alliance Print Infinity Scarf,"Who you callin scarfy-lookin'?

column3: Star Wars has such exquisite world-building, we feel like we could live there. Life wouldn't be easy, mind you. But sometimes when the demands of the real world are weighing heavily upon us, we'd like to just wrap ourselves up in our favorite fictional universes and pretend that the real world doesn't exist.You can do exactly that with this Rebel Alliance Print Infinity Scarf. Part of the ThinkGeek Star Wars Collection by Her Universe, it's available exclusively at ThinkGeek. It features a print of blood red, midnight blue, and carbonite grey Rebel Alliance Starbirds. You know, the logo thing. We just had to use its proper name because we love the term ""Starbird."" Mmm. Starbird. We'll be over here, hunkered down in our scarf murmuring the word ""Starbird,"" thankyouverymuch.Product Specifications Rebel Alliance Print Infinity ScarfOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at Her UniversePart of the ThinkGeek Star Wars Collection by Her Universe A print of blood red, midnight blue, and carbonite grey Rebel Alliance Starbirds(There's also a very pale yellow in the ""empty space"" for those with great eyes)Perfect for a day at the senate or bumming around Mos EisleyInfinite, much like your love for Star WarsMaterials: 100% rayonCare Instructions: Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low.ImportedDimensions: 13"" wide x 41"" long (an infinity scarf, so it's 82"" of fabric looped)"

column1: Stitch Lightweight Infinity Scarf,"Style Experiment 626

column3: We get a little rowdy, when left to our own devices. Put us in a new place and we'll sniff around, taste the coffee, take over your bed, hit you with a pillow, touch your family photographs, pull on a dolly's head even though she's recovering from dolly surgery, and even destroy the art from your Blue Period. No more caffeine for us!But slip this infinity scarf over our head and onto our neck, and we'll suddenly calm down, drop, possibly even start purring. Maybe it's the soft, lightweight fabric. Or the darling pattern of Stitch and the dolly Scrump. Or maybe it stops us from wrecking everything we touch because it reminds us of home and ohana. Argh! Stop it! There's something in our eyes now! We're not crying, you're crying! Must find something to destroy...Product SpecificationsStitch Lightweight Infinity ScarfOfficially-licensed Lilo & Stitch merchandiseBlack infinity scarf with Stitch and Scrump doll patternKeeps your dog from destroying everything in your homeProvided your dog is actually an escaped illegal genetic alien experiment, that isMaterials: 100% PolyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry.ImportedDimensions: 22"" x 38"" tube (it's an infinity scarf so the 38"" is 76"" of fabric doubled over)"

column1: Marvel Spider-Gwen Convertible Headwear,"How can you help anyone without it?

column3: Maybe we love Spider-Gwen's outfit because it looks like something we might wear. Black Widow? Yeah. That black stretchy jumpsuit just isn't gonna work for us on a day-to-day basis. We had the same problem with Catwoman 40 years ago. Although 40 years ago, fewer people looked at us strange when we walked out of the house head-to-toe in costume. Be ready at any moment to not only fight crime as Spider-Gwen but also protect your secret identity by pulling this Marvel Spider-Gwen Convertible Headwear up over your face. ""Over your entire face"" isn't shown as one of the ways to wear this, but come on, people. It has EYES on it. This is Spider-Gwen's mask. Mind you, you can't see a thing when you pull this over your face (well, some shadows and shapes, but not clearly), so we recommend you use this when you're fighting evil that doesn't move much. An evil plant, maybe. Product SpecificationsMarvel Spider-Gwen Convertible HeadwearOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandise A ThinkGeek creation & exclusive There are like a billion ways to wear this (scarf, headband, beanie, balaclava)And that's just in Earth-616Web design in Spider-Gwen's magenta and blue with her eyes printed on one sideMaterials: 95% polyester / 5% spandexCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Dry flat. Imported Dimensions: 9 1/2"" wide tube x 25"" long"

column1: Binary HELLO Scarf,"""Hello, World!""

column3: More BASIC than a ""Hello, World!"" program, with no Assembly required, this scarf will encircle your neck with 1s and 0s, repeatedly spelling out ""Hello"" in binary digits, with each letter an 8-bit (1-byte) sequence.Manufactured using eco-friendly organic dyes, this infinity scarf is navy blue with yellow binary digits surrounded by a light blue border with an all-over print design. Its super-soft, stretchy fabric makes it a logical choice for wearing in all kinds of weather and air conditioning settings.Product SpecificationsInfinity Scarf with the word ""Hello"" in BinaryKeeps your neck warm with a greeting in the binary language of machine codeFor stylish, friendly computer programmersOr those who just like Base 2 numbersMaterials: 95% modal / 5% LycraCare Instructions: Machine washableImportedDimensions: 25"" x 12"" (doubled over)"

column1: One Heart Down Beanie and Scarf Set,"Keep warm for your health

column3: Staying healthy is the key to keeping yourself alive. Video game characters know this all too well. When that red heart gauge reaches zero, they die. For non-bitmap humans like yourself, this is more of a challenge. There might be a lot more factors at play in the real world, but we can still provide that gauge. Except, it's a little chilly outside, so you're already starting off one heart down. Sorry about that.Warm up by wrapping up in this One Heart Down Beanie and Scarf Set. Complete with three pixelated hearts, this hat and scarf both come preset to two red and one grey. Maybe if you put them on, you'll fill all three hearts? We're pretty sure that's not how this works, but we're going to pretend."

column1: AT-ACT Sun Walk Scarf,"Sand Rover

column3: You know when you think about it, the Star Wars storytellers gave the AT-ATs just about the two most challenging surfaces for walking: snow and sand. And the AT-STs only got two legs to work with. We do not envy the engineers for these imagined creatures whether rendered via CGI or IRL.You, however, should have no problem taking long walks along the beach wrapped in this AT-ACT Sun Walk Scarf. This peach and green diaphanous scarf looks great with your daily wardrobe, but we're saving ours to wrap around our bikini bottoms. This could just be the Seasonal Affective Disorder talking, but we're ready for the beach any day now. *packs SPF90*Product SpecificationsAT-ACT Sun Walk ScarfOfficially-licensed Rogue One: A Star Wars Story merchandise Makes the perfect geeky beach sarongMaterials: 100% viscose polyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Air dry.Imported Dimensions: 42"" x 72"""

column1: Star Wars First Order Art Deco Lightweight Scarf,"Sheer First Order Delight

column3: When you're a follower of the First Order but appreciate subtlety, you'll need an accessory such as the Star Wars First Order Art Deco Lightweight Scarf. This sheer scarf has an interconnected design that features the First Order insignia surrounded by art deco designs. The pattern is subtle enough that its Star Wars-relevance won't be obvious to everyone, but the right people will get it, and they will reveal themselves to you. The black and white scarf is almost 4 feet wide by 6 feet high, making it easy to double over in either direction for a thicker scarf, or it can be left open to cover a large area. It can also protect against the bright light of Starkiller Base's superweapon* or to hide your face from suspicious Rebels.  *Not really.Product SpecificationsStar Wars First Order Art Deco Lightweight ScarfOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandisePairs nicely with Stormtrooper armorEspecially Captain Phasma'sFor devout First Order followers and membersPattern features First Order insigniaAnd intricate art deco linesMaterials: 100% polyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Hang to dry.ImportedDimensions: 44"" wide x 72"" high"

column1: Star Wars Rey Hooded Scarf - Exclusive,"It's harsh out there for a scavenger

Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens introduced fans to Rey, the mysterious Force-sensitive young scavenger eking out a life for herself on the backwater planet Jakku. Before she encountered BB-8 and got caught up in all that Resistance hullabaloo, Rey was on her own. She had to find ways to protect herself, from the harsh desert climate and from other scavengers. She had her quarterstaff, and a few well placed friends/employers who valued her skills. She also had one killer scarf, with a hood and goggles - necessary when your primary means of transport is a homemade speeder cruising through hot, dusty terrain. So obviously we wanted our own hooded, be-goggled scarf because, you know, sometimes it's windy out and stuff. When we couldn't find one, we did something about it... by ordering the ThinkGeek exclusive Rey Hooded Scarf! Inspired by our new favorite soon-to-be-Jedi (don't leave us hanging, Episode VIII!), this 100% acrylic knit double-loop infinity scarf has a built-in hood for full protection from the elements. Cream-colored to match Rey's desert attire (""modern mummy""), the scarf also features a set of goggles buttoned to the hood. Sure, you can unbutton and detach them, but why would you? No scavenger worth their salt would turn down free goggles. Product Specifications Rey Hooded Scarf - ExclusiveOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveDouble-loop hooded infinity scarfProtects head, neck, even eyes from harsh conditionsGoggles detach from buttons on the hoodPerfect for protection from snow, sun, sand - all scavenging conditionsCapacity: holds at least one head and neck!Materials: 100% AcrylicCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry.Imported (straight from Jakku)Dimensions: 17"" tall at the hood. Infinity scarf is 54"" long total, 27"" long looped"
Zelda: Breath of the Wild Urbosa Chiffon Scarf,"Her movements resembled a beautiful dance

column3: Scarves are a great way to provide inexpensive variety to your wardrobe. You can use them to dress up a casual look or add a pop of color to a formal one. And, of course, if you buy them from us, you can use them to add a little fandom to an otherwise entirely corporate ensemble. This sheer scarf was inspired by Lady Urbosa, the Gerudo Champion who pilots the Divine Beast Vah Naboris in BotW. It's bright and colorful, just like our champion, and features the symbol of Vah Naboris in opposite corners. Honestly, if it weren't for that symbol, the bright colors and abstract design of this print could put this accessory in any closet.Product SpecificationsZelda: Breath of the Wild Urbosa Chiffon ScarfOfficially-licensed The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild merchandise From our friends at MusterbrandBright colors and abstract designFeatures the symbol of Vah Naboris in opposite cornersIntentionally frayed edges for a casual lookMaterials: 100% polyesterCare Instructions: Machine wash cold. Hang or lay flat to dry.Imported Dimensions: 47"" square"

column1: Sonic Characters Lightweight Infinity Scarf,"Another Ring to Catch

column3: More than 25 years after his first appearance, Sonic has come a long way since Green Hill Zone Act 1. Through the games, manga, and animated series, he's picked up quite a few friends (and foes) along the way. But through it all there will always be that main group, like a group of high school friends... and their bully.Keep your friends close - and your enemy just as close - to your heart with this lightweight infinity scarf featuring the iconic Sonic characters you know and love! Featuring an overlapping pattern of Sonic, Miles ""Tails"" Prower, Amy Rose, Knuckles, and yeah, Doctor Robotnik. At least if he's here, we know he's not out trying to take over the world again! All drawn in their original 90s style, it's a throwback to the early days of collecting rings and freeing helpless animals. Ah, the good ol' days!Product SpecificationsSonic Characters Lightweight Infinity ScarfOfficially-licensed Sonic the Hedgehog merchandisePattern of Sonic and friends (and Doctor Robotnik) Materials: 100% PolyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry.Imported Dimensions: 22"" x 38"" tube (it's an infinity scarf so the 38"" is 76"" of fabric doubled over)"

column1: SPACE Beanie and Scarf Set,"Space is cold

column3: We could say this is Saturn, but that's just because it's the planet whose rings we're most familiar with. But, of course, you're a smartypants, so you knew that Uranus, Jupiter, and Neptune also have rings. So the ringed planet represented on here could theoretically also be one of those or be in some other solar system entirely!Since planetary rings are made of rock and ice, it's probably wise to wear something soft and warm when hanging out nearby. Well, technically it's wise to wear a spaceship or at least a spacesuit, also, but we don't have either of those at our warehouse. So you'll have to make do with this SPACE Beanie and Scarf Set. Next best thing, we promise."

column1: Star Wars Rogue One Lightweight Scarf,"No, we don't mean ""Scarif,"" but thanks for the tip Google

column3: Generally these days when we talk about ""walkers,"" we're referring to a different franchise. But the original sci-fi walkers that moved slowly but terrified humans were the All Terrain Armored Transport (AT-AT) and All Terrain Scout Transport (AT-ST). And now you can drive one to work. Oh no. Sorry. ""Wear."" We meant ""wear one to work."" If you could drive one to work, we'd definitely need a bigger parking lot. On this Rogue One Lightweight Scarf you get both the AT-AT and the AT-ST so you have options. And it's in two neutral colors - grey and sand - so it basically goes with everything.Product SpecificationsRogue One Lightweight ScarfOfficially-licensed Rogue One: A Star Wars Story merchandiseGreat fashion scarf that doesn't scream ""Star Wars fan""Unless you're with another fanCovered with AT-ATs, AT-STs, Death Stars, Imperial symbols, and Star Wars logosIt's so huge you could actually hang it in a doorframe where you want a bit of privacy (but not too much)Bonus: If they read it from the other side, folks will think you're wearing a scarf that says ""TA-TA""Materials: 100% polyesterCare Instructions: Hand washImported Dimensions: 44"" x 72"""

column1: Beauty and the Beast Chip Lightweight Scarf,"Tea Cozy

column3: Maintaining innocence and cheer when surrounded by a sea of danger is Chip's lot in life, making this infinity scarf the perfect metaphor for our wider world. Whether you're looking to bundle up against the cold or hide your face from the glaring sun, this Beauty and the Beast Chip Lightweight Scarf is versatile enough to keep you warm or cool, while inspiring you to keep a smile on your face. Its infinity scarf configuration allows for countless ways to wear it - such as around your neck, over your head, or a little of both - no matter if your day takes you to provincial towns or gloomy castles. The scarf is made of sheer 100% polyester with a light blue background, and its foreground shows Chip sloshing, blowing bubbles, smiling, and laughing. Representing everyone's inner child and providing plenty of comic relief in Beauty and the Beast, Chip's never-ending curiosity makes him lovable. And we guarantee that this scarf won't turn back into a small boy when any curses you may have are lifted. Product SpecificationsBeauty and the Beast Chip Lightweight ScarfOfficially-licensed Disney's animated Beauty and the Beast merchandiseKeeps your neck and head warm in drafty castlesFilters strong, countryside sunshineAccessorizes with gowns or everyday apron dressesFor slightly imperfect dishware and those who love itMaterials: 100% polyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Line dry.ImportedDimensions: 20"" wide x 38"" long when doubled over (because it's an infinity scarf)"

column1: Geek Varsity Beanie and Scarf Set,"Warm and cool simultaneously

column3: Don't be shy. It's cool to be a geek these days, so don this set, and let it make you that much cooler - or warmer - depending on the semantics of the moment."

column1: Power Scarf ,"Get turned on

column3: Some mornings it can take a lot to make a person feel full of energy. Maybe your morning routine requires a workout, a hot shower, and an even hotter cup of coffee to get the energy coursing through your veins. For others it may just take the right outfit. You are sure to feel powerful when you put on this Power Infinity Scarf. This soft, stretchy infinity scarf features a repeating power button design. Wear it in your favorite style as you set out to conquer the world!Product Specifications Power ScarfInfinity scarf wraps around your neck for warmth and comfortPerfect for warm or cool weather wearingSuper soft, stretchy fabricMaterials: 95% modal / 5% LycraCare Instructions: Machine-washable.Imported Dimensions: 25"" x 12"" (doubled over)One size fits all"

column1: Infinity Gauntlet Lightweight Scarf,"Take up the Gauntlet

Fine, I'll do it myself. - Thanos, Avengers: Age of Ultron   Even the Dark Lord eventually finds out this the hard way: you want something done right, you gotta do it yourself.Thanos may have to wait until May 2018 when Avengers: Infinity War Part I is scheduled to be released to wield his gauntlet with the Infinity Stones in the MCU, but ThinkGeek has gone and pilfered a few of them (in our spare time), and you can wield this Infinity Gauntlet Lightweight Scarf today. You just gotta promise us you're going to use it to accessorize and not to blink out half the universe. k? k. Product SpecificationsInfinity Gauntlet Lightweight ScarfOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusive from the Marvel x ThinkGeek Gear Up Collection Gauzy rectangular scarf with foil accentsRepeating Infinity Gauntlet pattern with scattered Infinity StonesMarvel Comics label with gold threadMaterials: 100% polyesterCare Instructions: Hand wash, cold water. Air dry.Imported Dimensions: 70"" x 44"""
Minecraft Creeper TNT Scarf,"Oh the weatheroutsssSSSsside is frightful

column3: You don't have to get a new ssssskin to add this sssssscarf to your wardrobe. It's sssssure to protect your neck from the ssssnowssss, windssssss, and other cold weather phenomena. All while warning othersssssss away.This winter sssssscarf with SsssssSSSssssssses knitted into it and a TNT block patch at one end is ssssssure to keep you ssSsssafe in the cold."

column1: Zelda: Breath of the Wild Divine Beasts Scarf,"Simply divine!

column3: Scarves are a great way to provide inexpensive variety to your wardrobe. You can use them to dress up a casual look or add a pop of color to a formal one. And, of course, if you buy them from us, you can use them to add a little fandom to an otherwise entirely corporate ensemble. This Zelda: Breath of the Wild Divine Beasts Scarf is a ThinkGeek exclusive, part of the Breath of the Wild Collection by Musterbrand. This sheer scarf has prints of the divine beasts of Hyrule's famous champions Urbosa, Revali, Mipha and Daruk at the corners. But mostly it just looks like some sort of tribal pattern. column1: Crit Success D20 Belt and Wallet Gift Set,"Pick a little something up at Gnome Depot

column3: Sure, gold pieces may have inherent value, more than a piece of paper or plastic, but they're kind of complicated to carry around. When the Sacagawea dollar coins came out, we pondered bringing some with us to the Renaissance festival, but once you cover your obligatory turkey leg and your mead and your pointy princess hat with the tulle, you've got some serious mass hanging from your belt. Possibly enough to call for a new belt. Show off your D&D fandom with this Crit Success D20 Belt and Wallet Gift Set. The canvas belt features an oversized d20 buckle worthy of Wolowitz and the bifold wallet has a small metal d20 on front."

column1: Periodic Table Belt and Wallet Gift Set,"Periodically useful

column3: While we call this set ""periodically useful,"" we have to admit that keeping your money and your pants in place are pretty useful skills all the time. And if you've ever wanted to quiz yourself on the elements while paying for gas or putting your pants on, we have the ultimate gift set for you. This canvas wallet and belt set will help you remember the symbols for Astatine, Phosphorus, Cesium, Barium, Lead, Hydrogen, Lithium, Titanium, Aluminum, Fluorine, Helium, Beryllium, Argon, Nickel, Calcium, Potassium, Bromine, Indium, Carbon, Silver, Xenon, Radium, Francium, Radon, Gold, Sulfur, Gallium, Chlorine, Neon, Nitrogen, Magnesium, Sodium, Iron, Rubidium, Oxygen, Thallium, Zinc, Strontium, Krypton, Iodine, Ununseptium (now known as Tennessine - Go Vols!), and Tin. After all, who ever remembers that Sn = tin? Not us, that's for sure."

column1: Crescent Meown Bag Charm,"DO Let the Cat Out of the Bag!

column3: Curiosity will never kill this cat. It's pretty chill, just hanging around, clipped to your bag. The ThinkGeek-exclusive Crescent Meown Bag Charm will be your helpful, steadfast companion wherever you go. This adorable kitty cat charm has a cat face shape on one side and a puff ball on the other, where you can see the kitty ears peeking up above the fur. The fluffy side is purr-fect for cleaning the screen of your phone or tablet when it gets too many paw prints on it. Cat-astrophe averted! Made of faux leather and faux fur, with a metal clasp and charm, this feline friend can also be an ever-present fidget toy for restless kids and adults, and for those on the spectrum. Like many cats, this little black puff ball will claim you (and your bag) as its own. You can almost hear it meow and demand attention. But this one never needs to be fed, never makes messes, and won't set off your allergies.Product SpecificationsCrescent Meown Bag CharmA ThinkGeek exclusiveBlack cat hangs out with you while on your bagPerfect for use as a tablet or phone screen cleanerFor all cat loversAnd witches and wizards who need a familiarAttaches to your bag with a lever claspIncludes a metal circle charmMaterials: Faux fur, faux leather, and metalDimensions: Kitty face is approx. 3"" wideWeight: 1 oz."

column1: Chameleon Eraser and Pencil 4pc Set,"Change Your Mind

column3: Most people think that chameleons change their colors in order to blend into their surroundings and hide from predators, and there is some evidence of them doing it for that reason. But more often, the color-changing trick seems to be a form of showing off, in order to obtain a mate. Competing males will sometimes even throw down with a color-changing face-off. Yup, it's a color-change-off... it's a color-change-off. Whether you're heading back to school, drafting up some secret plans, or jotting down your score as a judge in a color-change-off, you'll appreciate this 4-pack of chameleon erasers and pencils. Featuring four smiling chameleon erasers atop tree-trunk design pencils, wrapped up like little lollipops (except these are not for eating). Perfect for your own use or they make a great gift for someone who loves to change their look and change their mind."

column1: #geekfamous Clutch Pouch,"Geeky glory, now with extra sparkle

column3: You already know we love to post pictures of ThinkGeek customers using our products, and that if you use the hashtag #geekfamous on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or Pinterest you'll have a chance to appear in our newsletter and win a $100 gift card. (see details)But not everyone else knows that you're #geekfamous. Now you can advertise it with this fabulous #geekfamous Clutch Pouch. It's perfect for a night on the town. It not only holds your essentials for a night out - your phone, your wallet, your keys, your business cards, your dice, but it also makes a great makeup case or pencil pouch. It's sort of the multitool of bags. Score."

column1: Minecraft Creeper Gloves,"We got your gloveSsssSSsSsss...

column3: Retro-graphics. Simplistic gameplay. Minecraft takes gaming back to basics. Punching trees and rocks or digging tunnels, you slowly gather an arsenal of weapons and tools to fend off the spiders, skeletons, zombies, and exploding Creepers that are a constant threat. The exploding Creeper is our nemesis. We know you feel our pain. Protect your hands from random explosions by wearing creepers on your hands. We know it's not the most intuitive thing, but sometimes a good offense is the best defense. Protect yourself from both cold weather and angry mobs in these Minecraft gloves."

column1: Sloth Eraser and Pencil 4pc Set,"Slow Down, Avoid Mistakes

column3: You might think it's a bad idea to stick a sloth atop a pencil, considering that sloths are herbivores that consume small twigs, and pencils are, well, just small twigs with some graphite in them. But given the speed that sloths move at, and the fact that it can take them up to month to digest a meal, the sloth on the end of this is no match for even a hand-cranked pencil sharpener. So no worries about these little sloths eating up your writing utensil! Anytime soon, anyway. Whether you're heading back to school, drafting up some secret plans, or just jotting down a quick note about sloth eating habits, you'll appreciate this 4-pack of sloth erasers and pencils. Featuring four silly sloths (with four different expressions and speech bubbles) as erasers atop tree branch pencils, wrapped up like little lollipops (except these are not for eating, not at any speed). Perfect for your own use, or they make a great gift for someone who really likes to take their time."

column1: Yuri!!! on ICE Pouch,"You Set My Heart On Fire

column3: Open up your heart and be entranced by the world of... men's figure skating? You may have no idea what qualifies as a Lutz, a Salchow, or a toe loop, but once you're under the spell of Victor Nikiforov, Yuri Katsuki, and Yuri Plisetsky, it won't even matter. From rivals trying to interpret different meanings of love for the Hot Springs on Ice, to the tense drama of the Grand Prix Finals (where we're not even sure who to root for anymore), we're dazzled. And not just because the costumes are all so sparkly. Though, it helps. So shiny...Carry these three skaters with you everywhere you go with a pencil pouch featuring adorable chibi illustrations of Victor, Japanese Yuri, and Russian Yuri against a winter-themed background. The trio are dressed to the nines in their skating costumes (well, technically, those are all Victor's skating outfits), blades on their feet, ready to skate into your heart. You'll find their names and silhouettes on the back and a lobster clasp hangtag of the show's logo on the zipper, so you can take it off and Yuri-ify anything else in your life. Fill up the little pouch with all of your hopes and dreams, because you were born to make history!Product SpecificationsYuri!!! On Ice PouchOfficially-licensed Yuri!!! On Ice merchandisePencil case featuring Victor, Japanese Yuri, and Russian YuriOf course, you can use it carry other things than pencilsLike dog treats for your poodle, matching rings, or your phoneBut probably not pork cutlet bowls, as that would be messyPerfect gift for your skating coach, or someone else who sets your heart on fireFront features chibi versions of Victor, Yuri, and Yurio in their skating costumesBack shows the 3 characters in silhouette with their namesYuri!!! On Ice logo hangtag on the zipper attached with a lobster clasp, so you can use it elsewhere, tooMaterials: Polyester and acrylicDimensions: approximately 7 1/4"" x 4 1/2"" x 3/4""Ages 15+WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age"

column1: My Melody Striped Pen Pouch ,"Let us pencil you in

column3: The act of writing is still considered an art form in Japan. Over here in the U.S., it is increasingly less and less common, but that doesn't mean there aren't those of us who still love quality pens and pencils. Part of what comes with writing being so prevalent in Japan is that they produce all sorts of excellent accoutrements for it, such as the latest stand-up pencil pouch craze. The bag is created with a gusset in the bottom, so you don't have to lay the bag across your desk - it stands up like a pen cup, which makes it easier to select the tool you're looking for. When you're done, it flattens out so you can tuck it into your binder or purse. We'll admit that we're a bit addicted to these. At home, we have our manicure set in one, and our makeup brushes, eyeliners, mascara, lipliner, and glosses in another. It's excellent for basically any small tool set you need to have around.Product SpecificationsMy Melody Striped Pen PouchOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandise Has My Melody's face embroidered on one side on a pink and white striped design with a hot pink interiorMy Melody's bow and ears are dimensional!A pen / pencil case with a gusset that allows it to stand upKeep all your favorite writing instruments with you wherever you goDouble-zipper design allows easy, yet secure, accessProTip: When you have it standing, fold back the top to make it easier to grab whatever you needAwesome for makeup, tooGreat for any small tool setDimensions: 8 1/4"" (at tallest) x 4 1/2"" wide (at widest) x 3"" deep (when open)"

column1: Once Upon a Time Evil Queen Mirror Pin,"You wanted to see your queen?

column3: One of our favorite villains, the Evil Queen, is sexy, sassy, powerful, conflicted, and more than a little misunderstood. She is one of us, if we had dark magic, access to an endlessly lavish wardrobe, and her figure, that is. The life of a villain can be lonely, but the Magic Mirror is her faithful servant, granting her the ability to see and travel through mirrors.  The Once Upon a Time Evil Queen Mirror Pin is a 3"" diameter metal pin with a 1"" diameter mirror in its center. Give it to the one you consider ""the fairest of them all"" or wear it yourself to channel your inner Evil Queen.For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel. Product SpecificationsOnce Upon a Time Evil Queen Mirror PinOfficially-licensed Once Upon a Time merchandisePerfect for villains, fans of OUAT, and anyone looking for their happy endingMaterials: Hypoallergenic, lead-free and cadmium-freeImportedDimensions: 3"" diameter pin with 1"" diameter mirror Comes in a box suitable for giftingGenie of Agrabah not included"

column1: Fantastic Beasts Percival Tie and Pin Set - Exclusive,"Make Wearing a Tie 100% More Magical

column3: As the Director of Magical Security at the MACUSA you could say that Percival Graves is a bit of a stickler for the rules of the wizarding world. The same can be said for the rules of fashion. Percival is never caught looking anything less than dapper in a three-piece suit with his tie expertly tied and propped up with his signature scorpion pin collar bar. Now fans of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them can sport this high-class look any day of the week with this Percival Tie and Pin Set. Modeled after the tie worn by Colin Farrell in the upcoming film this set includes a tie and two scorpions attached to make a collar bar. The scorpions have black bodies and green rhinestone heads.For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel.Product SpecificationsFantastic Beasts Percival Tie and Pin SetOfficially-licensed Warner Brothers' Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them merchandise Set is a ThinkGeek exclusive This tie makes you look fantasticA great gift set for any dapper-dressing wizardScorpion pins have black bodies and green rhinestone heads with bobby pin style clips on back for attaching to the collarMaterials: Tie is 100% PolyesterDimensions: 58"" long and 3 1/2"" wide (tie)Ages 14+"

column1: Atomic Belt and Wallet Gift Set,"The next small thing

This is a belt worthy of our favorite Wolowizard. Although we're not sure if he ever wears the old atomic model featured in the show's logo as a belt buckle. That might just be too self-referential even for The Big Bang Theory.

Whether you're a fan of atoms or the show, this belt and wallet set are sure to make you feel positive, just like a proton. The strap of the belt is decorated with the planetary version of the atomic model, and the buckle is an oversized atomic model. The wallet has a small metal atomic model on front to remind you that your wallet, your pants - well, everything physical - is made up of atoms."
Little Twin Stars Striped Pen Pouch,"Let us pencil you in

column3: The act of writing is still considered an art form in Japan. Over here in the U.S., it is increasingly less and less common, but that doesn't mean there aren't those of us who still love quality pens and pencils. column1: Yuri!!! on ICE Folding Mirror,"Ready for the Kiss and Cry

column3: You've practiced your short program and your free skate, endlessly. Your costumes are picked out, pressed, and every last sequin and crystal is in place. (Though you could always use more sequins. Never enough!) You've been waiting for this moment forever. But wait just a moment longer - are you ready to take to the ice, and then face the Kiss and Cry, and get your score? Better take just a moment to prepare yourself. Maybe just a momentary check in the mirror, to catch your breath. Compose yourself now, because there will be waterworks!Your favorite anime figure skaters are here as adorable chibi illustrations, on these little Yuri!!! on Ice folding mirrors. Featuring artwork of their Nendoroid likenesses, you can get your choice of Viktor Nikiforov, Yuri Katsuki, or Yuri Plisetsky. Perfect for any time you want a little motivation from your idol - just let the cuteness wash over you, then flip the top open to reveal the next big skating star hiding inside: you!Product SpecificationsYuri!!! on Ice Folding MirrorOfficially-licensed Yuri!!! on Ice merchandise Folding mirrors featuring chibi illustrations of Yuri!!! on Ice charactersChoose Viktor Nikiforov, Yuri Katsuki, or Yuri PlisetskyPlastic case folds open to reveal the mirror insideMaterials: Plastic and GlassDimensions: approximately 4 1/2"" long x 3 1/2"" wide x 1/4"" thick (when closed)"

column1: Betsey Johnson Kitsch Kiss Me Till Ice Cream Wristlet,"Just Desserts

column3: You know when you're eating an ice cream cone on a hot day, and you can't eat it too fast because duh - brain freeze - so it starts melting? And then it drips down to your wrist so you're trying to lick that off and accidentally stick your nose in it, and meanwhile it just keeps melting all over you? Well, this bag is way less messy than that.  For starters, the only thing that will touch your wrist is the pink and white striped wrist strap. Also, it won't melt. This confection from Betsey Johnson only looks like a cold, creamy treat - and boy does it do it well! This little faux leather delight simulates a waffle cone, and the ruffles on top look like vanilla soft serve. Beaded detailing recreates sprinkles and, yes, melting ice cream drips. Along the cone is a zipper with a candy charm on the tab, revealing a slip pocket fully lined with rosebud fabric. And the cherry on top of this sweet little bag? There is literally a cherry on top! Product Specifications Betsey Johnson Kitsch Kiss Me Till Ice Cream WristletThe perfect cherry on top of your perfect outfitAlso there is a cherry on top of the bag!Beaded details recreate sprinkles and melting ice cream dropsSlip pocket with zipper closure - and a candy charm on the zipperInterior is fully lined with rosebud-printed fabricCapacity: All the essentials, other than actual ice cream. Well, you could try... but that would be messy.Materials: faux leather with ruffled grosgrain ribbon embellishmentDimensions: 12"" tall x 5"" diameter at widest"

column1: Museum of Gudetama Print  Pouch,"Art deggo

Gudetama, everyone's favorite lazy egg, is featured in their own art exhibit on this ThinkGeek-exclusive Museum of Gudetama Print Pouch. Posing in replicas of famous paintings - such as The Scream, The Mona Lisa, The Milkmaid, The Birth of Venus, and even a painting of ""Elvis"" on black velvet - they are immortalized on the striking red wall of this cracking good gallery. The paintings are well lit and are cordoned off from anyone hungry getting too close.

This little Museum of Gudetama Print Pouch is perfect for stashing your makeup, your charging cables, or your art supplies to create your own masterpieces, inspired by Gudetama. It's more of a pencil case, but you could store little tempera paints in it, and then you'd have egg on it and in it. And possibly all over it. nm. Probably shouldn't put paint in there."
Star Wars Admiral Ackbar Coin Bag,"Only a trap for coins

column3: You can see here the coin bag, orbiting the around the human. Although the weapon systems are not yet operational, it does have a strong defensive mechanism, known as the zipper, to keep all coins protected. The defensive mechanism must be deactivated if any coin retrieval is to be attempted.Keep all your coins safe inside this coin bag modeled after Admiral Ackbar. The bag is made of faux leather. No womp rats were bullseye'd to create this purse, and no Mon Calamari gave their lives.Product SpecificationsStar Wars Admiral Ackbar Coin BagOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseCoin bag that looks like Admiral AckbarInner lining is the Star Wars logoYou know how it closes? It's a ... zipper, dangitMaterials: Faux leatherCare Instructions: Spot clean with damp clothImportedDimensions: 4 1/2"" x 5 1/4"""

column1: Pusheen Glitter Graphic Cosmetic Bag,"Lookin' cute!

column3: Did you realize Pusheen has a fragrance? ""I'm a Unicorn Eau de Toilette."" Smells like flowers and apples. We were sorta expecting cupcakes and doughnuts. But we'll take it. After all, we pretty much smell like cupcakes and doughnuts every day.This little sparkly bag is ready to hold all your fabulous makeup supplies. Or your fabulous pens and pencils. Or other fabulous small items. The only requirement is fabulousness, which we know you'll have no problem with."

column1: Lilo and Stitch Coin Bag,"Meega Nala Kweesta!

column3: Aliens attacking your house again? Maybe they're after your shiny coins! But those are for the coin-op ""Space Adventure"" rocket in front of the supermarket. To keep your coins safe and secure, you need a bag that can defend itself. Something that won't die. Something sturdy... like a lobster! No, wait, do you have a lobster door on your house? Nope. That won't work. There's no one better in the galaxy to hold your coins than Stitch! Shaped like Experiment 626's head, with appliqué facial features and two big notched ears on the side, just unzip the top of his head (he won't mind) and keep your coins, lip balm, flash drive, or other small items safely inside. No one will dare mess with your stuff with this monstrosity guarding it.Product Specifications Lilo and Stitch Coin BagOfficially-licensed Lilo & Stitch merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflyShaped like Stitch's head with appliqué facial features and earsZipper topMaterials: faux leather (no genetic experimentation here!)Dimensions: approximately 7 1/4"" wide x 5 1/2"" high (with ears)"

column1: Sanrio: Aggressive Retsuko Calm/Rage Coin Purse,"The Worst Case of the Mondays

We can totally relate to Aggretsuko. Yes, it's true that we here at ThinkGeek World Domination HQ have benevolent overlords now ('sup boss?), but most of the monkeys working here did time elsewhere in the corporate world first, shuffling around TPS reports, watching the clock, and hiding from annoying coworkers. This particular copywriting monkey once served in an office where coworkers asked her daily about sportsball, and upon finding out she was a geek, if she had ""ever gone to one of those conventions where people dress up as cartoons."" *headdesk*  When the office life has got you down, you can start polishing the old résumré (yes, we've got openings here), or you can vent your frustrations with a stiff drink and some heavy metal at the local karaoke bar. Por que no los dos? Just like Aggretsuko can be both a mild-mannered and dedicated office worker and a hardcore heavy metal karaoke rage monster, you, too, can have it all! Retsuko's calm side on the front, her angry aggressive rage face on the back, and a cute fluffy tail zipper on the compartment to keep your change and other small stuff in. Remember, Monday means only five more days till the weekend!   Product SpecificationsSanrio: Aggressive Retsuko Calm/Rage Coin PurseOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at LoungeflyCute/angry Aggretsuko keeps your coins and tiny stuff safePerfect gift for your favorite cog in the corporate machineryAdorable calm red panda face on one side, angry rage face on the otherFluffy tail zipper pullZipper top closureMaterials: Polyester fibers. All new material.Dimensions: approximately 6"" wide (at the widest point) x 4 1/2"" tall (at the tallest point), tail is approximately 5"" long x 2"" wide (at the fluffiest point)"
Lilo and Stitch Scrump Coin Bag,"Pretend a Bug Put Coins In Her Ear

column3: Oh, are you showing off coin purses? We have one, too! This is Scrump. We made her ourselves. (Okay, well, our friends at Loungefly did, really.) Isn't she beautiful? But maybe in trying to hold all of our coins we made the head a little too big, so we pretended that a bug laid eggs in her ear and now she's upset because she only has a few more days to... oh you know what? There's a zipper. We can just do zipper surgery and take those bug eggs right out! All better.Ohana means family, and family means no one gets left behind, not even Scrump! Especially not Scrump. With those bug eggs safely extracted from her head, there's plenty of room in here now for those coins, lip balm, a flash drive, or any other small items you need to keep safe. And with the zippered top our coins are safe, and surgery to remove them is always a cinch.  Product Specifications Lilo and Stitch Scrump Coin BagOfficially-licensed Lilo & Stitch merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflyShaped like Scrump's head with appliqué and embroidery facial features, bow, and hairZipper topMaterials: faux leather Dimensions: approximately 5"" wide x 7"" high (with hair)"

column1: Star Wars R2-D2 Mini Backpack Keychain,"Beep-pack bloop-pack

column3: We love us some Artoo. He's a droid that just keeps on giving despite how hard the task is. You need the lil' guy to help you blow up a moon-sized battlestation? No problem. Shut down a trash compactor? You got it. Deliver ridiculously important information to the Rebel forces? Consider it done. We aren't saying this keychain can do all of those things, but we aren't saying it can't. Only one way to find out.Keep R2-D2 with you wherever you go with this mini backpack keychain. This mini version may not be able to hold a full-sized lightsaber, but he'll still look cute as all get out dangling from your bag.Product SpecificationsStar Wars R2-D2 Mini Backpack KeychainOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseMini backpack R2-D2 keychain for your normal-sized backpackZip-up compartmentKey ring and tiny carabiner-style claspMaterials: Simulated leather Dimensions: 3"" wide x 4"" tall x 1 1/2"" deep"

column1: Star Wars BB-8 Mini Backpack Keychain,"Yes, it can hold a lighter

column3: Take Artoo, turn the sassy dial to 11, and you have BB-8. We love us some BB-8. So much, in fact, that we now have a little BB-8 backpack, to go with our actual backpack. Star Wars-ception. We certainly wouldn't turn down an opportunity to take the lil' guy wherever we go. We could always use a little more Beebs in our life.Transport your BB-8 in mini backpack form with this fancy keychain. Always keep BB-8 by your side very much like how Rey did in Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Just, instead of rolling around, you'll be toting him around on your bag. It's as cute as it sounds.Product SpecificationsStar Wars BB-8 Mini Backpack KeychainOfficially-licensed Star Wars: The Force Awakens merchandiseMini backpack R2-D2 keychain for your normal-sized backpackZip-up compartmentKey ring and tiny carabiner-style claspMaterials: Simulated leather Dimensions: 3"" wide x 4"" tall x 1 1/2"" deep"

column1: Gudetama Vegan Leather Tote with Coin Bag,"Don't put all your eggs in one tote bag

column3: Actually, don't put any eggs in tote bags. Tote bags are really not the ideal way to transport breakables.You know, if it weren't for you, Gudetama wouldn't go out at all, so it's a good thing he's on this tote bag. You know when the weather's beautiful out, but you're all, ""meh,"" but you have to go out for something, and then you perk up as soon as you set foot outside and breathe in the fresh air? Yeah. That's probably not going to work in this case, but good luck with that.This canvas bag features the embroidered face of Gudetama and his little arms reaching out of a white faux leather shell. He's even sunny side up on the included coin pouch. ""Sunny"" being a relative term.Product SpecificationsGudetama Vegan Leather Tote with Coin BagOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandise From LoungeflyFeatures white faux pebbled leather shell with embroidered Gudetama face Gudetama sunny side up coin purse with top zipper clips in placeYellow and white ""polka dot"" pattern inside (some of the dots are eggs)Inside pocketMaterials: Canvas and simulated leather Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergentImportedDimensions: 15 1/2"" wide x 18 1/4"" tall x 3"" deep tote, 5"" across coin purseWARNING - ENTANGLEMENT HAZARD. column1: Little Twin Stars Striped Pen Pouch,"Let us pencil you in

column3: The act of writing is still considered an art form in Japan. Over here in the U.S., it is increasingly less and less common, but that doesn't mean there aren't those of us who still love quality pens and pencils. Part of what comes with writing being so prevalent in Japan is that they produce all sorts of excellent accoutrements for it, such as the latest stand-up pencil pouch craze. The bag is created with a gusset in the bottom, so you don't have to lay the bag across your desk - it stands up like a pen cup, which makes it easier to select the tool you're looking for. When you're done, it flattens out so you can tuck it into your binder or purse. We'll admit that we're a bit addicted to these. At home, we have our manicure set in one, and our makeup brushes, eyeliners, mascara, lipliner, and glosses in another. It's excellent for basically any small tool set you need to have around.Product SpecificationsLittle Twin Stars Striped Pen PouchOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandise Has Lala's face embroidered on one side on a purple and lavender striped design with a purple  interiorHas Kiki's face embroidered on the back!A pen / pencil case with a gusset that allows it to stand upKeep all your favorite writing instruments with you wherever you goDouble-zipper design allows easy, yet secure, accessProTip: When you have it standing, fold back the top to make it easier to grab whatever you needAwesome for makeup, tooGreat for any small tool setDimensions: 8 1/4"" (at tallest) x 4 1/2"" wide (at widest) x 3"" deep (when open)"

column1: The Byte Phone Wristlet by Pixelle,"Grab a byte

column3: You have a busy lifestyle. You don't have time to be switching all your stuff from one purse to another to match your outfit and/or occasion. That's where this Byte Phone Wristlet by Pixelle comes in. When you're doing your daily traipsing around, it fits comfortably into your standard purse as a wallet. When you go out for that night on the town, it doubles as a convenient wristlet, which already has all your stuff in it. Slip a key in there, pop on the included wrist strap, and you're ready to go. One minute it's a wallet; the next it's a wristlet. Transmutation at its finest right there. Our Byte Phone Wristlet by Pixelle features a fashionable, repeating pattern of sprites in neon colors: 8-bit swords, hearts, robots, flasks, and books - basically all our favorite things. Colorful and quirky, this wallet / phone case combination comes in black faux leather with plum lining, strap, and chromed hardware or white faux leather with hot pink lining, strap, and goldtone hardware. Like a complete armor set in an RPG, it coordinates with the other items in the line and levels up your already epic style.Product Specifications The Byte Phone Wristlet by PixelleA ThinkGeek creation & exclusiveAvailable in black faux leather with plum lining, strap, and chromed hardware or white faux leather with hot pink lining, strap, and goldtone hardwareFashionable repeating pattern features sprites: 8-bit swords, hearts, robots, flasks, and booksPhone compartment fits iPhone 6 and has cutouts for unencumbered access to your home button and cameraIt's NOT proprietary - the clear section is 5"" high x 2 11/16"" wide, so if you can basically see your phone screen in that space, it'll work for youOpposite side of phone compartment is one oversized piece of elastic, so it'll accommodate most phones and casesSee-thru ID slot with thumb assist + 5 additional card slotsBill-sized pocket behind card slots Zipped outer closure6"" long wrist strap attaches/detaches with secure carabiner-style hardwareMaterials: 100% polyurethane, leather-texture exterior + 100% polyester satin liningCare Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent ImportedDimensions: 4"" tall x 7"" wide x 1"" deep"

column1: Gummy Vandal Clutch,"In Beary Blue

column3: Street artist WhisBe (short for ""What is Beautiful"") created his Vandal Gummy series of gummy bear mug shots to make people think about innocence lost and question, ""Well, what did the gummy bear do?"" Of course, we also look and think, ""Mmm... gummy bears... where can I get a bag of gummy bears right now?""Throw some cash or cards into this clutch and bounce on down to your local gummy vendor to pick up some of the chubby, chewy little bears. The pop art design kinda reminds us of a certain internet Flash series from the early 2000s (the one that wasn't for small children or big babies). In bright berry blue with the lightning bolt tribute to David Bowie from the art piece, it's got room inside for your everyday essentials (and maybe a few of those delectable gummy treats). A detachable wrist strap keeps it close it hand when you need a little sugary pick-me-up, with a cool crystal shaped zipper pull because Bowie has to have his glam. Product SpecificationsGummy Vandal ClutchBear-shaped wristlet clutch with David Bowie tributeZipper closure with custom crystal-shaped zipper pullDetachable wrist strap with lobster claspDimensions: 8.75"" x 7.1"" x 0.9"" thick"

column1: Rugrats Reptar Bar Pouch,"Won't Turn Your Tongue Green

column3: What's chocolatey, nutty, caramelly, full of green stuff that's swirled and stirred and beaten and sweetened and sweetened 'til you can't stop eatin'? Reptar Bars! The candy bar supreme that turns your tongue green! Duh. You already knew that. Anybody but a dumb baby already knows that!Store your Reptar Bars in 90s nostalgia style inside this Rugrats Reptar Bar Pouch! The outside looks just like the shiny packaging of a Reptar Bar, but made all the more shiny by being totally glitterific vinyl. Is the inside all ooey gooey? Only if you fill it with green caramel. Which we don't really recommend. But still, this pouch is the superest, the duperest, the double-chocolate-scooperest way to tote around your stuff!Product SpecificationsRugrats Reptar Bar PouchOfficially-licensed Rugrats merchandiseFrom our friends at Danielle NicoleGlitter vinyl pouch in the style of classic Reptar Bar packagingTop zip closure - gold hardware with blue glitter zipper pullMaterials: PolyurethaneDimensions: 11 1/4"" wide x 5 1/4"" high x 3/4"" deep"

column1: Star Wars: The Last Jedi BB-9E Coin Bag,"BB-9E Reporting For Spare Change Duty

column3: If you thought BB-8 was cute, just wait until you get a look at the First Order's answer to the plucky little droid that got away: the BB-9E looks just like BB-8's evil twin. Except they forgot to give it a little goatee and a moustache to twirl. Or maybe those are inside one of the tool bays? At least they didn't choose the original name for this unit: BB-H8.BB-8 may be able to protect a secret map for a little while, but we know from experience that he'll spill the beans to the first group of so-called heroes that come along. If you want your small stuff to be really secure, give it to a BB-9E unit. The menacing red eye and black-and-grey design will keep any of that Resistance scum from getting at your spare change. Good job, BB-9E. Product SpecificationsStar Wars: The Last Jedi BB-9E Coin BagOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseFrom our friends at LoungeflySimulated leather coin purse in the shape of a BB-9E droidZipper closureSplit key ring and metal claspStar Wars logo pattern fabric interiorMaterials: Simulated leather and metalDimensions:Droid: 5 1/2"" tall x 4 1/4"" wide (at the widest)Coin Pocket: 4 1/4"" diameter"

column1: Betsey Johnson Kitsch Kiss Me Till Ice Cream Wristlet,"Just Desserts

column3: You know when you're eating an ice cream cone on a hot day, and you can't eat it too fast because duh - brain freeze - so it starts melting? And then it drips down to your wrist so you're trying to lick that off and accidentally stick your nose in it, and meanwhile it just keeps melting all over you? Well, this bag is way less messy than that.  For starters, the only thing that will touch your wrist is the pink and white striped wrist strap. Also, it won't melt. This confection from Betsey Johnson only looks like a cold, creamy treat - and boy does it do it well! This little faux leather delight simulates a waffle cone, and the ruffles on top look like vanilla soft serve. Beaded detailing recreates sprinkles and, yes, melting ice cream drips. Along the cone is a zipper with a candy charm on the tab, revealing a slip pocket fully lined with rosebud fabric. And the cherry on top of this sweet little bag? There is literally a cherry on top! Product Specifications Betsey Johnson Kitsch Kiss Me Till Ice Cream WristletThe perfect cherry on top of your perfect outfitAlso there is a cherry on top of the bag!Beaded details recreate sprinkles and melting ice cream dropsSlip pocket with zipper closure - and a candy charm on the zipperInterior is fully lined with rosebud-printed fabricCapacity: All the essentials, other than actual ice cream. Well, you could try... but that would be messy.Materials: faux leather with ruffled grosgrain ribbon embellishmentDimensions: 12"" tall x 5"" diameter at widest"

column1: Black Magic Spellbook Billfold - Exclusive,"That old black magic has us in its spell...

column3: Systems of currency require that we all agree to live within the same fiction. Not that we all agree to carry the Triganic Pu or Rupees, mind you, but that we all agree that this piece of paper (or coin or string of zeroes and ones) can be exchanged for a specific but varying amount of real-world value. Where are we going with this? Money has always existed somewhere in the liminal space inhabited by books and magic, so it's no surprise that here at ThinkGeek we've chosen to represent it as both with our Black Magic Spellbook Billfold. Stash your cash in what looks to be an old-fashioned leatherbound book with arcane symbols on the cover but is actually a billfold. It conveniently fits into most purses and also features a wrist-strap so it can function as a standalone clutch. And with 15 total card slots and 6 bill slots, you can fit plenty of your agreed upon fiction in here just fine."

column1: Spellbook Billfold,"Celebrate the magic of reading

Books are a uniquely portable magic. - Stephen King   Whether or not you believe in witchcraft, you have to admit that on more than one occasion, you have been enchanted in the act of reading. Books transport us to somewhere else. They give us insight into someone else's life. They offer us another world. When you have a good book with you, you are rich. And in this book, you can keep your riches, literally. The Spellbook Wristlet is a compact tome which aims to help you convey your belongings. It has a see-thru ID slot and 14 additional card slots, one for each library card with a few left over for credit cards. The other section is a zipped and divided pocket, perfect for bills, bookmarks, and the little tchotchke and talismen we all gather along our journey. We hope yours is magical."
Convertible Wallet-Purse of Holding,"Bigby's Convenient Clutch

column3: Over the years, you guys have had lots of feedback about our Bag of Holding line, so we decided to open it up to a few new form factors. Try them out. Let us know what fits your lifestyle and how you use them. We'll keep the ones you like, revamp the ones we could make better, and drop the ones you don't like into the fires of Mordor. Likeyado.""Convertible Wallet-Purse of Holding"" is a clunky name for a very useful item. This item is a set of two billfolds, which can be used individually or together, both of which have D-rings for the included shoulder strap to turn them into a purse. They snap together, if you so desire, between them providing 15 card slots, 3 zip pouches for coins (or whatever), 3 bill areas, a large pocket (for smaller phones or notepads) and a smaller one for chapstick or a thumb drive (a few Moo cards slide right in perfectly). Choose to carry one or both - whatever the situation calls for. And carry them as a clutch or a shoulder bag. We're all about the versatility here."

column1: Bob's Burgers Louise Bunny Skull Zip Wallet,"We don't appreciate your lack of sarcasm
I’m having a seizure! Put a wallet in my mouth!
It passed.
– Louise, ""Crawl Space""

Good thing, too, because it'd be super gross to put this wallet in your mouth. Mostly because it's covered with pink fuzzy stuff. But don't worry. It's 100% man-made stuff. No ground up adulterous pink cows involved here.

Celebrate the superior character from Bob's Burgers, Louise, with this wallet that has a bunny skull applique sewn onto one pink fuzzy side. The zip-around closure on this will make it extra hard for a magician to slip your card in there, but the eight slots leave plenty of room for your ID, your parents' credit cards, and your gun license. Congrats."
Game of Thrones Jon Snow's Wallet - Exclusive,"Be the Watcher on the Wall-let

You know nothing, Jon Snow. - Ygritte   Longclaw, the signature weapon of Jon Snow, isn't the kind of gear you take to work, unless you're a member of the Night's Watch. (Spoiler alert: You're not!) Instead, carry Jon Snow's Wallet, featuring Longclaw's refinished direwolf handle. This ThinkGeek exclusive will be your stalwart companion on the Wall or in your cubicle. Like Jon Snow, the direwolf strikes fear into its enemies, so your wealth is guarded - unlike too many parts of the Wall. This bold vegan leather wallet is debossed with HBO's Game of Thrones logo, and features seven pockets: four card slots, two sideways pockets, and one billholder slot. That's one feature for each of the 7 Kingdoms, so we're sure it'll be enough for your needs. Unless maybe you're a Lannister.Product SpecificationsJon Snow's WalletOfficially-licensed HBO's Game of Thrones merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveFor safeguarding your currency4 card slots + 2 sideways pockets + 1 large billholder slotGame of Thrones logo debossed on the insideMaterials: Vegan leather and nylonCare Instructions: Hand wash with damp cloth and mild soap to clean surface. Air dry only.Dimensions: 3 1/2"" tall x 4 1/2"" wide when closedAges 14+"
