Product SpecificationsMarvel Spider-Gwen Convertible HeadwearOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandise A ThinkGeek creation & exclusive There are like a billion ways to wear this (scarf, headband, beanie, balaclava)And that's just in Earth-616Web design in Spider-Gwen's magenta and blue with her eyes printed on one sideMaterials: 95% polyester / 5% spandexCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Dry flat. Imported Dimensions: 9 1/2"" wide tube x 25"" long"

column1: Minecraft Enderman Mob Snapback Cap,"Here for the staring contest

column3: We all like to think we're the protagonists, but sometimes you just have to be the bad guy and you know it. Got bad news to deliver to your friends? Wear this hat. Everybody's going to have to come in on Saturday? Wear this hat. Your favorite Minecraft server's down? Definitely time for this hat. You know, it's funny. Luring an Enderman into the sunlight turns it neutral. Luring a Minecraft player into the sunlight turns it hostile. But maybe it won't be so hostile if it's sporting this stylish cap to keep the sun out of its eyes."

column1: Zelda: Breath of the Wild Daruk Beanie Cap,"Daruk's Protection is now ready to roll!

column3: Daruk doesn't get a lot of love. But if we had to pick a Champion to hang out with on the weekend? We're picking Daruk every time. He's fun. He's crazy. And he's so dang jovial. We're taking him with us next time we go to Vegas. Wait, no. That might not be a great idea.This hat may not be an impenetrable barrier, but it will keep some of the cold out. A knitted beanie, it has the symbol of the Goron embroidered on the front. Also, it won't protect you from falling from great heights. Just so you know.Product SpecificationsZelda: Breath of the Wild Daruk Beanie CapOfficially-licensed The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild merchandise From our friends at MusterbrandKnitted beanie in tan and brownSymbol of the Goron embroidered on the frontMaterials: 100% acrylicCare Instructions: Hand wash. Hang or lay flat to dry.Imported One size fits most adults"

column1: Minecraft Creeper Pom Beanie,"Free Hugsssssss

column3: There are those people who express their happiness through physical contact. They're so happy to see you, they bound up and hug you. And then there's the rest of us, who'd prefer to express our happiness at arm's length.This Creeper Pom Beanie warns folks that, like a Creeper, you have the potential to explode at any moment, so they'd best stay back if they know what's good for them. Wouldn't want anyone to get hurt, now, would we?"

column1: Atari Black Katakana Flat Brim Cap,"Personal Headwear System

Ready Player One may be a 2018 movie, but this hat reflects a simpler time. A time when Space Invaders was the pinnacle of gaming awesomeness. A time when E.T. got buried in the desert.   Remember old-school gaming with this Atari Black Katakana Flat Brim Cap. It's perfect whether you're fighting centipedes in the garden or riding an oversized chicken into battle.  Product Specifications Atari Black Katakana Flat Brim CapA ThinkGeek exclusive 6-panel baseball cap with black stitched eyeletsPlastic adjustable snapbackAtari logo embroidered on frontAtari in Japanese characters printed under the brimBack embroidery reads ""Old School Gamer"""
Bob's Burgers Kuchi Kopi Cap,"How are you, Mr. Bob?

column3: Kuchi kopi has seen a lot of wear and tear over the years. Most notably a lot of tear from the oven. That was a thing. We don't recommend you try and put this hat in the oven. It'll go about as well as the real thing in the show.The Bob's Burgers Kuchi Kopi Cap features Kuchi Kopi, pre and post oven treatment, in a ying yang pattern in the center of the hat. Snapback design to adjust for comfort."

column1: Kingdom Hearts Kairi Bow,"Your Lucky Charm

""Somewhere out there, there's this tree with star-shaped fruit. And the fruit represents an unbreakable connection. So as long as you and your friends carry good luck charms shaped like it, nothing can ever drive you apart. You will always find your way back to each other. An unbreakable connection."" - Aqua, Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep   The kindhearted and brave young Kairi manages to always remain cheerful and upbeat, no matter what dangers the kids from the Destiny Islands encounter. For a bit of that trademark Kairi optimism and a dose of good luck, we offer you this hair bow to wear and remind you of your friendships. In shades of pink, white, and black, with cutouts to mimic Kairi's zippered dress, it also has a star-shaped Wayfinder charm just like the one that Kairi made for Sora in Kingdom Hearts. May it always bring you luck and bring you back to the friends you hold dear.Product SpecificationsKingdom Hearts Kairi BowOfficially-licensed Kingdom Hearts merchandisePink, white, and black bow inspired by Kairi's zippered dressKairi's Thalassa shell Wayfinder charm at the centerAlligator clip backDimensions: bow approximately 4 3/4"" wide by 3 1/2"" tall (at tallest point), Wayfinder (star charm) is approximately 1/2"" wide (at widest point) by 1/4"" tall with a 1"" chain WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age"
GeNiUS Periodic Cap,"The periodic table confirms it

column3: As long as you're human, technically you're mostly oxygen, carbon, hydrogen, nitrogen, calcium, and phosphorus. But the chemical symbols for those don't really make a word. What's an OCHNCaP? Well, we guess it could be a good label for a on you wear while surfing. But we digress.Now germanium, nickel, uranium, and sulfur? That's a combination we can really get behind, GeNiUS. And what better place to display it proudly than on your head, where you store all your smarts?"

column1: Kingdom Hearts Paopu Hair Clip Set,"Destinies Braided Together

""Have you heard about the legendary power of the paopu fruit? They say if you share it with someone you really care for... it binds you together forever and ever through eternity! It's so romantic. I gotta try it sometime."" - Selphie, Kingdom Hearts   Whether you want to intertwine your destiny with a special someone forever and ever, or you just find the whole idea as romantic as Selphie does, you simply gotta get your hands on this Paopu Hair Clip Set. Use them to hold back some of that awesome Square Enix hair you've got, or hang onto one and share the other with someone that you really care for.Product SpecificationsKingdom Hearts Paopu Hair Clip SetOfficially-licensed Kingdom Hearts merchandiseSet of 2 hair clips featuring the yellow paopu fruitSnap clips keep your hair securePerfect gift for the special someone you want to entwine your destiny withMaterials: 100% MetalDimensions: approximately 2"" wide at widest point of the star (leaf to point)WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age"
ThinkGeek Galaxy Snapback Cap,"Comet Me, Bro

column3: Though the nearest galaxy outside our own is about 2.5 million light years away (M31, or the Andromeda galaxy for those of you without a Messier Catalog list), here's one galaxy that's within reach. Keep the sun out of your eyes while you wait for the next star party with this astronomy-themed hat. It is written in the stars that this ThinkGeek exclusive men's six-panel ThinkGeek Galaxy Snapback Hat can be yours. It shows off an all-over galaxy image along with an embroidered ThinkGeek logo on back. It has black eyelets and underbrim, and is 100% polyester. Its snapback is adjustable for a custom fit. One size."

column1: Narwhal Beanie,"If You Can't Be A Unicorn...

As the saying goes, Always Be Yourself... Unless You Can Be a Unicorn. But let's face it - anytime someone in the Middle Ages brought home a ""unicorn horn"" for their king to make a throne out of or whatever, it was really a narwhal tusk. And when we say ""tusk,"" we mean tooth, because that's what a narwhal tusk (and therefore, every ""unicorn horn"") really is. Which has to be the Tooth Fairy's most-sought-after prize. Sorry, TF, for putting those boring and weird human canines under our pillows. If we could have been narwhals, we could have done better by you.  So why put on a regular old thinking cap when you could be sporting a narwhal beanie instead? Soft and fuzzy with two big black narwhal eyes and (of course) a big twisty narwhal tusk/tooth protruding out the front, you're one step closer to being the unicorn of the sea."
Superman Logo Strapback Cap,"Just part of the costume

column3: Back during the original animated series of Superman in the early 40s, Clark Kent could be seen wearing a fedora. As far as blending in goes, probably a solid fashion choice at the time. We are a far cry from the 1940s, though. We need to update his wardrobe just a tad, and a baseball cap is darn good start. Plus, no one is going to expect you to wear a hat with your own logo on it. It's the perfect disguise! Well, that and a good pair of glasses.The Superman Logo Strapback Hat features the classic blue color and Superman logo. Heroes and heroines come in all shapes and sizes, so the back is adjustable for a comfy fit. Rep one of your favorite comic book heroes while you do your best to blend in with the common folk."

column1: ThinkGeek Atom Snapback Cap,"All the Good Chemistry Jokes Argon

column3: The Atomic Age. The Rutherford-Bohr model of the atom. An atom's nucleus. Electrons. Whether this hat makes you think of chemistry, particle physics, or the second half of the 20th century, it has a place in your geeky wardrobe. The sun may be 93 million miles away, but everyone needs protection from it. This ThinkGeek exclusive men's six-panel hat is black with the ThinkGeek logo embroidered on the back and a yellow atomic model embroidered on the front, a symbol of the Atomic Age. Its snapback is adjustable for a custom fit. One size.Product SpecificationsThinkGeek Atom Snapback HatA ThinkGeek creation & exclusiveKeeps the rays from the nearest atom smashing machine out of your eyesFor those with sensitive eyes, bad hair days, or a job at a nuclear plantPairs well with a lab coat and safety gogglesGeiger counter not includedBlack six-panel hat with embroidered atom on frontEmbroidered ThinkGeek logo on backOne size, but has snapback to adjust the size"

column1: SPACE Beanie and Scarf Set,"Space is cold

column3: We could say this is Saturn, but that's just because it's the planet whose rings we're most familiar with. But, of course, you're a smartypants, so you knew that Uranus, Jupiter, and Neptune also have rings. So the ringed planet represented on here could theoretically also be one of those or be in some other solar system entirely!Since planetary rings are made of rock and ice, it's probably wise to wear something soft and warm when hanging out nearby. Well, technically it's wise to wear a spaceship or at least a spacesuit, also, but we don't have either of those at our warehouse. So you'll have to make do with this SPACE Beanie and Scarf Set. Next best thing, we promise."

column1: Constellation Flat Cap,"You're a star!

column3: Ah, the constellations. Without them, we'd be a bit lost. Well, mostly we'd be lost in the past. But even in the modern era once we travel out a bit from Earth, it'd be hard to give directions to the interstellar Uber to get us home. But even if we didn't need them to travel, we'd still love stellar formations.Keep looking up with this Constellation Flat Cap. Navy blue with white ink, it's covered with various constellations and asterisms as seen from the Northern Hemisphere. And it's a ThinkGeek exclusive, so if you want it, get it now."

column1: Donutella Headband,"Fueled by Sugar

Donutella comes from a planet where sugar is used as energy. One day while out scouting the milky way for a new fuel source in her donut U.F.O., Donutella discovered planet Earth. On Earth, Donutella was excited to find a lot of sweets and treats to fuel herself and her people. Almost instantly Donutella realized that it would be much better to start a sweet colony here and invite all of her friends than to go back home. - Donutella's backstory, tokidoki.it   You had us at ""donut U.F.O.,"" tokidoki. Okay, honestly? You had us at ""donut."" And ""sugar."" Is anyone else getting really hungry right now?A deliciously sweet headband for fans of tokidoki's Donutella character... or anyone whose mouth is watering at the thought of donuts right now. Wear it to complete a Donutella cosplay, or as the cherry on top of a sweet theme park outfit, or just because. Do you really need a reason to wear donuts on your head? We don't."
Star Wars Red Banner Beanie,"The Dark Side and the Light

Do you know what your place is in all of this? To fulfill your destiny, to become what you were meant to be, you will need to walk a path that is not so clear. You'll need someone to show you the way, but things still may not go the way that you expect them to. And for goodness sake, put a hat on - it's chilly out there in the far reaches of a galaxy far, far away!  Keep your head warm as you find your way through the path to the Dark Side - or the Light - with this Star Wars beanie. Featuring a red banner around the hat with both the insignia of the Resistance and the First Order, so you're covered no matter who wins. Embroidered on the folded edge is the logo for Star Wars: The Last Jedi. You know what they say about the second film in a trilogy, so be prepared for whatever comes with this warm acrylic beanie."
Kingdom Hearts Heartless Cap,"This goes with your eyes

column3: So if you're an Emblem Heartless your mileage may vary with this hat - after all, you might not have a head at all, let alone one that can accommodate a hat, depending on the world you're in. The one thing we can tell you, though, is that this black hat looks great with those gold eyes. This Kingdom Hearts Heartless Cap features the Heartless emblem in dimensional white embroidery on the front (it sort of drips down onto the brim in a really cool way). The side has the Kingdom Hearts logo, and the back features white embroidery of the Nightmare, Unversed, and Nobody emblems. Basically, you got all your bad guy bases covered."

column1: 8-Bit Rainbow Baseball Cap,"Color us happy

column3: We never played Rainbow Islands (either in the arcade or on the NES), but after reading about it we wish we had. Wait. We can drop a rainbow on a bad guy to kill him? Yes, please. We need that to happen in real life. Presumably this 8-bit rainbow leads to an 8-bit Asgard or has Super Mario coins at its base. But right now, it's on your head. Literally. This comfy, unstructured 6-panel black cap with black covered eyelets features a four color 8-bit rainbow embroidered on the front and has an adjustable strapback closure so even characters with those oversized 8-bit heads (we're looking at you, Mario) can wear it."

column1: Pusheen Cap,"The Inertia Is Strong With This One

column3: With this cap, you basically come equipped with a warning label: ""Today, I will move as slowly as a sloth on Xanax. I will have the motivation of drunken fruit fly. I will have the strength of a bacterium in a moldy petri dish."" But since the cap has Pusheen on it, you'll still look cute, even when you're too lazy to move, her default state."

column1: Beauty and the Beast Strapback Cap,"The true beauty is this hat

column3: Most of us here at the office are monkeys, so we'll be fine with accepting the role of beast. The difference is that we don't have a big library full of books (yet - we're working on it) or talking household items to help win you over. We do, however, have fantastic taste in hats. Ones that are subtle and amazing, like this one here. We won't hide it away in the forbidden west wing, either. So bonus points on that one.The Beauty and the Beast Strapback Hat comes in black and features a single red rose right in the center. On the back are the words ""I only date beasts."" A hat so good even Gaston would agree with us. And no one wears a hat like Gaston.Product SpecificationsBeauty and the Beast Strapback HatOfficially-licensed Beauty and the Beast merchandiseBlack hat with red rose front and center and ""I only date beasts"" along the backHas strapback to adjust the sizeMaterials: 100% cotton Care Instructions: Hand wash only. Hang or lay flat to dry.ImportedDimensions: 7 1/2"" x 2 3/4"" brim"

column1: Shark Attack Cap,"Chomp!

column3: Taking a shark out of the ocean and plopping it on your head may seem like a bold new fashion statement, but there are a few risks involved. Most notably, some very pointy and bitey risks. We've found a way to still make you a trendy fashion icon, while not having to worry about the sharp bits.Wear a shark on your head! No, not a real one, but a hat that looks like one. This grey hat features a fin on top with a particularly angry looking shark on the front. We wonder why it's mad. Maybe because we plucked it out of the ocean and used it to cover our head."

column1: Vader Oversized Pom Beanie,"No. I… Am Your Beanie

The circle is now complete. When I left you, I was but the learner. Now I am the master. Perfect for rounding up scruffy-looking Nerfherders on Hoth, this dark grey beanie hat with a furry pom on top includes an embroidered Darth Vader flanked by two stormtroopers. Even if you're only part of the Dark Side because of the limited winter daylight hours where you live, stay cozy warm while making your way back to your own personal Death Star.Product SpecificationsVader Oversized Pom BeanieOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseKeeps your head warm in the cold, blustery monthsFor any Star Wars fan with a head that needs to stay warm (which is hopefully all of you)Embroidered design (on one side)Materials: 100% acrylicImportedDimensions: 17"" circumference"
Forest Fairy Gold Hair Comb,"Capture your tresses

Out of this wood do not desire to go: Thou shalt remain here, whether thou wilt or no. I am a spirit of no common rate; The summer still doth tend upon my state - Titania, A Midsummer Night's Dream, Act III, Scene 1   Even the fairy queen can have a bad hair day. And when she does, she binds her unruly locks with this golden comb graced with foliage. It twists her hair in place like a climbing vine, not to let go until she gives the word.Wear your hair up with this fairy-inspired gold hair comb. Of the forest, it overflows with gold leaves of either ivy or perhaps maple - we could not decide, so we'll let you choose the one that suits you best. It's perfect with an updo for a special event or just to wear while traipsing through the woods at your next SCA event or Renaissance festival.Product SpecificationsForest Fairy Gold Hair CombDecorated with sculpted leaves1 1/2"" long tines on the comb (16 of them)Materials: Gold-plated brass Care Instructions: Avoid contact with water. Clean with a soft cloth.Made in BrazilDimensions: 4"" wide x 4"" tall Weight: 1.4 oz."
Geek Varsity Beanie and Scarf Set,"Warm and cool simultaneously

column3: Don't be shy. It's cool to be a geek these days, so don this set, and let it make you that much cooler - or warmer - depending on the semantics of the moment."

column1: ThinkGeek Constellation Snapback Cap,"We Are Sirius About This Hat

column3: Connect the night sky's tiny pinpoints of light, and we get constellations. This is how many ancient civilizations made sense of the stars, developing elaborate backstories and personalities for all their convoluted patterns. Now you can have many of the constellations on the bold ThinkGeek Constellation Snapback Hat. See if you can find your favorites! This ThinkGeek exclusive men's six-panel hat is black with green stars and constellations mapped out, along with the ThinkGeek logo embroidered on the back. Its snapback is adjustable for a custom fit. One size."

column1: Fairy Queen Gold Circlet Hair Jewelry,"Crown royal

Enforst to seeke some covert nigh at hand, A shadie grove not far away they spide, That promist ayde the tempest to withstand: Whose loftie trees yclad with sommers pride Did spred so broad, that heavens light did hide - The Faerie Queene by Edmund Spenser   Let the shady grove protect your locks from storms with this Fairy Queen Gold Circlet Hair Jewelry to encircle your brow. Of the forest, it overflows with gold leaves of either ivy or perhaps maple - we could not decide, so we'll let you choose the one that suits you best. It's perfect to wear while traipsing through the woods at your next SCA event or Renaissance festival, but in a pinch you could wear it backwards as a laurel wreath for Latin club. Product SpecificationsFairy Queen Gold Circlet Hair Jewelry Decorated with sculpted leavesGold band has a gentle dip in the front1 1/2"" long tines on the comb (16 of them)Materials: Gold-plated brassCare Instructions: Avoid contact with water. Clean with a soft cloth.Made in BrazilDimensions: 7"" wide (adjustable) x 2 1/2"" tall Weight: 3 oz."
Zelda: Breath of the Wild Mipha's Beanie,"Is it still Shark Week?

column3: The Zora royals are hot. It's not just us, right? We feel a little weird admitting that about something with webbed feet and gills. But it doesn't hurt that they're so dang chipper and helpful. This Breath of the Wild Mipha's Beanie is a ThinkGeek exclusive, part of the Breath of the Wild Collection by Musterbrand. This hat won't restore all your health, but it will protect you from the cold. Knitted on the outside with a warm fleece interior, this beanie mimics the intricate designs of the elaborate silver jewelry on the sides of Zora Champion Princess Mipha's head. And it's much simpler than attaching silver jewelry to your own head, we promise.Product SpecificationsZelda: Breath of the Wild Mipha's BeanieOfficially-licensed The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at MusterbrandPart of the Breath of the Wild Collection by MusterbrandMimics the intricate designs of the elaborate silver jewelry on the sides of Zora Champion Princess Mipha's head.Knitted exterior with warm fleece interiorMaterials: 100% acrylic outer / 100% polyester liningCare Instructions: Machine wash cold. Hang or lay flat to dry.Imported One size fits most adults"

column1: Firefly Blue Sun Dad Hat,"Seen That Logo Somewhere Before

column3: Blue Sun is everywhere. Just try to escape that logo - everywhere you go in the 'verse, you'll still see it. On coffee cans, foodstuffs, billboards, posters, computer systems, biotech tools - heck, you might even catch the logo in the corner of a wave transmission, since they've got their fingers into the communication industry. Their reportedly long, blue fingers... what, don't tell us you haven't heard the rumors? Next you'll be sayin' you haven't heard the one about them putting subliminal messages in the Oaty Bars ads. If you can't beat 'em (and trust us, when it comes to Blue Sun, you can't), you oughta join 'em. With this strapping black cap featuring the ubiquitous Blue Sun logo, you'd fit in on just about any planet in the 'verse. Handy for those times when you really need to blend in with the local population. Not that a good, upstanding consumer of Blue Sun products would have any reason to be avoiding the lawmen, or anything like that. Product Specifications Firefly Blue Sun Dad HatOfficially-licensed Firefly merchandiseBlack baseball cap with 6 panelsFeatures the Blue Sun logo printed on the frontWearing this around River is not advisedAll black body with black brim Adjustable back strapOne size fits many adult humansImported"

column1: Weyland-Yutani Corp Baseball Hat,"Job Requirement: Ability to keep a cool head

column3: Do you love researching the unknown? Are you one of humanity's top minds? If so, we've got a place for you! Here at Weyland-Yutani Corporation, we pride ourselves on our ever-evolving research and development facilities. Protected by our state-of-the-art Combat Androids, humans just like you can now safely perform cutting-edge research on extrasolar planets while helping to set up civilization there. If you're willing to do whatever it takes to ensure humanity remains the elite species in the universe, you're ready for Weyland-Yutani. Apply today and score this keen baseball cap. Product SpecificationsWeyland-Yutani Corp Baseball HatOfficially-licensed Alien merchandise Baseball cap with 6 panelsFeatures the Weyland-Yutani logo embroidered on the frontAlien logo across the backAll black with coordinating black grommets Adjustable, snap-back closureOne size fits many humansAndroids and aliens, YMMVImported"

column1: Firefly Jayne's Hat,"Cunning, dontcha think?

column3: Anti-heroes are the best. You don't have to put up with the holier-than-thou attitude, and you get the same results in the end. Granted, the hero half of Jayne's anti-heroism is because the good guys pay better. And, for the town of Canton, because strongboxes are heavy ballast. Okay. So he's an accidental hero. This is good because it leaves him room to kick some ass when he needs to, without a second thought. Well, without much thought at all. That's what we love about Jayne. He's uncomplicated. That, and the hat. Gotta love the hat. Get yourself Jayne's iconic hat with this 100% acrylic option from QMx. It comes the familiar gold, orange, and red knit with a pompom on top and ear flaps because space can get cold. Also sometimes you don't need to hear all the crazies cap'n took on nattering on about ""hands of blue."" Put us right off our Fruity Oaty Bars, that will.Product Specifications Firefly Jayne's HatOfficially-licensed Firefly merchandiseOne size fits most adult humans in the 'VerseMaterials: 100% acrylicCare Instructions: Hand wash in cold water only. Dry flat.ImportedAges 14+WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age."

column1: Overwatch Team Player Snapback Cap,"Casual heroes

column3: You know how in superhero movies when a lead character is trying to lay low they always seem to have a hat on? Hard to imagine that would work for the majority of the Overwatch crew. We're not even going to touch on Winston. The point is, for most of us, this is a nice way to rep one of your favorite games in a casual fashion. If you're Genji, well, you can wear the hat, but don't expect to blend in.Be a snazzy civilian with the Overwatch Team Player Snapback Cap. This black hat features the Overwatch logo front and center. Wear it with pride when you're escorting the payload.Product Specifications Overwatch Team Player Snapback CapOfficially-licensed Overwatch merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveBlack hat with orange trim featuring the Overwatch logoSnapback style cap for easy adjustabilityTracer, as shown from the cinematic shot of the Overwatch team, under the brimMaterials: Hat: 80% acrylic / 20% woolBill: 100% cottonCare Instructions: Spot clean with damp cloth. Air dry.ImportedAges 14+"

column1: Deadpool Fuzzy Bunny Slippers,"Perfect for when you're reading the want ads or some comics

column3: Those Deadpool bunny slippers that were a Loot Crate exclusive? Yeah. We got 'em. Now they're apparently our exclusive. We're not sure how that works, but we think some of our merchant monkeys may be confused. But it doesn't really matter, does it, because LOOK DEADPOOL BUNNY SLIPPERS. Available here at ThinkGeek for the pure satisfaction of your tootsies. And ours have a white fluffy bunny tail on the back, because they're superior. (Maybe that's what's ""exclusive"" about them? We don't know. We do not get paid to understand. We only get paid to make with the monkey words.) But admit it. You do not need these. But you want them. Much like that last ill-advised chimichanga...."

column1: Harry Potter House Slippers,"6 of one, half a dozen of another....

column3: Some people are firmly in one House at Hogwarts. Gryffindor through and through. Or Slytherin to the end. Others of us might be a little in one camp and a little in the other. It's as if the Sorting Hat went, ""Ehhh. Come back to me later"" with us.Now you can literally have a foot in both camps with these Harry Potter House Slippers. They come as a pre-matched set, but if you're a bit of one House and a bit of another, buy two sets and wear one of each (and share with a friend). They're perfect for putting your feet up in the Common Room and then trekking the occasionally circuitous staircase to your room."

column1: NASA Astronaut Boot Plush Slippers,"You'll love these slippers to the Moon and back

column3: You know, we hadn't ever thought about it, but astronauts live out of their vehicles, don't they? Their vehicles just happen to be worth billions of dollars and not so much listed in the Kelly Blue Book. What's the current trade-in value on a shuttle anyhow? High mileage but kept in pristine condition.If you've got some Extravehicular Activity planned, such as hanging out on the couch, we'd highly recommend these slippers, inspired by the boots of NASA's astronauts. Much like NASA's EVA suits, these reflect the heat of the sun and are easily visible against the blackness of space. These do not, however, have a water cooling system. You'll have to get up and shuffle over to the thermostat for temperature control and to the fridge for drinks. Sorry."

column1: Rugrats Reptar Plush Slippers,"They're plush, they're mean, they'll turn your feet green!

column3: We can't promise you'll be able to stomp on skyscrapers while you wear these, but you'll at least be able to step on Lego blocks without feeling like you need crutches. That's a STEP in the right direction! Eh! Eh!? We'll see ourselves out....Be mean and green... and comfy! The Rugrats Reptar Plush Slippers feature Reptar's head, tail, and scales, but we promise these are much more cozy than actual scales. No-slip dots on the bottom for grip when you're stomping a city."

column1: Shark Plush Slippers for Grown Ups,"Gonna need a bigger closet

You know what we hate? Well, many things, but amongst them is the action of stubbing our toes. It's not like we didn't KNOW the thing was there. Somehow our brain just forgot to tell our foot. It makes us just want to kick the thing in retribution... gently. That's where these Chomping Shark Plush Slippers come in, because not only do they come with dimensional tail and fins, but the front of each features the gaping maw of a shark. You just gotta threaten whatever it is you stubbed your toe on with that toothy grin, and it'll be sorry.    These Chomping Shark Plush Slippers look just like Great White Sharks, and in order to wear them you must slip your foot deep into the sharks' bellies (accessed via the little known secret hatch behind every shark's dorsal fin). Will your feet emerge unscathed? Maybe. Will they be cozy and comfortable? Definitely!"
Plush Zombie Slippers,"Tasty Toasty feet!

Ever wake up in the morning and feel groggy and disoriented? Every morning? Don't worry, you're not alone. We'll admit to being zombies in the morning hours, which is probably why we schedule most of our important meetings for after lunch. As such, we thought it would be awesome to slip our feet into some Plush Zombie Slippers in the morning. If we're going to feel like zombies, we might as well dress the part, right? This pair of zombies is a little confused. Where are your brains again? Let them gently nom on your feet. Who knew being chewed on was so comfortable? Best of all, there's no right foot or left foot. Makes it easy to put 'em on in the morning when you have half a brain."
Anglerfish LED Light-Up Plush Slippers,"Light up your night

column3: We know what you're thinking - ""ThinkGeek, anglerfish are much more creepy looking, and have sharp and pointy teeth! These don't look scary at all!"" And to that we say... yep. We know that the real deal are far more menacing looking, but, trust us, your pets will thank you for not wearing the real thing around on your feet.Let the anglerfish keep your toesies warm on brisk mornings and frigid nights. The esca (AKA -  glowy ball) cycles through green, blue, red, and yellow lights. Don't worry, it will not lure in your pets to try and eat them. Well, the unclear antecedent kind of works out there, doesn't it? The pets may try to eat the esca, so be careful with that. But your pets are safe from the slippers' appetites themselves."

column1: Wonder Woman Knit Bootie Slipper,"Sandals don't work for every occasion

column3: The female in your life may not have been sculpted from clay, but in your eyes, she's a perfect goddess. Her toes will be perfectly protected thanks to the chunky knit construction and soft, warm, faux fur lining of these comfy Wonder Woman slippers. The non-slip molded TPX bottoms will grip the floor to help her practice her balance while kicking butt. She'll be wielding that godkiller sword in no time. Product SpecificationsWonder Woman Knit Bootie SlipperOfficially-licensed Wonder Woman merchandiseBlue and red booties with white faux fur lining and the Wonder Woman logoNon-slip molded TPX bottomsS/M fits U.S. women's shoe size 5-8; L/XL fits U.S. women's shoe size 9-12Materials: all man-made materialsImported"

column1: Orochi Dragon USB Heated Slippers ,"Legendary Foot Warmers

column3: Imagine this: Two dragons, not content with breathing fire, terrorizing lands, and fighting the storm god Susanoo, instead choose to use their power for good, using their innate (USB-powered) heat to keep your feet warm instead of burning down the local izakaya. Sounds ideal, yes? Now these dragons can be yours with this set of Orochi Dragon USB Heated Slippers. Based on the Japanese legend of the Yamata no Orochi, an eight-headed and eight-tailed dragon, this set's version is adorable and does not need to be slain. These Orochi dragons are plush with cute little stubby legs, wings, and tails, and also have horns and round teeth (and only one head and tail each). When plugged in they make your toes and feet extra toasty, perfect for cold, blustery days, or just for your average Tuesday."

column1: Captain America Winged Slippers,"What Cap wears around the house

column3: Sometimes when you're a super soldier you just wanna sit around the house in something comfortable. Body armor doesn't really work when you're ready to put your feet up at the end of a long day. But maybe you don't want to lose your iconic look. That's where this product comes in. It has the look of the first Avenger but still lets you wiggle your toes.These comfy slide slippers have Cap's shield embroidered on the toe and wings extending from the sides. With a padded sole, they're a great way to take a load off at the end of a long day defending America."

column1: NASA Microfleece Slipper Socks,"OMG! It's full of feet.

column3: Good morning, Dave. It's time to get up and face the day. Time to swing your legs out of bed and place them in your slipper socks. But not just any slippers will do, Dave. You need these NASA Microfleece Slipper Socks. Nothing else will do. Thus spoke HAL.NASA Microfleece Slipper Socks are black fleece with the NASA ""meatball"" logo on the toes.  Of course, these NASA Microfleece Slipper Socks are not for really exiting the atmosphere, because they are soft and plush. They'd just burn up. And that would be sad, Dave. Don't let them burn up, Dave. Just wear them on your feet, Da... Daisy... Daisy.. give me...."

column1: Batman Caped Uniform Slippers,"Perfect for dark nights

column3: Lots of us have jobs that are hard on our feet. If you work in the food industry, in retail, in nursing, you spend a lot of your time on your toes. And when you spend your nights leaping from roof to roof, that can also be hard on your feet. Sure, the Batmobile can get him places when Batman wants to avoid walking, but it's not as satisfying as doling out vengeance on foot.That's why after his shower Alfred brings Bruce Wayne these Batman Caped Uniform Slippers. They're soft with padded soles and, of course, a tiny cape. They're just what the podiatrist ordered. Well, that and some time off. But it ain't like that's happening."

column1: Rugrats Chuckie Plush Sneaker Slippers,"I don't know about this you guys

column3: You may be a little bit reserved about the crazy adventures your friends want to go on, but you're just trying to be the voice of reason. You've got a long life ahead of you - you can't be reckless day in and day out. Instead of doing crazy things, how about you just stick back at home and be comfy?Let Chuckie be your spirit animal with these plush sneaker slippers. Don't go on crazy baby adventures - stay home and stay comfy! These slippers look like Chuckie's iconic shirt. They even have functioning laces so you can adjust how snug they are, or let them be untied like he wore them!"

column1: Harry Potter Hogwarts Slippers,"Magical comfiness

column3: It doesn't take magic to conjure up some comfiness. A comfy chair, a good cup of tea, and a cozy pair of slippers are all you need. You may have to supply the former two, but for the slippers, we have you covered. Literally and figuratively. We don't even need a Hogwarts professor for this one. Though, if you have one on speed dial, let us know. We're still waiting for our owl.Get cozy with the Harry Potter Hogwarts Slippers and keep those feeties warm. These black slippers come with the Hogwarts crest right on them so you can remind everyone which school is the greatest for witchcraft and wizardry. Product SpecificationsHarry Potter Hogwarts SlippersOfficially-licensed Harry Potter merchandiseBlack slippers with Hogwarts crestChoose between Small (7/8 U.S. Men's shoe size / 9/10 U.S. Women's shoe size)Medium (9/10 Men's shoe size / 11/12 U.S. Women's shoe size)Large (11/12 Men's shoe size / 13/14 U.S. Women's shoe size)X-Large (13/14 Men's shoe size)No-slip dots on the bottom for gripOpen backMaterials: PolyesterCare Instructions: Spot wash with damp cloth and mild detergentImported"

column1: Narwhal USB Heated Slippers - Exclusive,"Unicorns of the sea

column3: As majestic as actual unicorns, these slippers feature the adorable narwhal. You may think such a creature is only legend, but to that we say nay. It lives way up North in some frigid waters, so it knows a thing or two about trying to stay warm. It's even willing to share those secrets with you. Make sure to say thank you.The majestic narwhal shares the secrets of warm feeties with you (even though it doesn't have feeties - it's super talented). A secret that people will swear you made up, but in fact is very, very real - much like the actual narwhal. Plug them in and heat them up."

column1: Pusheen Slippers with Tail,"Be Yourself, But with Warm Feet

column3: Pusheen is known for being adorable, and doing whatever she feels like doing. Whether it's eating, dressing up, playing, or curling up in a box, Pusheen lives the dream. Now you can wear these Pusheen Slippers from GUND next time you lounge around, relax, eat delicious food, or, you know, do anything that embodies the Pusheen spirit. Treat yourself to the soft material that hugs your feet. The slippers include embroidered details, whiskers, ears, and a tail at the heel, giving you two authentic Pusheen hugs, one on each foot. Plus, the outsoles provide more traction for when you're chasing the laser pointer across the floor. One size fits lots of adult humans, so slip on some Pusheen Slippers, complete with kitty tail, and curl up for a nap, bask in the sun, or sit in a box. Meow!"

column1: Harry Potter Plush Slippers,"Don't Wake The Fat Lady!

column3: When we solemnly swear that we're up to no good, the last thing we want is to get caught creeping down the halls of Hogwarts! Don't wake up the Fat Lady - get the Harry Potter Plush Slippers and pad your paws. This fabulous footwear features the signature Harry Potter glasses and lightning bolt scar, along with Gryffindor colors, and a soft, comfy, quiet insole. Shhh... she's snoring... maybe we can tiptoe past undetected... unless Filch is spying on us!"

column1: Unicorn Light-Up Slippers,"Trot About In Unicorns

column3: Why ride around on the back of unicorn, when you can walk around inside of two unicorns? Wait, that sounds gross. We promise, it's not. Not with these soft, fluffy unicorns right here. Their insides are squishy, but in a nice, plush slipper way - not in a weird way. Look, maybe we got off on the wrong foot here. No, wait, that's impossible! You can't get off on the wrong foot when your foot is inside a unicorn!Two soft, fluffy white unicorns to slip your feet into, with gold foil horns and rainbow manes, tails, and... lights! Rather than rosy pink cheeks, this dynamic duo of footholders both have rainbow LED light-up cheeks that will light your way, wherever you're headed. Probably to the kitchen, right? These are slippers, after all!"

column1: Guardians of the Galaxy Groot Slippers,"I am slipper

column3: The Dutch may be into wooden shoes, but we figured making slippers out of 100% Groot probably wouldn't be very comfy. We opted for polyester instead, which we're pretty sure Groot approves of as well. Get nice and comfy with a pair of Guardians of the Galaxy Groot Slippers. The open back slippers feature Baby Groot right on the front for extra cuteness. No-slip dots on the bottom to make sure you don't go anywhere when trying to stop Thanos. That would be embarrassing."

column1: Labyrinth 'Ello Worm Plush Slippers,"A friendly face for tired feet

column3: Of all the fantastical creatures Sarah encounters in Jim Henson's classic film Labyrinth, that adorable little worm is hands-down the friendliest. He greets her with a hearty ""'Ello."" He invites her in to meet the missus and have a nice cup of tea (though how she'd fit in a worm home, we'll never know). He may not know the way through the Labyrinth - he's just a worm, after all - but if she'd stuck around he could have pointed her straight to the castle. The whole movie would have turned out different if Sarah had just listened to the worm. Don't be like Sarah. Stop and appreciate the worm. Or, in this case, wear the worm - because now his friendly face is made for tired feetsies! These plush slippers are like supersized versions of that cute little critter, right down to the bobbing blue hair and red scarf. Whether your feet have been hitting the cobblestones of Jareth's maze or walking an office floor all day, he is the perfect cushiony new friend to help you relax. So say 'ello to comfort and remember: if a worm starts talking to you, pay attention! Or see a doctor. Depends on the context, really.Please note: No babies were sacrificed to goblins in the production of these slippers.Product SpecificationsLabyrinth 'Ello Worm Plush SlippersOfficially-licensed Labyrinth merchandiseSoothes aching feetsies after a long day of maze-wanderingBecause we all could use a dapper worm friend or two!Capacity: one tired tootsie per slipperNon-slip dots on the bottom Materials: 100% polyester fiber (outer). Made of all new materials.ImportedOne size - fits most adults up to men's size 12 Ages 14+WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age."

column1: Batman Sock Slippers,"Dunna dunna dunna dunna dunna dunna dunna dunna... slippers!

column3: While Batman is off protecting the people of Gotham City, Alfred Pennyworth is left to wander around Wayne Manor all by himself. He may be a tireless butler, but even he likes to take a load off at night, sit in a comfortable chair, slip on a comfortable pair of slippers, and warm his feet by the fire. Now you can channel your inner Alfred - or Bruce Wayne - with these slip-on Batman Sock Slippers. The black and white slippers have a roller print with the Bat Signal and phrases such as ""Dark Knight,"" ""Force of Good,"" and ""We are not afraid,"" and have ""Gotham City"" spelled out in glue print grippers on bottom. Product SpecificationsBatman Sock SlippersOfficially-licensed DC Comics merchandise Cozy sock slippers have easy on and off Perfect Christmas present for those cold Gotham City nightsRoller print micro cozy / glue print grippersChoose between Small/Medium (7-10 U.S. Men's shoe size / 9-12 U.S. Women's shoe size)Large/X-Large (11-14 Men's shoe size / 13-16 U.S. Women's shoe size)Materials: All manmade materialsCare Instructions: Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low or lay flat to dry. Imported"

column1: Aquaman Uniform Slippers,"Put your feet up after ruling 70% of Earth

column3: It hasn't been easy to be Aquaman all these years. ""Aquaman's not cool,"" they said. ""Swimming and talking to fish are lame superpowers,"" they said. And then Jason Momoa happened. And being Aquaman is cool again. Maybe the seven seas are your domain, but everyone can be more comfortable on land with these Aquaman Uniform Slippers. They have padded soles and no-slip dots on the bottom, helping you to stay upright. They do not, however, allow you to talk to your fish. Well, technically, you can talk to your fish all you want, with or without these slippers. Just don't let your roommate catch you."

column1: Harry Potter Hogwarts Moccasin Slippers,"Warm Foot Charms

column3: Old castles in Scotland? They're really quite drafty. Sure, you've got the ability to make a stream of warm air come out of the end of your wand, but you don't want to sit around all day, pointing your wand at your feet, do you? Especially not when that wand could be better suited magically stirring your hot chocolate, instead. Or when you need it to fight in a wizard's duel. Slide a nice warming charm onto your feet with a pair of these Harry Potter Hogwarts Moccasin Slippers. The fuzzy soft insides will keep your toes toasty without the need for any incantation. The napped faux suede outside is printed with the crest of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, making them all official-like, so you can get away with wearing them to class (at least, when Umbridge isn't running the show here). Plus, who can even see that they're slippers under those big black wizard robes, anyway? The rubber grippy bottoms will help you keep your footing, even if you need to make a quick escape from Argus Filch.Product Specifications Harry Potter Hogwarts Moccasin SlippersOfficially-licensed Harry Potter merchandiseBlack sueded slippers with a printed Hogwarts crest on the vamp of each oneThat's ""vamp"" as in the top front of a shoe or slipper - not a vampire on your footA vampire on your foot would violate paragraph 12 of the Ministry of Magic's Guidelines for the Treatment of Non-Wizard Part-HumansPerfect for the witch or wizard with cold feetChoose between Small (7/8 U.S. Men's shoe size / 9/10 U.S. Women's shoe size)Medium (9/10 Men's shoe size / 11/12 U.S. Women's shoe size)Large (11/12 Men's shoe size / 13/14 U.S. Women's shoe size)X-Large (13/14 Men's shoe size)Low-back slidesFuzzy faux-fur lined interiorRubber gripped bottomsMade from all man-made materialsImported"

column1: Constellation Slippers,"Can we call you twinkle toes?

We'd always been struck by the fact that so much time has passed since the light left the twinkling stars we see at night that many of them may no longer be in existence by the time the light reaches us. But with the new Cosmos, Neil DeGrasse Tyson changed how we look up into the sky. Every time we look up now, we imagine we're traveling back in time. It makes the stars less bittersweet.

Stars on your feet? Totally sweet. These navy blue slide slippers feature familiar constellations and asterisms. The soles are padded. We think they're perfect for that backyard ""camping trip"" to gaze at the stars. (And run back inside when you need to pee.)"
Twitchy Kitty Cat Paw Slippers with Sound,"SLIPPURRS. (See what we did there?!)

column3: Cat paws are a wonder of nature. They're shock absorbers. They're a set of sheaths for catweapons (claws). They impart pheromones via paw pads. And we haven't even talked about how awesome tiny cat toebeans are!With these Twitchy Kitty Cat Paw Slippers with Sound you can add an awesome pair of cat paws to your own human closet. These slippers make your feet look like a cat's, and when you walk, they take turns meowing and purring! Flip them over, and you'll see the cute pink paw pads on bottom are made from anti-slip fabric. So don these slippers, and curl up for a nap, bask in the sun, or feel complete impunity while knocking glasses off the table. You do mew."

column1: Marvel Loki Horned Slippers,"We're up all night to get Loki

column3: Think about it: would you rather be in Thor's shoes or Loki's? Now, they're both big shoes to fill, what with that demi-god thing and everything. With Thor you get to be an undisputed hero, but Thor's got massive amounts of responsibility. And a super-long lifetime to feel guilty about things he could have done differently. Like aiming for the head.That's why we hands-down pick Loki every time. See, if you're Loki, you get to actually put your feet up occasionally. Slide some comfortable slippers on, pop some popcorn, and let the world sort itself out while you stream the latest Netflix series. Or, you know, maybe create a little mischief."

column1: Nightmare Before Christmas Jack Slippers,"Gallumph through the pumpkin patch in comfort

column3: Whether you're checking every mausoleum or behind the cyclops eye, if you're going to be looking for the missing Pumpkin King, it might as well be in comfort. Trust us, it beats walking around with pumpkins on your feet. Don't ask.Wear around a pair of Jack Skellingtons on your feet. We promise they aren't made of bone, and that these will actually keep your feet cozy warm during Halloween, Christmas, or whatever other day of the year it happens to be."

column1: Deadpool High Top Sneaker,"Maximum effort

column3: You think it's easy looking this cool? Nope - it takes a bit of effort. Usually maximum effort. Look, it's hard getting out of bed in the morning. The least we can do is look good if we're going to go to the trouble of getting up before 11am. And looking awesome starts from the ground up - literally. You need a good pair of sneakers to start, and complete the look. Just don't go outside in just your sneakers. Unless you're Wade Wilson.Earn your crisp high-five with a pair of Deadpool High Top Sneakers. Whether you're hanging around the house or out for a night of debauchery, make sure you always look as good as Mr. Pool."

column1: Harry Potter Boy Who Lived Low-Top Sneakers,"Don't let the muggles get you down

column3: While these sweet kicks won't be permitted in your Muggle Studies or Care of Magical Creatures class, they are an important part of any young wizard's casual wardrobe at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Save the boring shoes for class, and climb into these comfy beauties during your off hours to complete your look.These maroon canvas CVO oxfords feature Harry's glasses and scar in a repeating pattern. The shoes have black laces and trim and white soles, perfect for casual Friday (or casual Anyday if you work from home or someplace relaxed like ThinkGeek)."

column1: Black Panther High Top Sneaker,"The most advanced sneaker technology

column3: With all the futuristic technology at their disposal, the nation of Wakanda has created a true masterpiece. Incorporating style, comfort, and functionality this snazzy pair of high tops will help even the mightiest king protect his homeland... or at least walk from place to place while looking awesome.Protect your homeland in style with the Black Panther High Top Sneakers. Grey and black high tops featuring the Black Panther logo on the side.Product Specifications Black Panther High Top SneakerOfficially-licensed Black Panther merchandiseHigh top sneakers featuring the iconic Black Panther symbol on the sideGrey and black with white laces White soleAvailable in U.S. men's whole sizes. Please see size chart for measurements, as they do run a bit small.(Add 2 to get the corresponding US women's shoe size - a men's 8 will fit a women's size 10)Materials: Faux leather outer Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent Imported Size TableNote that these are the measurements of the shoe, not the foot.  8910111213 Sole Length25.9 cm26.6 cm.27.2 cm27.9 cm29.5 cm29.9 cm"

column1: C-3PO Flats - Limited Edition,"Shoe or shoe not. There is no try.

Irregular Choice has always been out there with their footwear designs, but now they're so far out they're in a galaxy far, far away. Introducing the limited-edition Star Wars collection from Irregular Choice, which we're elated to be able to offer on ThinkGeek!Oh my! This pair of C-3PO Flats is the perfect protocol for your special event. They're black faux suede with Threepio's head jin gold applique on the toe and silver edge details. The heels are sparkly. Although they look and feel like leather, they're PU and fabric, so no banthas were harmed in the creation of these shoes. Product Specifications C-3PO Flats - Limited EditionOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise From the mad geniuses at Irregular ChoiceC-3PO's head in gold applique and black thread  on both toesThe word ""Star"" embroidered in gold on one heel (technically the counter) and the word ""Wars"" on the otherSilver edge dressing with glitter on the heel itselfIridescent inner (like a little secret only you get to enjoy)Louboutin ain't got nothing on these - they have full-color classic images on the soleThey paid attention to all the details - even the tissue paper is Star-Wars-inspiredMaterials: PU & black faux-suede fabricHeel height: 0.7"" (flats) Note: We know shoes are hard to buy online. Just to be sure to include all the bits that came with them so another fan can have the same joy you did unboxing them. Guardians of the Galaxy Baby Groot High Top Sneakers,"Not clogs

column3: Don't worry, these shoes aren't made of wood. That wouldn't be very nice to Groot. Also, that would be pretty uncomfortable. We've worn clogs once - never again. We still have nightmares about the blisters.High top sneakers featuring the face of Baby Groot on the side and Groot's name on the tongues. Dark brown with light brown trim."

column1: Captain America High Top Sneaker,"I can do this all day

column3: Looking good isn't just a morning thing. This is a marathon, not a sprint. You have to pace yourself so you can look just as good when you walk out of school or the office as when you first step through those doors in the morning. The Cap knows a thing or two about still bringing the heat after a good bit of time. Make sure you're looking pretty spry, even if you're an older fellow, with the Captain America High Top Sneakers. These red, white, and blue high tops feature the iconic shield we all know and love on the side."

column1: Wonder Woman Slip-On Sneakers,"More practical than sandals

column3: These Wonder Woman shoes are perfect for 2017. We've got a Wonder Woman movie forthcoming, and adult coloring books are huge. These shoes are both of those things mashed together. Basically, you get to have Wonder Woman Adult Coloring Feet. It's shoes and an art project, all wrapped up in one.The panel on the right shoe reads ""The queen could only watch as her beloved daughter left paradise for the harsh reality of the world of men."" The panel on the left shoe we initially thought was about her bracelets, but now we think it's probably referring to the Lasso of Truth since the last line begins ""speak only...."" In black and white, these shoes go with everything, but we're breaking out our Sharpies. We want to see how you choose to color them. Be sure to tag your photos #geekfamous so we can witness your artistic flair!"

column1: Wonder Woman Ladies' Lace-Up Sneakers,"No sharp edges

column3: Whether she is training with her fellow Amazons in her own realm, or forging a path in an unfamiliar world, Wonder Woman is a force to be reckoned with. In Amazonian attire or attempting to blend in elsewhere (""the sword doesn't go with the outfit!""), Princess Diana of Themyscira always lives true to her purpose. If that's not enough to make her a heroine, we don't know what is! Wonder Woman Lace-Up Sneakers are red canvas featuring golden accents that form the woven Wonder Woman symbol. The shoes have white soles, a red body and pull strap, black shoelaces, and silver eyelets. Product SpecificationsWonder Woman Lace-Up SneakersOfficially-licensed DC merchandiseChoose Small (women's shoe size 5-6), Medium (7-8), Large (9-10), or XL (11-12). Please note that these run a bit small so select your size accordingly.White soleMaterials: Canvas with rubber sole, black shoelaces, and silver eyeletsImported"

column1: Star Wars R2-D2 Flats - Exclusive,"Artoos for your artoes

column3: Irregular Choice has always been out there with their footwear designs, but now they're so far out they're in a galaxy far, far away. Introducing the limited-edition Star Wars collection from Irregular Choice, which we're elated to be able to offer on ThinkGeek!These R2-D2 Flats feature Artoo on the toe, superimposed over a starfield pattern that extends all over the outside. Irregular Choice produced these JUST FOR US, which makes us do a little dance rocking back and forth and beeping and booping happily. You can only find this pair of R2-D2 shoes on ThinkGeek. Get 'em before the Jawas do. column1: Misty Reins Unicorn Sneakers - Exclusive,"Let your fashion freedom reign

column3: Finding a unicorn, that is special. Finding two unicorns, that is exceedingly rare. Finding two unicorns that will follow you around all day? Now that is something astounding! What's that, you say? OMG, how did those get there!?!A ThinkGeek exclusive, these navy blue fabric Misty Reins Unicorn Sneakers from the mad geniuses at Irregular Choice feature a pair of white unicorns with multicolored, glittering manes. When worn, the unicorns face one another. Glittery pink, blue, and teal stars cascade down the side of the shoe. The insole is pink and purple and the sole is white rubber with a unique ice effect. Or possibly sugar glaze. column1: Winged Gladiator Sandals - Exclusive,"Hot wings, perfect for the summer months

column3: It's been a long time since you've had a vocabulary quiz, right? Here's a new word for you: talaria. Etymologically, it literally means anklethings. But apparently in ancient times there was only one time when you needed to talk about anklethings: when discussing Hermes or Mercury, depending on your native land, so ""talaria"" became the word for the god's winged sandals. And it still is today.Get your own pair of talaria, guaranteed to help you defeat Medusa.* These Winged Gladiator Sandals were specially made for us by our friends at Iron Fist, and they're a ThinkGeek exclusive. They come in both black and holographic and are 100% vegan. (Made from PU, not vegans.) These gladiator sandals feature a removable wing laced into the top 3 eyelets of the outer side of the pair, so when you stand with your feet together, it looks like your feet have sprouted tiny wings. Just don't let anybody send you on a floral delivery, k?* Note from ThinkGeek's Legal team: Not actually guaranteed to help you defeat Medusa. Product Specifications Winged Gladiator SandalsA ThinkGeek exclusiveFrom Iron FistChoose Black or HolographicAvailable in US ladies' whole sizes 5-11The wings can be bats, dragons, or your mythical beast of choiceGreat for ancient god cosplay or floral deliveryAlso good if you need to kill a GorgonRemovable wing laced into the top 3 eyelets - one on each sandal(Which means these can be plain sandals, and also that you can add wings to any of your other shoes that lace)Black wings are matte black on the front and pewter on the reverseHolographic wings are holographic on the front and matte black on the reverseMaterials: PU (Vegan leather)Imported"

column1: Unicorn Leather Sneakers,"Be the unicorn!

column3: We are all for science and facts, but there's also a place in the human psyche for myths and legends, like the magical unicorn. Whether it's the ever-elusive unicorn humans have known since antiquity, or the modern unicorn that deploys rainbows and sparkles with abandon (from you-know-where!), we love them both. We celebrate the unicorn because it's unique and beautiful, and in modern times, because it spreads love and acceptance. And glitter.These crazy Unicorn Leather Sneakers from the mad geniuses at Irregular Choice feature an iridescent white unicorn, with a dimensional horn, ears, and pink fluffy mane on the tongue. They have pink and gold sparkly outers with a tiny pocket on the outside of each shoe for a 20 dollar bill, a key, or some sparkly confetti. And because that isn't enough, the stars on the outside are glow-in-the-dark and the hot pink soles have an LED embedded in them that has step-activated rainbow blinking lights at two speeds. Subtle they are not."

column1: Night Sky LED Light-Up Heels,"Twinkle toes

Maybe you have our Twinkling Stars Skirt, and you were thinking, ""I need some fabulous shoes that can hold their own against the twinkling lights of this skirt."" Basically, we are here to solve your LED fashion dilemmas.    These Night Sky LED Light-Up Heels look great with our Twinkling Stars Skirt or almost anything. We probably wouldn't go out on a grocery store run and pair these with our Pusheenicorn Kigurumi, but you COULD. (And if you DO, we need videos, plz.)  Product SpecificationsNight Sky LED Light-Up Heels From the mad geniuses at Irregular Choice10 bright white LEDs on each shoe light up when you walkSparkly black upper with scalloped edgeFeatures a pair of handmade diamante bows on the toesResin sole with floral designMaterials: Glitter and fabric upper with velvety fabric lining and resin outsoleHeel height: 3 3/4""Batteries included Note: We know shoes are hard to buy online. If you wear them inside for an hour and realize they're rubbing you the wrong way, literally, return them for a refund or exchange them for another size. Just to be sure to include all the bits that came with them so another fan can have the same joy you did unboxing them. Kitty Cat Leather Sneakers,"Cat got your tongue?

column3: We happen to be experts in kitten shoes here. Not kitten heels, mind you. Or shoes FOR cats (Kitten Mittens!). Shoes with a cat theme. Our collection is currently down to half a dozen pairs, so we feel pretty confident in stating that generally cat-themed shoes come in two flavors: cat face on the toe or repeating cat pattern fabric on the shoe.Irregular Choice, of course, had to do it different. Because different is what they do. These sneakers have tongues that feature a fuzzy grey cat head with pink bow. The outside is made of sparkly pink and black with grey knitted fabric and accents of iridescent faux snakeskin. And because that isn't enough, the black soles have an LED embedded in them that has step-activated rainbow blinking lights at two speeds. Subtle they are not.We have one question: Since Irregular Choice is out of the UK, does that make her a British Shorthair? We'll be here all week, folks."

column1: Star Wars The Dark Side Flats - Limited Edition,"Shoe or shoe not. There is no try.

Irregular Choice has always been out there with their footwear designs, but now they're so far out they're in a galaxy far, far away. Introducing the limited-edition Star Wars collection from Irregular Choice, which we're elated to be able to offer on ThinkGeek! The Force is strong in this pair of Dark Side Flats. One features a Stormtrooper and the other features Vader, both superimposed over a colorful nebula pattern that extends all over the outside. There's white, black, gold, silver, pink, blue, and purple in the pair we have here, which means they basically go with anything. But they'd look pretty stellar with our Galaxy Leggings. Just sayin'. Toy Story Arch Enemies Light-Up Heels,"Shouldn't your shoe closet go to infinity... and beyond?
That wasn't flying. That was falling with style!
- Woody, Toy Story
We predict you will fall (with style) for these Toy Story Arch Enemies Light-Up Heels. Just don't fall IN them, k?

Reach for the sky in these platform heels from the mad geniuses at Irregular Choice. The name comes from the main designs: the right shoe features Buzz Lightyear, and the left shoe features Zurg. The outers feature an embroidered space design on sparkly blue fabric and speech bursts from our hero and the villain.
But wait. There's more! The chunky heels feature a Rubik's-cube-style stack of rotating blocks so you can mix and match Woody, Jessie, Rex, and Buzz to your heart's content.
But wait. There's more! They also have bright white LEDs as part of the galaxy design that light up when you walk.
But wait. There's more! There's also button-activated audio with laser and cosmic sound effects.
But wait. There's more! No. No, there's not. That's enough for one pair of shoes, we're pretty sure."
Pokémon Light-up Pikachu Slippers,"Super effective at keeping your toes warm

column3: Good Pokémon trainers spend a lot of time on their feet, both at the gym, perfecting their technique, and traveling around various regions. They're always on the go! At the end of a long day of training and battles, Pokémon trainers deserve to put their feet up and relax. And who better to do it with than Pikachu with these light-up slippers? These Pikachu slippers will cradle your tired feet, and his rosy cheeks light up when you take a step. This little pika went to market... this little pika stayed home....Note: If you shuffle your feet in winter while wearing these, you might be able to generate a bit of a shock from this Electric-type Pokémon, too! Bonus!Product SpecificationsLight-up Pikachu SlippersOfficially-licensed Pokémon merchandiseA ThinkGeek creation Pikachu's cheeks light up when you stepCheeks glow for 10 seconds before automatically switching offFits up to a US men's shoe size 10 / women's size 12Perfect for Pokémon trainers with tired tootsiesBottom fabric coated with no-slip dotsMaterials: Polyester + electronicsCare Instructions: Spot clean exterior only. column1: Star Wars Darth Vader Slippers,"The Dark Side... of comfort.

You know that hissing sound when Darth Vader breathes? It's not the breathing machine you've been led to believe. Really, what you are hearing is Anakin sighing because his boots hurt his feet. If only he had some nice cozy slippers to nestle his tootsies into.  Good thing, at least, you can with these Darth Vader Slippers.   Slide your aching feet into some slippers of pure Sith comfort. If your toes are robotic and evil, these Darth Vader Slippers are just the slippers you've been looking for. They are very padded, have no-slip dots, and are constructed by the same made up aliens that built the rest of Vader's suit - promise.  Regardless, in your Darth Vader Slippers, your feet will be cozy and everyone who sees you will be jealous. Because that's what it really means to be a Sith. Product Specifications  For Ages 14 and UpWear a little Vader on your feet as you sip your Dark Side Roast coffeeOfficially-licensed Star Wars slippersBottom fabric coated with no-slip dotsMaterials: Polyester fiber, polyurethane foam, polyethylene foamCare instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergentImportedSizing: Small: Fits shoe sizes 7-8 (US Mens) and size 9 (US Womens)Large: Fits shoe sizes 11-12 (US Mens) and size 13 (US Womens)"
Wonder Woman Ladies' Metallic Hi-Top Sneakers,"Thank Hera for Hi-Tops!

column3: The difference between wearing heels and wearing something more reasonable is basically a superpower in and of itself, and one we haven't entirely mastered. Wonder Woman would frown on us borrowing her Lasso of Truth to extract the secrets of her heel-rocking ways, but it sure is tempting. In the meantime, sneakers are definitely more our jam! Wonder Woman Metallic Hi-Top Sneakers feature the golden Wonder Woman insignia on the heel backs and exterior quarter panels, and have a shiny gold toe, tongue, and eyelets. The hi-tops have a maroon body, pull strap, and shoelaces. The shoes' soles are dark tan because Wonder Woman plans to get them dirty! column1: Harry Potter Hogwarts High-Top Sneakers,"Don't let the muggles get you down

column3: While these sweet kicks won't be permitted in your Muggle Studies or Care of Magical Creatures class, they are an important part of any young wizard's casual wardrobe at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Save the plain black shoes for class, and climb into these beauties during your off hours to complete your muggle look.  Black canvas Harry Potter Hogwarts High-Top Sneakers feature the crossed wands Hogwarts crest in black on black on the exterior quarter panels. The shoes have white eyestays and collar, black laces and eyelets, and black soles with the Harry Potter logo in white on the heels. Wonder Woman Ladies' Athletic Sneakers,"Because shoes shouldn't make you wonder

column3: Sandals may be fine for hanging out on the island of Themyscira, but visiting Man's World translates to a lot of walking. London's a city many a tourist has regretted wearing inappropriate shoes to visit, and if those sandals don't have arch support, we're going to have to recommend a pair of these.Lace up these Wonder Woman Ladies' Athletic Sneakers and take your fandom with you to London, to the gym, or just out grocery shopping. column1: Pokémon Snoring Snorlax Slippers,"Block route 16 in comfort

column3: Snorlax has always got our back. Whether it's protecting us from stubbing our toes or just keeping our feetsies warm, we can always count on Snorlax. We mean, it's good for resting and blocking our way as well, but that just speaks to how well-rounded our big buddy can be! And that one of the reasons Snorlax is near the top of our list of favorite Pokémon - it's just so effective at everything it does!The Snorlax Slippers resemble your favorite sleepy Pokémon! These slippers are sure to keep your toes safe and warm from the frigid mornings and nights. It wouldn't be Snorlax if it didn't sleep on the job though, so when you step Snorlax will do one of his best tricks - snore. A constant reminder that you can never make a Snorlax forget how to use rest, even if you wanted to. Spot clean only. Air dry.ImportedBatteries: Three 1.5v button cell batteries in each (included)Batteries are not replaceable"

column1: Kitty Paws Heels,"True purrrrrrrrfection

column3: We happen to be experts in kitten shoes here. Not kitten heels, mind you. Or shoes FOR cats (Kitten Mittens!). Shoes with a cat theme. Our collection is currently down to half a dozen pairs, so we feel pretty confident in stating that generally cat-themed shoes come in two flavors: cat face on the toe or repeating cat pattern fabric on the shoe.Irregular Choice, of course, had to do it different. Because different is what they do. These shoes feature fuzzy ears, a fuzzy tail, and a faux fur covered chunky heel. There's heart cutout fabric across the vamp and counter (the upper bit of the heel), and the strap has the most adorable heart-shaped buckle. It's topped-off (bottomed-off?) with a holographic black glitter platform. They're sparkly and fun and if you get these and you have cats you already know you're going to have to keep them in a box or they will become playthings.
