column1: Star Wars Galactic Necklace,"From one side of this galaxy to the other

column3: If you've met us here at ThinkGeek World Domination HQ, you know by now that we wouldn't be able to leave our popular Solar Orbit Necklace out there all by its lonesome. When something works, we do it again. You explicitly asked for a special version of this necklace for Star Wars fans, and our vendor came through for us. The Star Wars Galactic Necklace highlights some of the more famous planets from galaxies far, far away. Looking at the necklace straight on, at the farthest left we start with a few Core Worlds (Coruscant and Alderaan) and then we move off into the Outer Rim Territories, including mostly planets but also a few of everybody's favorite moons and an asteroid belt. And, of course, the Death Star. This comes in a lovely box, ready to gift, with a key inside the lid like one you'd find in a box of chocolates. Protip: Don't eat Sullust. It's one of those nasty cherry ones. (Also, it's a rock. We highly advise against eating rocks.)For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel."

column1: Firefly Leaf on the Wind Reversible Necklace,"Likely crash and kill us all

column3: On a ship like Serenity, you need a good pilot. That ain't because the ship is a piece of goushi with a crappy compressor coil and issues with the primary buffer planner. No, those are reasons why you need a good mechanic on board. You really need a good pilot because taking just any ol' job that comes along tends to make for more people chasin' after ya. So make sure you get someone to fly the ship who can pull a Crazy Ivan, dohn-ma? Hoban ""Wash"" Washburne might just be the best pilot in the whole 'Verse. No matter who you're a-runnin' from, he'll get the ship and crew through safely... more or less. He is a leaf on the wind. Watch him soar. And keep him with you always, with this sterling silver reversible necklace. One side reads ""I am a leaf on the wind"". The other side reads ""Watch how I soar"". It hangs from a 20"" sterling silver chain to put 'round your neck and keep close to your heart.   For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. Product Specifications  Firefly Leaf on the Wind Reversible NecklaceOfficially-licensed Firefly merchandise Created exclusively for ThinkGeek by our friends at RockLove Jewelry Sterling silver leaf pendant which reads ""I am a leaf on the wind"" and ""Watch how I soar"" on the reverse20"" sterling silver woven chainCollector's edition sterling silver leaf signature tag hangs from lobster claspMaterials: Nickel-free sterling silverMade in the U.S.A. (New York City)Ships in a Firefly-branded box suitable for gifting with authenticity cardDimensions: 1"" tall pendant on a 20"" long chainWeight: 0.3 oz. Ages 12+About RockLove Jewelry After an old-world apprenticeship in Florence, Italy, designer and jeweler Allison Hourcade Cimino fused her love of historical eras and geek culture to develop RockLove. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Mars Orbit Watch,"40 Minutes

Did you hear ""Mars Time"" from AirSpace, the podcast from the Smithsonian's National Air and Space Museum, down the street from ThinkGeek World Domination HQ? If you missed it, it was about how trying to keep your body synced to a Mars day, 40 minutes longer than an Earth's Day, wreaks havoc on your naturally circadian body. Apparently beanbag chairs and ice cream makes it better. That's pretty much true for anything, honestly.

This watch celebrates the glory that is the red planet, but it's a standard Earth watch so as not to mess with your head. The Mars Orbit watch has 3-hand movement, with Phobos as the minute hand, Deimos as the hour indicator, and a little rover as the second hand. (At least we think that's how they line up based on which one orbits closer to the planet. The inside one is the minute hand, which should be obvious after a a few minutes.) Does not include life and / or any Earth-shattering kabooms."
Star Trek Trillion Sterling Necklace - Exclusive,"Honor the past and celebrate the future of Starfleet

column3: This necklace is for people who love all of Star Trek. You can't pick a division color, because they're all great. You can't pick a series, because they each had their strengths. You can't pick a favorite captain because - okay. Maybe you can pick a favorite captain. In honor of Star Trek's 50th anniversary, RockLove made this crystal version of their Star Trek Sterling Starfleet Trillion Necklace exclusively for ThinkGeek. We said, ""What about the people who need more than one division color?"" This was their clever solution. Each of these necklaces is handmade in New York City from nickel-free artisan silver. It's a tribute to a groundbreaking show and a treat for yourself or someone you love.For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from nickel-free sterling silver.Product Specifications Star Trek Sterling Starfleet Trillion NecklaceOfficially-licensed Star Trek merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusiveCelebrating 50 years of the iconic Starfleet insignia silhouetteFeatures 7mm trillion-cut white cubic zirconia Faceted 20"" long sterling silver bead chain with spring ring claspHandmade from artisan silver in New York CityComes in a box suitable for giftingMaterials: Sterling silver and dilithium crystal cubic zirconiaDimensions: 17mm x 10mm wide Delta ShieldAbout RockLove JewelryAfter an old-world apprenticeship in Florence, Italy, designer and jeweler Allison Hourcade fused her love of historical eras and geek culture to develop RockLove. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Solar Orbit Necklace,"Sparkly star stuff

column3: It's humbling to think that every living thing that has ever existed in the universe or ever will is made of the same stuff as we are - very basic atoms formed in the core of hot stars billions of years ago and set on their interstellar journey when those stars exploded. Your fingers, your circulatory system, your brain, they're all so much stellar debris, combining and recombining in an infinite number of ways, creating life before our own existence and far beyond it into the future. Puts everything into perspective, doesn't it? Now whether or not you have that extra piece of cake doesn't seem to make that much of a difference in the grand scheme of things, does it? That's right. We're your enablers. Thank us later. With cake. Celebrate our friendly neighborhood star stuff with this Solar Orbit Necklace. Its 21"" length features not only the Sun and all the planets (including the one that got voted off the island), but also our Moon and the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter. And there's a little star shaped charm hanging off the 3"" extender, like a comet. For those who are about to complain that the beads are not to scale, here's the deal: we wanted you to be able to lift your head despite the asteroids in the belt being visible. We think that's a fair trade-off.For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel."

column1: Legend of Zelda Leather Watch - Exclusive ,"Wristwatch of Time

""The flow of time is always cruel... its speed seems different for each person, but no one can change it... A thing that does not change with time is a memory of younger days...""  - Sheik, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time   A watch is a necessity for when you really need to keep track of time, like when transporting an Odd Mushroom that'll spoil after three minutes, or saving everyone from the impending doom of the looming moon. Yeah, try saying ""impending doom of the looming moon"" ten times fast!Legend of Zelda watch features a brushed-bronze look and the Hyrule Crest on the watch face. Stainless steel case with a 10 1/4"" genuine leather strap, fits wrists from 6 3/4"" to 9"" around. This watch design is a ThinkGeek exclusive!Product Specifications Legend of Zelda Leather Watch - Exclusive Officially-licensed Legend of Zelda merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusive!Get to your next adventure on timeJapanese movementMaterials: Stainless steel case and bezel, genuine leather strap Batteries: 1 SR626SW (included)Dimensions: 1 3/4"" diameter faceFits wrists from 6 3/4 - 9"" aroundAges 6+WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age."
Nixon The Unit Boba Fett - Limited Reissue,"He's no good to me dead

column3: There is something very memorable about Boba Fett. For a character who had a number of lines in the original trilogy that we can quite literally count on one hand, he left a lasting impression. Maybe it was his demeanor, just standing there, ever silent, gun in hand. It's very intimidating. Or maybe it was his armor, because, let's face the facts, it's pretty awesome looking. Generous wear and tear from all the action Boba has seen. Iconic colors and design. Now, imagine all that, but in the form of a watch.Nixon The Unit Boba Fett watch features a design inspired by one of the galaxy's most feared bounty hunters. This digital watch features the same colors as Boba Fett's iconic armor. Knurled pusher and Mandalorian insignia on the side. Helmet and the words ""As you wish"" inscribed on the back of the watch.    Product Specifications Nixon The Unit Boba Fett - Limited ReissueOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseInscribed with Boba Fett's helmet and the words ""As you wish"" on the back Functions: 12 or 24 hour time of day, calendar, temperature gauge, dual time, countdown timer, chronograph, alarm, and light Positive or negative LCD display with backlight functionMaterials: Custom injection-molded polycarbonate case, fixed polycarbonate bezel, hardened mineral crystal, double gasket custom injection molded polycarbonate pushers, screw down caseback and spring pin lugs, and custom injection-molded silicone band with patented locking looper and polycarbonate buckle Water Resistance: 100 meter / 10 ATMBatteries: SR626 button cell battery (included)Dimensions: 1 3/4"" face with 0.9"" wide bandReturn policy and warranty"

column1: Tesla Watch,"Splendid chronometer from a more elegant time

column3: Tesla came up with all sorts of inventions and has sort of become the poster scientist for awesomeness now. Sure he wasn't perfect. Sure he was a bit crazy. But he was always on time for his appointments. (Ed. note: We made that up.) And now you can be, too, with the new Tesla Watch.The Tesla Watch goes with your steampunk aesthetic. With a weathered-brass look on all the metal parts, this analog watch features a leather strap. The highlights of this design, however, are the two faux vacuum tubes with red LEDs inside that you can turn on and off with the flick of a switch. Everybody will want to ask you what time it is so they can see your watch. Just remember to follow the answer with, ""... 1875."""

column1: Spiral Galaxy Meteorite Pendant Necklace,"Field of Heaven

column3: The Spanish name ""Campo del Cielo"" (""Field of Heaven"") refers to an old legend from the natives of this region of Argentina, that the iron they made their weapons from originally came from a mass that had fallen from the sky. The European conquerors dismissed this silly tale, and searched for the iron vein in the ground or a volcanic source of the metal. But while they were digging around in the dirt, they should have been looking upward, to the stars, for the natives really did know where the Campo del Cielo iron had come from...You'll never forget to look up at the heavens above when you wear this Spiral Galaxy Meteorite Pendant. A solid sterling silver spiral reminiscent of our own Milky Way galaxy, that holds at its center a genuine Campo del Cielo meteorite, dropped from the sky. Presented in an elegant jewelry gift box, this necklace is the gift you can give that comes with a history. A *long* history. For our customers with nickel allergies: This pendant is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. However, Campo del Cielo meteorites are naturally about 7% nickel. The sterling silver pendant fully backs the meteorite, so it generally will not be touching your skin.Product SpecificationsSpiral Galaxy Meteorite PendantSolid sterling silver spiral galaxy pendant with a genuine Campo del Cielo meteorite at the centerSize and shape of the meteorite will vary slightly, as these are real meteorites!Comes on an 18"" sterling silver chainPresented in an elegant jewelry gift boxMaterials: Solid sterling silver pendant with an iron Campo del Cielo meteoritePlease note that Campo del Cielo meteorites do contain about 7% nickel, on averageDimensions: ~ 1"" (natural variation of specimen)"

column1: Coeur Sauvage Necklace Pendant ,"Heart on fire

column3: You've probably seen commercials for the new ""Hearts On Fire"" diamond, which is a cutting technique that makes gems even more insanely sparkly than they already are. But to describe them as ""on fire?"" That seems... excessive. Super sparkly and reflective, yes. And we could grant them ""on fire"" if you're going to do science with your diamond to refract the light to a single point. Which we can totally see you doing. But there's a simpler way to set a heart on fire, and it's this: dragons. This necklace portrays a light and dark dragon, tails entwined, a red Swarovski crystal (read: super-sparkly) heart held between them. Hanging from a 21"" split chain, the pendant represents the joining of two into one, the duality of nature, the feeling of elation like flight that you have when you're in love, and, uh, dragons. Because they're awesome.For our customers with nickel allergies: this is made of English pewter, which is a mixture of tin, antimony, and copper. It is free of both lead and nickel."

column1: Dragon Ear Wrap,"Here Be Dragon

We see people with awesome piercings every so often and think, ""That'd be neat to have, but they must have been working on that for years."" For people who don't have that kind of time, we introduce the commitment-free Dragon Ear Wrap. He hovers over your right shoulder, whispering bad ideas into your ear (like dragons do), but he doesn't require any special piercings; a single, standard earring hole will do. Gotta be in your right earlobe for this to work, though. And, as you can tell from MechaBecca in the photo above, he looks especially great with cartilage piercings, as if he's guarding his hoard. (Note that because of how he curls behind your ear, you might have to modify the backs on your cartilage studs for him to fit, but it's totally worth it to have your ear look like he's curled around a glittering treasure.)   This dragon, made from English pewter, is a little over 3"" tall, a little over 1 1/2"" wide, and around 3/4 deep. It weighs just under 3/4s of an ounce. It is made for the right ear.  Now also available for the left ear; select Left Ear Variant from the dropdown!    For our customers with nickel allergies: the dragon is made of English pewter, which is a mixture of tin, antimony, and copper. It is free of both lead and nickel. The post is surgical-steel, which is a mixture of chromium, nickel and molybdenum. The post meets the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC."
Star Trek Starfleet Division Sterling Silver Silver Trillion Necklace,"Honor the past and celebrate the future of Starfleet

column3: Usually when you're picking out jewelry, you have an idea which gemstone you're going for ahead of time. Maybe a birthstone. Or a favorite stone. Or your school's colors. We wager these necklaces are the only jewelry where you've picked out the stone's color based on your favorite fictional job. Tell us: which Starfleet division are you? Topaz, garnet, or citrine? In honor of Star Trek's 50th anniversary, RockLove created these Star Trek Sterling Starfleet Trillion Necklaces in Division Colors. Each of these necklaces is handmade in New York City from nickel-free artisan silver. It's a tribute to a groundbreaking show and a treat for yourself or someone you love. column1: Nixon Luke Skywalker Safari Watch - ThinkGeek x Nixon Exclusive,"It is time

Alderaan? I'm not going to Alderaan. I've got to go home. It's late; I'm in for it as it is. - Luke Skywalker, Star Wars: A New Hope   Always keep your eye on the time, but also know when to ignore it. Because sometimes being too late to help starts off the most important chapter of your hero's journey.You can keep your eye on the time with this epic timepiece - the Nixon Safari Watch, Luke Skywalker edition. The Safari is known for clean lines and rugged design, which is probably on cliffs and in jungles. It features a seconds hand modeled after Luke's lightsaber and the Rebel Alliance symbol on 12 o'clock marker. Just, you know, remember which hand to keep it on.Product SpecificationsNixon Luke Skywalker Safari WatchOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at NixonBack engraved with a silhouette of Luke's head and his words, ""I am a Jedi""Functions: 3-hand movement with seconds hand, seconds track, and applied hour indicesMovement: Miyota Japanese quartz 17GDial features bold printed hour indices and seconds track on the concave ringSeconds hand modeled after Luke's lightsaberRebel Alliance symbol on 12 o'clock markerTriple gasket crownMaterials: Stainless steel case, hardened mineral crystal, stainless steel screw down caseback, and leather bandDimensions: 1.7"" face with 0.87""-0.79"" slightly pillowed tapered leather band with perimeter stitchingWater Resistance: 100 meter / 10 ATMShips in a sweet hexagonal tinReturn policy and warranty"
Dungeon Master's Watch - Exclusive,"Perception check

column3: Ouch, critical failure on your perception check, and now you lost track of time because you forgot to look at your watch. Whoops, now you're late for that important meeting with the bandit leader blockading the city. Oh, it's okay, I'm sure he'll understand... what do you mean they're beginning to raid the surrounding villages?Keep track of time whether you're counting down the hours till your group convenes or 8 hours into your tabletop play session. Watch face features a dungeon map and metal pieces that look like dice.Product Specifications Dungeon Master's Watch - ExclusiveA ThinkGeek exclusiveWatch with tabletop dungeon map for a clock faceIs that rattling an orc around the corner? Nope, it's the dice shaped pieces in the watch! (Good thing, too. We're low on spell slots)Materials: Metal and plastic watchBatteries: 1x 377 battery (included)Dimensions: Band: 1"" widthClock face: 1 3/4"" diameterFits wrists from 6"" - 8 1/2"""

column1: Shadow of War One Ring,"There Can Be More Than One

One Ring to rule them all, One ring to find them; One ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them.  ... until some guys figure out how to forge a new Ring of Power in secret, and then all bets are off.   Things have come full-circle under the Shadow of War. The battle for Mordor has only become more intense with the introduction of a new ring. Seize the power to bring freedom or damnation to all with this Shadow of War One Ring prop replica. Hanging from a 24-inch chain, the ring features eerie blue lettering, giving it the glowing effect straight out of the game. What will you do with this power?For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel.Product SpecificationsShadow of War One RingOfficially-licensed Middle-earth: Shadow of War collectibleOne Ring prop replicaComes on a 24-inch chain with a spring ring closureThe Ring comes in standard size 10 only (what can we say, Celebrimbor only made it in one size)Materials: MetalAges 14+"
Firefly Sterling & Citrine Serenity Charm Necklace,"Gotta treat her right

Kaylee: You're gonna come with us. Book: Excuse me? Kaylee: You like ships. You don't seem to be looking at the destinations. What you care about is the ships, and mine's the nicest. Book: She don't look like much. Kaylee: Oh, she'll fool ya.  - ""Serenity""   Sure, she may be held together with duct tape and baling wire, but it's love that keeps Serenity flying.   If you, too, love Serenity, keep her flying with this Firefly Sterling & Citrine Serenity Charm Necklace. Hanging from a 18"" chain, this sterling silver pendant has a little polished citrine gemstone for the Firefly drive, ready to sparkle in the black. That is, if that's where you're planning on taking her out to. We were just assuming. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. Nixon Master Yoda Time Teller Watch - ThinkGeek x Nixon Exclusive,"Do or Do Not

column3: You no longer have to go to Dagobah to seek guidance from the wise Jedi Master Yoda. He's always no more than an arm's length away with this watch, ready to give you the time, as if he's reminding you to stay in the now. Why not let this Nixon Time Teller Watch, Master Yoda edition, take on the task of timekeeping for you? Based on Nixon's popular Time Teller series, this watch features printed indices with custom-molded hands and a seconds hand modeled after Yoda's lightsaber. We probably wouldn't put it up to making stew for you, though. Although it can tell you when your stew is done.Product SpecificationsNixon Master Yoda Time Teller WatchOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at NixonBack engraved with a silhouette of Yoda's head and his words, ""Do or Do Not""Functions: 3-hand movement with seconds handMovement: Japanese quartz 17GPrinted indices with custom-molded handsSeconds hand modeled after Yoda's lightsaberTriple gasket crownMaterials: Stainless steel case, solid stainless steel fixed bezel, hardened mineral crystal, triple gasket stainless steel crown, stainless steel screw down caseback and spring pin lugs with 5 link stainless steel, and canvas band with stainless steel buckleBatteries: SR626 button cell battery (included)Dimensions: 1.5"" face with 0.75"" wide bandWater Resistance: 100 meter / 10 ATMReturn policy and warranty"

column1: The Rey Kensington Leather SW Watch - Nixon x ThinkGeek Exclusive,"Follow Me

column3: Moms are always having to remind their children: follow me. Keep up. Don't go wandering off. Whether shopping in the grocery store or crossing the street, following is important for the survival of the species. And as we've gotten older, we've realized that following Mom's advice is just as important as following her literally. This watch serves as a quiet reminder.This epic timepiece is the Nixon Kensington Leather Watch, Rey edition. From their Kensington line explicitly for the ladies, Nixon designed this watch with a canvas & leather watchband inspired by Rey's desert outfit, a seconds hand modeled after Luke Skywalker's lightsaber, the Rebel Alliance symbol on 12 o'clock marker, and a back engraved with a silhouette of Rey's head and her words, ""Follow me."" You bet, Rey. Where do we sign up? column1: Stargazer's Watch - Exclusive,"Everybody's favorite asterism

column3: These days watches are a luxury item more than ever. With our phones always reminding us of what time it is and when we should leave for that next thing and how the traffic is going to be getting there, a watch says you can tell what time it is without your phone. And an analog watch? Now that's just impressive.This Stargazer's Watch says you value the night sky of our Northern Hemisphere. The face features the Big Dipper and the Little Dipper, and it comes with two leather bands, blue and black. With a backlight function and phosphorous hour markers and hand decorations, it positively glows under the right lighting conditions. With this on your wrist no matter how much light pollution your area has, you can always see the stars.    Product SpecificationsStargazer's WatchA ThinkGeek exclusiveFace decorated with the Big Dipper and Little DipperComes with two bands: blue and black (with matching hardware)Functions: 3-hand movement with backlightMovement: Miyota Japanese Phosphorous hour markers and hand decorations glow in the darkSeconds hand has a crescent moonBack engraved with a teddy bearMaterials: Stainless steel case, mineral glass face, leather bandsImported Batteries: 3 SR626SW button cell batteries (included)Dimensions: 1.65"" diameter face x 0.75"" wide bandFits wrists from 6 3/4"" to 9"" around"

column1: Chromatic LED Watch,"Keep a rainbow close at hand

column3: For thousands of years, humans have used light to tell time. Greeks developed sundials from knowledge shared by the ancient Babylonians. The farmer's almanac could tell you how to figure out how many hours you had before sunset using just the sun and your hand. And when the sunlight manages to creep past our blackout shades, we know it's time to get up.Now you can use light to tell time in a more spectacular way with the Chromatic LED Watch. This groovy watch on a silicone band contains 60 unique LEDs for vibrant display. There are 6 different animation modes, one of which is sure to make you happy. The only problem we can see with this watch is that you'll be checking it all the time, because it's so much fun to look at. ""Sorry, boss. I'm listening to your meeting! I was just mesmerized by my watch....""Product SpecificationsChromatic LED Watch A ThinkGeek creation & exclusiveContains 60 LED lightsMode button on the right lets you switch between 6 different animations:Pulse - Red hour, minute (which pulses seconds), and second handsRGB - Green hour, blue minute (which pulses seconds), and red second hand which does a 10-slice-wedge sweepRainbow - All the colors with blackout hour and minute (which pulses seconds) hands. The color wheel rotates each second; the location of the red indicates the second.Red Alert - Red hour, minute (which pulses seconds), and second hand which does a 10-slice-wedge sweepTraffic Light - Red hour, green minute, and yellow second hands, each a 3-slice wedgeCrazy Sunset - Magenta hour (which fills the space between the hour and the minute), white minute, and blue second hand (which fills the space between the minute and the second); colors swap out for magenta, white, blueMaterials: Silicone band and stainless steel caseBatteries: 602530 430mAh 3.7V rechargeable lithium battery Face goes dark after 10 seconds of inactivity to preserve batteryPress any button to check the timeRecharge once a week Watch strap contains integrated USB 2.0 connectorPlug into standard USB port; recharging takes c. 4 hoursCheck the battery status by pressing and holding the Mode button Dimensions: 1 3/4"" diameter watch face; 10"" long 1"" wide band with holes for wrists measuring from 5 3/4"" around to 9""Includes watch and tool for pushing indented power button"

column1: Harry Potter House Colors Watch,"Even your wrist gets sorted

column3: A lot of people like to rep their schools when they graduate, which is completely understandable. We're gonna take it another step further, though. We're gonna represent the specific house that we were placed into by a sentient hat. We don't know why we accept that the hat has absolute authority, but gosh darn it, we will defend its decision to the death. Rep the house you were sorted into with the Harry Potter House Colors Watch. Each watch features colors with the house animal on the clock face. Isn't it time?"

column1: Fallout RadGlow Watch - Exclusive,"When Your Rad Count's Getting Higher

column3: Too much time out in the wasteland, and you might just start to feel a little... well... ghoulish if you're not careful. Not that there's anything wrong with being a ghoul - some of our best friends are ghouls, right Charon? But assuming necrotic is not a look you're going for, you better have some way of knowing when you've been exposed to too many RADS. Without one of those fancy RobCo Pip-Boys, are you doomed to end up as a ghoul, or worse? Not with the latest in portable radiation detection technology, brought to you by ThinkGeek! We've been hard at work reviving secret RobCo technology and Vault-Tec's infamous Vault Boy mascot (though it doesn't look like we've quite revived him enough, as he still looking a bit on the dead side here). Use this little wrist gadget to keep track of your time out in the Wasteland, while it helpfully glows anytime you're exposed to dangerous levels of radiation out there. What's that? You say yours is always glowing whenever you're in the dark? Ut oh...Product Specifications RadGlow Watch - FalloutOfficially-licensed Fallout merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveTracks the time and gives off an eerie radiation glow in the darkPerfect gift for a ghoul with a sense of humorFunctions: 3-hand movement Materials: Stainless steel caseback Battery: SR626SW (included)Dimensions: Band: Measures 9.75"" longWatch Case: 2.25"" tall x 2"" wideWatch Face: 1.8"" diameterFits wrists measuring 6.75"" - 8.5"""

column3: Usually when you're picking out jewelry, you have an idea which gemstone you're going for ahead of time. Maybe a birthstone. Or a favorite stone. Or your school's colors. We wager these rings are the only jewelry where you've picked out the stone's color based on your favorite fictional job. Tell us: which Starfleet division are you? Topaz, garnet, or citrine? In honor of Star Trek's 50th anniversary, RockLove created these Star Trek Sterling Starfleet Trillion Rings in Division Colors. Each of these rings is handmade in New York City from nickel-free artisan silver. It's a tribute to a groundbreaking show and a treat for yourself or someone you love. column1: Celestial Fireworks LED Bracelet,"Star spangled bangle

column3: Jewelry is often a precious heirloom handed down from generation to generation. So when you compliment someone on a necklace, and they say it was their great-grandmother's 100 years ago, that's no surprise. But when people compliment you on your bracelet, you can say it's 20,000 years old. And it really was handed down to you by your ancestors, considering we are all at our core nothing less than star stuff. This Celestial Fireworks Bracelet celebrates a spectacular image captured by NASA's Hubble Space Telescope of Westerlund 2, a cluster in the constellation Carina. (It's 20,000 light years away, so this image really is that old.) On its own, it's a gorgeous image, but we've highlighted the young star cluster's sparkle by adding 15 tiny twinkling white LED lights to represent more foreground stars. They're powered by a rechargeable battery; the hinged bangle ships with a proprietary USB charging cable to keep it entwinkling. But there's an on/off button, too, in case you prefer it dark. Either way, it's a fabulous tribute to the magnificence that is space and mankind's exploration of it.For our customers with nickel allergies: the inside of the band is made from stainless steel."

column1: Transforming Voltron Souvenir Watch - Exclusive,"Go, Voltron Force!

column3: Forming up Voltron was always such an epic moment. Like, oh man, it's getting serious now! Watch out, bad guy, now it's on! So, now it's TIME for the action. See what we did there? We'll be here all week. Just countin' the hours....Form up your watch with Voltron! This watch features a retro 90s style with a removable clock face. Arms and legs are removable, of course. Watch is digital and comes with an adjustable, clear wristband.Product SpecificationsTransforming Voltron Souvenir Watch - ExclusiveOfficially-licensed Voltron merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusiveDigital watch featuring Voltron5 points of articulation when popped out of bandLegs and arms are removable from figureClock face can be removed and formed into Voltron with arms and legsTwo buttons on front to switch between time modes (month/day/etc) and set them accordinglyMaterials: PlasticBatteries: 1 LR41 battery (included)Dimensions:Band length is adjustable from 6 1/2"" to 8 1/2""Clock face: 1 1/2"" wide x 2 1/4"" tallVoltron figure: 2 1/4"" tall x 1 1/2"" wideAges 6+WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age."

column1: Star Wars Yoda Stacked Pendants Necklace,"See Through Him, You Can

column3: Yoda's size was never an issue - he was in complete oneness with the Force. An X-Wing stuck in the muddy swamp didn't even make the 2-feet, 2-inch tall Jedi Master break a sweat. However, for a pendant that you want to wear every day, size does matter. Even Timmy knows this. That's why we offer you the Star Wars Yoda Stacked Pendants Necklace. The 3/4"" discs go perfect with your Rebel uniform, and the cutout of Yoda's silhouette lets you see his most famous proverb: ""Do, or do not. There is no try."" That one hits us right in the feels every time. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is plated with rhodium.Product SpecificationsStar Wars Yoda Stacked Pendants NecklaceOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseThe Jedi Master's sayings keep close, you canFor any Padawan needing encouragement, perfect, it is16"" chain with 2"" extender (for a total length of 18"") and spring ring claspMaterials: Rhodium plated zinc alloyDimensions: Judge him by his size, do you? Well then...pendants are 3/4"" diameter 16"" chain with 2"" extender (for a total length of 18"")Ages 13+"

column1: GotG Sterling Groot Basket Branch Ladies' Ring,"Get Your Groot On

column3: Jewelry should remind you of the people you love. The traditional wedding ring is there to remind you of a spouse, the Irish claddagh brings up loyalty to blood relations, but what about that family that we make for ourselves, on a spaceship, guarding the galaxy from baddies that want to mess with it? There should be a ring for that. Oh, but there is! A subtle homage to the grootiest of tree folks, at first glance it looks like an artisan piece you might have picked up at an earthy festival. But when you spot the tiny engraving, ""I am Groot,"" you realize that this piece is, in fact, out of this world. A tribute to the selfless Groot and the space family that you create for yourself. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. Product Specifications GotG Sterling Groot Basket Branch Ladies' RingOfficially-licensed Guardians of the Galaxy merchandiseSolid nickel-free silverOne interwoven budding limb is engraved with the ever-eloquent ""I am Groot""Available in sizes 6, 7, 8, or 9Dimensions: 0.6"" thick at the widest partAll original designs and sculpts are by RockLove in New York City and cast in ThailandAbout RockLove Jewelry After an old-world apprenticeship in Florence, Italy, designer and jeweler Allison Hourcade Cimino fused her love of historical eras and geek culture to develop RockLove. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Star Wars BB-8 Enamel Ear Jacket Earrings,"What's Better Than BB-8?

column3: BB-8 has a secret to tell, but only to someone that the little droid can really trust. If you're a good person, BB-8 will be able to tell, and will happily spill everything into your ears. We just hope that you speak Binary, if you want to understand what he's saying!A pair of adorable spunky BB-8 droids make the perfect set of ear jacket earrings! The stud of each is BB-8's head, debossed with enamel details including his black photoreceptor ""eye."" The earring back includes BB-8s round body, handing down from a post so that it's visible beneath his head. Together, they form the perfect companion droids - two of them! For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel.Product SpecificationsStar Wars BB-8 Colorful Enamel EarringsOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseEar jacket earrings of BB-8Stud earring featuring BB-8's head with enamel detailsBB-8's body hangs down from a post on the earring back to complete the droidPerfect gift for a friend in need of directionsMetal backsMaterials: Zinc alloy with steel posts and enamel detailsDimensions: approximately 3/4"" tall x 1/3"" wideAges 13+"

column1: Solar Eclipse Charmed Simplicity Necklace,"Timelessly sublime

column3: There are all sorts of trends in jewelry. There were the jelly bracelets, the big chains, and the puffy heart pendant back in the 80s. The chokers and toe rings of the 90s. The silicone bracelets and druzy of the 2000s. But natural phenomena have one advantage over all of these - they're pretty much guaranteed to be timelessly sublime.Pick up a Solar Eclipse Charmed Simplicity Necklace today as a remembrance of the 2017 eclipse. It's guaranteed not to go out of style, because, well, space doesn't go out of style. Nobody says, ""Kepler-186f is SO last week."" Enjoy your own personal solar eclipse for many years to come. For our customers with nickel allergies: Both the pendant and chain are nickel-free."

column1: D&D Logo Pendant,"An Ampersand to Die for

column3: We didn't understand why in the mid 90s they decided to go away from the clever dragon ampersand we were gifted with way back in AD&D. Sure, the new logos were ""designed to modernize the look of the game."" We understand, marketing peeps. But it's a game about knights and quests and dragons. Your target audience really isn't much into ""modern.""This pendant features the latest iteration of the glorious ampersand, rendered by Glitschka Studios and dimensionalized by WotC. It's a statement piece at 1 1/2"" square that really shows off your old-school RPG fandom. We also have this as a pin, but personally we're actually going to take this one and use it as a favor on our renfest costume, because it has a bit of extra dimensionality the pin lacks. * We totally stole that amazing headline from Brand New, a site that reviews corporate and brand identity work. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. This item may have small amounts of nickel, but they're low enough to meet the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC.Product SpecificationsD&D Logo PendantOfficially-licensed Dungeons & Dragons merchandise From Han CholoPendant styled like the new ampersand dragon24"" link chain with lobster clasp closureShips in a Han Cholo / D&D branded velour pouch with drawstring, perfect for a set of dice or countersMaterials: Stainless steelImported Dimensions: 1 1/2"" tall (without bail) x 1 1/2"" wide pendant on 24"" chainWeight: 3/4 oz.About Han Cholo Han Cholo (the DJ name given to creator Brandon Schoolhouse by The Beastie Boys) provides geek bling for such luminaries as Ewan McGregor, Gwen Stefani, and Snoop Dogg. And now you, too."

column1: She-Ra Helmet Ring,"He-Man who?

column3: Step aside, He-Man! The only Master of the Universe we need is the Princess of Power. First, She-ra's real name is Adora. Adoring her is practically required! And second, she's He-Man's long-lost twin (DRAMA!). And while He-Man may have a nifty armored cat as a steed, She-Ra rides an actual unicorn. A unicorn with RAINBOW WINGS. It's almost unfair how awesome she is! And She-Ra totally knows it. We figure that's why she's got wings on her helmet, too. He-Man's helmet is pretty cool too, of course... oh wait, he doesn't even HAVE a helmet (but he does have a bold harness, which we also approve of wholeheartedly). We just love everything about She-Ra, which is why we're thrilled with this gorgeous Han Cholo ring. It recreates her iconic winged helmet right down to to the red stone in the front and the antiqued gold color. We can't all have flying unicorns, but we can wear our own little piece of the Princess of Power.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. This item may have small amounts of nickel, but they're low enough to meet the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC."

column1: Raven Ear-wing Ear Wrap,"Dark wings, dark words

column3: Wouldn't it be fun to have your own raven, trained like the ones from Game of Thrones? You could send it to Starbucks to fetch you a coffee. (And they'd send an orange one out at the start of Pumpkin Latte season.) You could send it out with your party acceptances or declines instead of clicking the dropdown on Facebook. Oh wait. Even better. You know who we'd send ours to? We'd send it to folks who ignore our email. Good luck ignoring this one. This Raven Ear-wing Ear Wrap, made from blackened English pewter, is a little over 2"" tall, a little over 1 1/2"" wide, and just over 1/2"" deep. It weighs just over 1/4 of an ounce. It is made for the left ear.For our customers with nickel allergies: the raven is made of English pewter, which is a mixture of tin, antimony, and copper. It is free of both lead and nickel. The post is surgical-steel, which is a mixture of chromium, nickel and molybdenum. The post meets the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC."

column1: ThinkGeek Star Trek Collection by Her Universe Enamel Pin Sets,"Pin farr - an uncontrollable and illogical desire for pins

column3: We remember from our preteen years that pins are a quick and relatively inexpensive way to proclaim your fandom to everyone around. We sported Pac-Man, Duran Duran, and Doctor Who (obtained in England) on our LeSportsac bag (ed. note: which we totally didn't have. we had a knockoff). Because you couldn't wear your fandom t-shirt every day. Or, well, you could, but you either had to be rich or convince Mom to do a lot of laundry.Revisit those years or enjoy them for the first time with these ThinkGeek Star Trek Collection by Her Universe Enamel Pin Sets. Choose the TOS Set or the TNG Set. A set of 4, either is perfect for trading with like-minded friends or hoarding all for yourself. We won't tell. Here in ThinkGeek World Domination HQ, we have them attached to our laptop bags, strewn across desks, and pushed sideways into corkboards and cubicle walls to hold up photos and graphs. How are you using yours? Send us an Action Shot so we can share with the rest of the universe!Product Specifications ThinkGeek Star Trek Collection by Her Universe Enamel Pin SetsOfficially-licensed Star Trek merchandise ThinkGeek Star Trek Collection by Her Universe(Available exclusively at ThinkGeek)In celebration of the 50th anniversaryChoose TOS Set or TNG SetSet of 4 stickback pins with rubber stoppersTOS Set includesU.S.S. Earl Grey. Hot. - 0.8"" tall x 0.8"" wideRed Alert - 1.3"" wide x 1"" tall Materials: Enamel-decorated pins with a metal base and rubber stopper"

column1: GotG Sterling Dancing Groot Earrings,"He's got sweet moves

column3: You know, Groot can really move. Well, provided Drax ain't lookin'. Movement isn't really a thing trees are known for. You wouldn't think a Flora Colossus would be so light on his... roots? But Groot's always surprising us. These Groots earrings really move, too, thanks to a jump ring where the carved vine bodies are attached to his little head, so he can jovially wiggle as you move. With black eyes, he just wants to shimmy and shake back in your heart. We are Groot!  For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Mysterium Xarxes Daedric Watch - Skyrim Exclusive,"Watch for dragons!

column3: Adventuring in the wild expanses, dungeons, cities, towns, fortresses, and villages of Skyrim is a harrowing task. Evil lurks at every turn. It seems many people are adventurers for a time, but then they take an arrow to the knee (which seems to suggest an inadequacy in the armor around the knee, yes?).The Mysterium Xarxes Daedric Watch, a ThinkGeek exclusive, is based on Daedric Prince of Destruction Mehrunes Dagon's instructions (contained in the book, Mysterium Xarxes) for opening a portal to Paradise. likeyado. The black-metallic band and face is a nod to Daedric armor.   Product SpecificationsMysterium Xarxes Daedric Watch - SkyrimOfficially-licensed The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveWatch may, or may not, have the power to open a portal to ParadisePerfect for Skyrim fans and anyone who appreciates a unique timepieceComes in box suitable for giftingUnique clasp/snap locking systemMaterials: Stainless steel caseBatteries: Included. Watch will run for approx 1 year before included battery dies. To change battery, send to service center.Dimensions: 8"" band, 2"" wide clock, 1 3/4"" diameter faceStrap maximum length: approx. 8"" wrist (arrives at this length, shorten by knocking pins out to remove links)"

column1: Mario Kart LED Twinkling Bracelet,"Let's-a-go!

column3: Mario Kart is the game that has destroyed relationships and forged a generation of bad drivers - and this is AWESOME. Now granted, we didn't learn to text and drive from the Princess, but if she had a phone, you know what she'd be doing with it. She'd be like: ""OMG, Bowser tailg8ting. G2G."" That would be the last text before she got run off the road. Or hit a poor innocent bystander. Or got kidnapped. Again.Time to add the magic of Mario Kart to your jewelry box. Enjoy watching Mario, Peach, and competitors as they ride the Rainbow Road around your wrist with this bracelet. The space background twinkles with 15 LED lights, which you can turn on and off at will. Just make sure you keep a wary eye out for banana peels and turtle shells while wearing this.Product SpecificationsMario Kart LED Twinkling BraceletOfficially-licensed Nintendo merchandiseA ThinkGeek creation & exclusive Bangle features Mario, Peach, and competitors on the Rainbow Road15 LED lights twinkle when turned onMagnetic hinge allows for maximum wrist of 7"" (no really. we measured.)Materials: Stainless steel inside the bangleOn/off button preserves battery lifeBatteries: Rechargeable (one charge lasts c. 8 hours)Charging takes c. 1 hourIncludes USB bracelet with rechargeable battery and proprietary USB charging cable with breakaway magnetic connectorDimensions: 1"" thick bangle on 2 3/4"" x 3"" oval; 40"" charging cableWeight: 3.2 oz. Includes bracelet and proprietary USB charging cableNote: We recommend you plug this into a wall charger. If you plug it into your computer, you may receive an error message. Remove all other USB devices and retry.Ages 14+"

column1: Firefly Browncoat Necklace,"""May have been the losing side. Still not convinced it was the wrong one.""

column3: You've always had your own thing going on. Been a little different from everyone else. Had issues with authority. And out in the far reaches of the universe, what're they doin' stickin' their noses in your business anyhow? They don't know what it's like out there. Right? That's why we've pegged you as a Browncoat. An Independent. You're the one who goes and picks fights with the guys in the tiny cars at the Unification Day parades, aren't you? Yeah. We thought we recognized your type. Troublemaker. Declare your independence with this Firefly Browncoat Necklace. The set of bronze medallions includes a disc with the Mandarin for Serenity, a Browncoat medallion with the star cut out in the shape of a Firefly in-world dog tag, and a dog tag shape (our-side-of-the-'Verse dog tag) with Serenity's silhouette and the phrase ""I Aim to Misbehave"" on it. All three hang from a 24"" antiqued brass rolo chain. And much like Browncoats themselves, each is individually distressed. That means no two are exactly alike. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from brass (an alloy of copper and zinc) and bronze (copper, tin, and other metals, possibly including nickel). Product Specifications  Firefly Browncoat NecklaceOfficially-licensed Firefly merchandise Created exclusively for ThinkGeek by our friends at RockLove Jewelry Set of bronze medallionsA disc with the Mandarin for SerenityA Browncoat medallion with the star cut out in the shape of a Firefly in-world dog tagA dog tag (our-side-of-the-'Verse dog tag) with Serenity's silhouette and the phrase ""I Aim to Misbehave"" on it 24"" antiqued brass rolo chainForged-hook clasp closureMaterials: Bronze medallions on brass chainMade in the U.S.A. (New York City)Ships in a Firefly-branded box suitable for gifting with authenticity cardDimensions: 0.75"" disc + 1"" Browncoat medallion + 1.1"" x 2"" dog tag on a 24"" chainWeight: 1.1 oz.Note: Each component is antiqued and distressed by hand so no two are exactly alikeAlso, when you let them hang free they let out a shiny clinking noiseAges 12+ About RockLove Jewelry After an old-world apprenticeship in Florence, Italy, designer and jeweler Allison Hourcade Cimino fused her love of historical eras and geek culture to develop RockLove. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Star Wars Jedi Watch,"Reach out

column3: You feel that!? That slight pressure on your forearm? That's the Force! Oh, wait - it's just the watch on your wrist. Close enough, though. This should still help you walk the path of light by helping you keep your appointments that you promised you wouldn't be late for... again.Lateness is the path to the Dark Side. Lateness leads to fear, fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, hate leads... well it probably stops there if you're just going to the doctor or something. But let the Jedi help you be on time by keeping track of time with the power of the Force! Or, you know, batteries if you aren't one with the Force just yet."

column1: Timepieces of Destiny 2,"Time On Target

""What we have built is only the beginning. A symbol of what we can achieve, of who we are, and our great purpose here. But, the day may come when we will be tested, when all we hold dear is threatened. And then we'll see what each of us is truly made of."" - Commander Zavala  The day that Zavala warned about has come, and now is the time to step up. And you'd already know precisely what time that is, if you had one of these Timepieces of Destiny 2. Choose between two Guardian-themed wristwatches with adjustable faux leather bands, or keep your Gauntlets slot clear with a stainless steel pocket watch. Your time is now - bring it home, Guardian. Product Specifications Timepieces of Destiny 2Officially-licensed Destiny 2 merchandiseChoose Narrow-Band Watch, Radial Pocketwatch, or Wide-Band Watch Numberless watch faces featuring 3-hand movement Movement: Japanese PC21JMaterials: Stainless steel caseback (with faux leather band on wristwatches)Pocket watch features metal chain, approximately 13"" longDimensions:Wristwatch face: 1 5/8"" diameterPocket watch face: 2"" diameter Narrow-Band is ~ 3/4"" wide and fits wrists from 6 3/4"" - 9""Wide-Band is ~ 1 1/2"" wide and fits wrists from 6 1/2"" - 8 3/4""WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age."
Jurassic World T. Rex Woodgrain Watch,"Mosquitos trapped in amber not required

column3: We spared no expense with this watch. It may not have been created with the use of dinosaur DNA, but it's still pretty top notch. Also, that does MOSTLY eliminate the possibility that it will start going on a rampage around your island. But our lawyers would like to clarify that ThinkGeek takes no responsibility if it does.Bring home your very own Jurassic World souvenir with this watch featuring the iconic T. rex fossil logo and a woodgrain theme."

column1: Rick and Morty Portal Signet Ring,"I can prove it mathematically

column3: We can agree that Rick doesn't exactly pull his punches. If he has a problem with you, he'll let you know immediately. We can appreciate the candid approach from time to time. Even if that approach is just giving us the bird as he walks through a portal. We know exactly what he's trying to say.Take the blunt approach with the Rick and Morty Portal Signet Ring. If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say it at all, or so it goes. Sometimes a finger is worth a thousand words, though. Celebrate Rick flipping the bird as he leaves through a portal on this stainless steel signet ring. Good for corporate or family events you didn't want to go to anyhow."

column1: Harry Dresden's Pentacle Necklace,"Symbol of power

column3: Harry Dresden is not someone you want as an enemy. He's gotten out of some pretty sticky situations in his time, but, more importantly, he's just too stubborn to die. He has a lot of tools at his disposal. His iconic pentacle necklace will help ward away all manner of attacks and baddies. We aren't saying you can keep those same foes at bay by channeling your will into this necklace, but we aren't saying you can't either.Power balanced with restraint - Harry Dresden's Pentacle Necklace. Channel your will and magical prowess into this symbol of power inspired by the one and only Harry Dresden. We weren't able to make it glow blue when we channeled our will into it, but we might just not have been trying hard enough. Maybe you'll have better luck?For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel.Product SpecificationsHarry Dresden's Pentacle NecklaceOfficially-licensed Dresden Files merchandisePerfect for the blasty wizard in your lifeMaterials: White bronze and stainless steelDimensions: 1 1/2"" diameter pendant and 24"" long chainWeight: 1/4 oz.Comes in a box perfect for gifting"

column1: Super Mario Bros. Mario Watch,"Time to save the princess

column3: For Mario, it always seems like it's time to save the Princess. The only exception is when it's time to race go-karts or play just about any sport that's ever been invented. Either way, Mario can't let the time get away from him. At least he got out of the plumbing business. Even a watch with his face on it couldn't help him keep those appointments if Bowser keeps messing with things.Celebrate Mario with the Super Mario Bros. Mario Watch featuring our favorite former plumber on the clock face. Never be late for cake at the castle again. Maybe this time you'll catch the princess."

column1: Firefly Serenity Ship Necklace,"She'll be with you for the rest of your life

Kaylee: You ever sail in a Firefly? Book: Long before you were crawling. Not an aught-three though. Didn't have the extenders. Tended to shake. Kaylee: So, um, how come you don't care where you're going? Book: 'Cause how you get there is the worthier part. - ""Serenity""    Mal may not welcome religion on his boat, but we'll say ""amen"" to Shepherd Book's sentiment above. This Firefly Serenity Ship Necklace hangs from a 20"" sterling silver chain. Solid sterling, the ship weighs in at just over an inch in length. It has all sorts of little details that you'll appreciate, including a leaf embossed on the underside, like a little secret tribute to the best pilot in the 'Verse. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. Product Specifications  Firefly Serenity Ship NecklaceOfficially-licensed Firefly merchandise Created exclusively for ThinkGeek by our friends at RockLove Jewelry Solid sterling silver Serenity pendant with a leaf embossed on the bottom20"" sterling silver rounded box chainCollector's edition sterling silver leaf signature tag hangs from spring ring closureMaterials: Nickel-free sterling silverMade in the U.S.A. (New York City)Ships in a Firefly-branded box suitable for gifting with authenticity cardDimensions: 1.1"" long x 0.75"" wide x 0.3"" thick pendant on a 20"" long chainWeight: 0.4 oz. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."
Fantastic Beasts Wand Necklace,"Which one will choose you?

column3: These necklaces are pretty sizeable. They made us wonder how tall a figure would have to be in order for this to be the correct wand length for them. Given an average wand length of 11 1/2"" inches and average British / American height at 5 foot 9 inches, these wands would be perfect for someone just over 2 feet tall. So basically, this is an ideal wand for your 4-5 month old infant, but please don't give it to them. 1) Long pointy metal bits are unpleasant when swallowed and 2) You don't want to know what that ""Ga Ga Goo Goo"" spell does.So long as you have your federal wand permit you can show us at checkout, you can pick up one of these lovely Fantastic Beasts Wand Necklace. Choose from the wands of Newt Scamander, Percival Graves, Queenie Goldstein, or Tina Goldstein. Newt's is brass colored. Tina's is understated. Graves's is more ornate, and Queenie's is a lovely art deco creation. Which one will choose you?For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel.   Product SpecificationsFantastic Beasts Wand NecklaceOfficially-licensed Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them merchandiseChoose the wand of Newt Scamander, Percival Graves, Queenie Goldstein, or Tina Goldstein24"" chain matches wand color and secures with a spring ringMaterials: Base metalImportedDimensions: Tina and Queenie's are 4"" long, Newt and Graves's are 4 1/2"" long on a 24"" chainWeight: 3/4 oz. Ages 14+"

column1: Pokémon Pikachu Crystal Tail Necklace,"Shiny Pika Tail Whip

column3: Pikachu loooooooves to play dress-up! Just see Cosplay Pikachu in Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire, the female Pikachu who can switch between costumes such as Pikachu Rock Star, Pikachu, Ph. D, or Pikachu Libre. But Cosplay Pikachu can't be Shiny, and we think that's a crying shame. Why shouldn't Pikachu get to be shiny and maybe even... crystal encrusted?This Pikachu pendant brings the bling! Silver-plated and with a tail made up of tiny crystals, there's no way for this little Pika-P not to be Shiny. Shiny Crystal Pikachu used Spark...le! It's super effective (of course)!For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means their five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel, coated with nickel-free sterling silver."

column1: Harry Potter Lumos Ravenclaw Charm Bracelet,"Intelligence, creativity, and jewelry

A charm bracelet seems a very innocent trinket. What other piece of jewellery is so imbued with memory and sentiment? Why do we call those little masterpieces ""charms"" if not in allusion to their talismanic properties? They have meaning beyond the mercenary. They are personal amulets. - J.K. Rowling   When we heard we were getting a bunch of Harry Potter charms, we thought that was awesome, but we wondered how we were going to store said charms at the warehouse. Have a wizard sitting on one of the shelves, ready to incant when someone orders one? Magical logistics are complicated.Then we realized we were talking about a different kind of charm. This Lumos Ravenclaw Charm Bracelet lets you show off your HP fandom with three exclusive jewelry charms: the Ravenclaw House Crest (double-sided), the Sorting Hat, and a Lumos butterfly. We have more than a dozen additional charms for you to choose from. And, of course, if Ravenclaw isn't your House, we also have the other Houses available: Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, and Slytherin.For our customers with nickel allergies: The silver in this item is nickel-free and conforms to REACH standards."

Why do we call those little masterpieces ""charms"" if not in allusion to their talismanic properties? They have meaning beyond the mercenary. They are personal amulets. - J.K. Commemorative Solar Eclipse Watch - Exclusive,"Just in time

column3: We've used the Moon and the Sun to tell time for... well, probably almost as long as humans have existed. And while we may no longer rely on the shadows cast by celestial bodies, the ancients who came before the development of water clocks and hourglasses must have been particularly vexed when an eclipse occurred. Although, ""I am late because something ate the Sun"" is probably a pretty good excuse no matter where you are in terms of technological development. With this watch you can go back to telling the time using the Sun and the Moon. A ThinkGeek exclusive, the face of this watch features a black and white animation which shows an eclipse corona and cycles brighter twice an hour. With a stainless steel case with genuine leather watchband, this'll be with you for many eclipses to come.Product SpecificationsCommemorative Solar Eclipse WatchA ThinkGeek exclusiveBlack and white animation shows the corona and cycles brighter twice an hourGlow-in-the-dark indicators on the handsFunctions: 3-hand movementMovement: Japanese movement Materials: Stainless steel case with genuine leather watchbandWater Resistance: 30 meter / 3 ATMBatteries: 1 SR626SW (included)Dimensions: 1.45"" case with 0.63"" wide bandHoles punched to fit wrists 6 1/2"" - 8 3/4"" aroundWeight: 1 1/2 oz."

column1: Star Wars Death Star Enamel Crystal Earrings,"PEW *bling* PEW *bling* PEW *bling*

column3: These pretty little earrings almost look like an abstract design. You could definitely get away with wearing them to some formal event without anybody saying a thing about them other than, ""Where'd you get those? They're nice."" People who know you will know better. ""Death Star earrings? You wore Death Star earrings to a wedding?!"" Yes. Yes we did. These small black studs feature smooth black enamel, along with the Death Star's Equatorial Trench and a small clear rhinestone where the Concave Dish Composite Beam Superlaser would go. Talk about a more elegant weapon! And you get two of them. Because Death Stars are always better in pairs. That way if one of them gets blown up.... Too soon?For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel.Product SpecificationsStar Wars Death Star Enamel Crystal EarringsOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at SalesOneDeath Star studs with a rhinestone for the Concave Dish Composite Beam SuperlaserMaterials: Stainless steel with enamelImportedDimensions: 1/3"" diameter (each)Ages 13+"

column1: Pokémon Pikachu 3-Pack Enamel Earring Set,"Gotta Wear 'Em All!

Hello, there! Have I got a deal just for you!   Every Trainer waits for the chance to choose their starter Pokémon. But you don't have to choose. You can have all four. To celebrate the new Pokémon Sun and Moon games, sport these Pokémon earrings which include Poké Balls, Great Balls, and all the starter Pokémon: Charmander, Bulbasaur, Squirtle, and even Pikachu. Or, mix and match the pairs to express your current mood. Catch all of these stainless steel and enamel earrings, perfect for fans of the video game, television show, trading card game, or app. Then your Trainer outfit will be complete.For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means their five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel.Product SpecificationsPokémon Pikachu 3-Pack Enamel Earring SetOfficially-licensed Pokémon merchandiseIncludes six earring pairs for Pokéballs, Great Balls, Pikachu, Charmander, Bulbasaur, and SquirtleDress the part while catching Pokémon, hitting gyms, and visiting PokéstopsButterfly-style friction push-on backs with silicone stoppersMaterials: 316L stainless steel with enamelImportedAges 13+WARNING: Choking hazard. Small parts. Not intended for children under 3 years of age"
Dragonhenge Bracelet,"Dragon Rehabilitation

column3: You are so good to take this little dragon in. See, he isn't going to get very far with just one wing. He was spotted flying in circles over Kentucky before we relocated him to this little box in our warehouse for his own protection. Hopefully, he'll gain strength each time you wear him. And even if he can never be released, you can use him to educate kids about how dragons are a vital part of our ecosystem. This Dragonhenge Bracelet is a dragon hinge bracelet. (We entertain ourselves by making up words.*) He has an understated matte finish, and the hinged design means he fits a wide variety of (human) wrists. Just be careful if you wear bling around this little guy. You know about dragons and their gem hoarding. They're so sparkly; he just can't help himself.* For the purists, we're classifying this little guy as part of Class I Henges: ""a roughly circular or oval-shaped bank with an internal ditch"" (the gap between the bracelet and your wrist) ""which have a single entrance created from a gap in the bank."" [from Wikipedia's entry on Henges]For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is a zinc alloy. It does not contain nickel.Product Specifications Dragonhenge BraceletHinged bangle featuring a single-winged dragon that wraps around your wristDesigned and manufactured exclusively for ThinkGeekComes in a box suitable for giftingMaterials: Zinc alloy with nickel-free platingImportedWhen closed, interior measures 6 3/4"" (but you can wear it on a bigger wrist by letting it gap)Hinge opens 2 1/2"" acrossWeight: 2 oz."

column1: Destiny Strange Coin Medallion,"Where's Xûr?

column3: Guardian, may we speak? You have been competing in the Crucible, completing Public Events and Nightfall Strikes, survived the Prison of Elders, and turned in bounties - all in search of these unusual little coins. But are the exotic wares of the mysterious Agent of the Nine what you seek, or do you collect these strange objects for their own sake? Is it for your happiness that you gather these?Perhaps you, like Xûr, feel the pull of the Strange Coin medallion. It must have some special meaning with the Nine, but who could ever understand what that is? We don't even really get what the Nine are! But this Strange Coin medallion, so beautifully handmade to resemble the in-game object, contains an eerie glow that persists long after the lights have dimmed. Are you the one this Strange Coin is meant for?For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel.Product SpecificationsDestiny Strange Coin MedallionOfficially-licensed Destiny merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusiveStrange Coin medallion pendant featuring a glow-in-the-dark enamel accentPerfect gift for the adventurous Guardian seeking out strange curios24"" chain with lobster clasp closureMaterials: Enameled yellow brassDimensions: 1 1/4"" diameter medallion on a 24"" chainWeight: 0.7 oz.About RockLove Jewelry After an old-world apprenticeship in Florence, Italy, designer and jeweler Allison Hourcade Cimino fused her love of historical eras and geek culture to develop RockLove. Each piece of jewelry is made using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Star Wars Yoda Dangling Lightsaber Earrings,"You have coverage for accidental death and dismemberment, yes?

column3: In general, we do not recommend putting lightsabers next to your face. Yes, it makes for cool lighting effects. But unless you are at a master-level, you may accidentally cut off your nose. We mean, look. When's the last time you missed with your straw and accidentally stuck it up your nose? Yes. We saw that. We were just being polite, because we know how mortified we are when we do it. Please be careful with these Star Wars Yoda Dangling Lightsaber Earrings. These are stud earrings featuring the Rebel logo, only they also come with a lightsaber charm that you put the post through to create a dangle effect. The result? Two different looks from a single pair of earrings. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel.Product SpecificationsStar Wars Yoda Dangling Lightsaber EarringsOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise Rebel logo stud earringsButterfly-style, friction (push) backs feature a dangling lightsaber charm and rubber stoppersLightsaber has 3 positions for adjustable lengthMaterials: Stainless steelImported Dimensions: 0.3"" diameter stud with 1.3"" long lightsaberAges 13+"

column1: Poop Emoji Charm Stud Earrings,"The Emoji We Can All Get Behind

So what does the little Smiling Pile of  emoji actually mean? Other than the obvious, of course. We're well-versed in  humor, thank you very much. But if the classic smiling face emoji actually means happiness, and a winking face means ""if you know what I mean,"" then there must be a deeper meaning to  than just as a proxy for the word or its meatier NSFW synonym. Engineers at Google who brought the  to the US thought of it as the ""dislike"" button that we were all missing. But us? Well, we like to use it as a little ""whoopsie daisy!"" when things go to .

The whimsical, adorable little  has a new place to show off its big wide eyes and infectious (though hopefully not literally) grin, and that's on your s! Two softly sculpted little piles of , like beautifully-placed soft-serve , cast in recycled brass, with an overlay in 14K gold or and surgical steel posts. When you wear them, you'll have everyone asking "", where did you get those?""
For our customers with nickel allergies: Yellow gold typically does not contain nickel."
D&D Dragon Flight Pendant Necklace,"Cutest breath weapon EVAR

column3: We'll just say right now that this little guy is never going to get any bonuses from Frightful Presence. This little dude is so cute. We couldn't resist his draconic charms. We think you should wear him to meetings to keep you company. And breathe tiny fire on stupid people. (Note: tiny fire not included.)Now, this isn't a tiny necklace. But it is tiny for a dragon. But this pendant boasts a 2 1/2"" wingspan, and his little breath weapon also functions as the bail. Plus, he's got a 360° design so if he does a roll while in flight, you'll see the belly of the dragon. So cute. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. This item may have small amounts of nickel, but they're low enough to meet the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC.Product SpecificationsD&D Dragon Flight Pendant NecklaceOfficially-licensed Dungeons & Dragons merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at Han CholoLittle flying dragon whose breath weapon functions as the bail 360° design so if he flips over, you see the belly of the dragon24"" steel snake chain with lobster clasp closureMaterials: Stainless steelImportedDimensions: 2 1/2"" wingspan, 1 1/2"" bail to tail + 24"" chainWeight: 1/2 oz.About Han CholoHan Cholo (the DJ name given to creator Brandon Schoolhouse by The Beastie Boys) provides geek bling for such luminaries as Ewan McGregor, Gwen Stefani, and Snoop Dogg. And now you, too."

column1: GotG Wee Awesome Mix Vol. 2 Cassette Sterling Stud Earrings,"Cassettes for your ears

column3: So for those of you who are younguns, you know about the cassette tape as seen in the Guardians of the Galaxy movies (which were already considered compact), but there were also these things called mini-cassettes. Even smaller, they were used mostly for portable recording, especially by reporters and such trying to capture audio. These mini cassettes are not mini-cassettes. They're even smaller, and they're for your ears. Well, most cassettes are for your ears, but these are purely ornamental. Made from sterling silver, these tiny mixtapes aren't playable but allow you to express your love for all things GotG.  For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. column1: Harry Potter Luck Necklace,"Do you feel lucky?

Luck can only get you so far, Harry..."" - Hermione We're not fighting off evil witches and wizards in our spare time, but every once in a while, we could use a dash of luck. Maybe the commute home is fast and uneventful, or the pizza place accidentally throws in free cheesy bread, or our cat doesn't puke on the bed. It's the little things, really. If you're wearing a bottle of Felix Felicis around your neck, you're sure to feel like a million bucks. This replica of the potion bottle from the Harry Potter films arrives empty, so you'll have to brew your own Felix Felicis. Just be careful!! It's disastrous if you brew it incorrectly. It should be molten gold in color and droplets should leap from the surface like tiny goldfish. After six short months of brewing, you'll be ready to take on the world! Product Specifications  Felix Felicis charm replica from the Harry Potter movies Potion bottle arrives empty; you must brew your own potion Officially licensed Harry Potter collectible Materials: Glass, metal, plastic, cork Chain length: 18"" Dimensions: 5"" tall (inside display), 2.5"" tall (potion only)  For our customers with nickel allergies: The metal on the Felix Felicis is made of zinc and is nickel free."

Rowling   When we heard we were getting a bunch of Harry Potter charms, we thought that was awesome, but we wondered how we were going to store said charms at the warehouse. Have a wizard sitting on one of the shelves, ready to incant when someone orders one? Magical logistics are complicated.Then we realized we were talking about a different kind of charm. This Lumos Gryffindor Charm Bracelet lets you show off your HP fandom with three exclusive jewelry charms: the Gryffindor House Crest (double-sided), the Sorting Hat, and a Lumos butterfly. We have more than a dozen additional charms for you to choose from. And, of course, if Gryffindor isn't your House, we also have the other Houses available: Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, and Slytherin.For our customers with nickel allergies: Yellow gold typically does not contain nickel."
D&D Beholder Stud Earrings,"Beauty is in the eye of the beholder

column3: Can you believe this is our very first Beholder product? We've been around for 18 flippin' years, and this is our first Beholder?!? What is up with that? Must have been an oversight, but with that huge eyeball, there's hardly any excuse. We're not sure why but the creatures in these D&D Beholder Stud Earrings look pretty happy. Or, you know, maybe they're just baring their teeth in a fashion that happens to look like a smile. Some species are like that, right? Anyhow, these tiny Beholders can't do that much damage to you, right? Only if you sleep on them wrong and they get all pokey.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. column1: Full Moon Charmed Simplicity Necklace,"Shine Under the Light of the Moon

column3: Each full moon has a name, and that name differs based on the month, the season, the hemisphere you're viewing the full moon from, and even personal preferences. Here are a few of our favorite full moon names:Hunger MoonMilk MoonThunder MoonFrosty MoonLong Night MoonMead MoonDog MoonIce MoonWolf MoonCelebrate life under the light of your favorite full moon by wearing the Full Moon Charmed Simplicity Necklace.  Like the moon itself, it captures the rays of the sun by day to illuminate the night's darkness... in other words, it glows in the dark! A magnificent moon charm by day or night, set in silver and hanging from a delicate 18-inch sterling silver link chain. For our customers with nickel allergies: Both the pendant and chain are nickel-free. column1: Harry Potter Dark Mark Watch,"Loyal to You-Know-Who

column3: The mark of the Death Eaters isn't exactly something you want to see looming over your local sporting event. It's just bad PR - they should know that after the first go around. Maybe they should try something like a TV commercial or something. We're sure the Quidditch match had an ad-spot or two still open.With this watch, you can display your loyalty to He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named without all the drama that a sign in the sky can cause."

column1: Destiny Hunter Necklace,"Take Big Risks for Big Rewards

What does it mean to be a Hunter? I say, it's all about where you belong. The Warlocks have their libraries, the Titans have their walls... but Hunters belong in the wilds. - Cayde-6  Lone wolves, daring scouts, experts with knives and precision weapons, the Hunter class makes its own luck... by bending the rules a bit. Show 'em how you bend those rules while wearing this exclusive Hunter emblem necklace. Cast in black rhodium plated brass and polished to a mirror finish, this is an exotic drop that you can only get here at ThinkGeek! Guardians of the Galaxy Wee Groot Stud Earrings,"Weeeeeeee Are Groot

column3: Thanks to the beauty of homophones, Groot can add a lot to his vocabulary without, you know, actually adding a lot to his vocabulary. With just a addition of the little ""we"" sound, he can now indicate that things are little and express joy, as well as being able to use the first person plural pronoun. And there's no shame in just throwing out a ""weeeeeee!"" while dancing - a good song will do that to ya. A pair of Wee Groots for your ears! Or are they We Groots? Weeeeeeee Groots? All three! With those black eyes, who can resist his wee charms? We certainly can't. We are Groot!  For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver. column1: IAMA Groot Watch - Exclusive,"So Frickin' Awesome

Not only is it a ThinkGeek exclusive, but when the fate of the galaxy depends on you, and you feel dumber and smaller than those who came before you? Don't worry. You're not all gonna die. You're going to eat your M&Ms, yawn, and fall asleep in the arms of people who love you. And that's so frickin' awesome.
