column1: Sterling Silver Bracelet for Charms,"Your Bracelet, Just How You Like It

To see all our charm beads, click here. We had these sterling silver bracelets custom made for us with a toggle closure because we think toggles are so much easier to close with one hand than lobster clasps or twisty things or whatnot. The toggle bar itself attaches with a lobster clasp to allow you to put beads on and take them off. The chain is 3mm in diameter, which means it fits basically all major brands of bead, whether they have threads or not: PANDORA, Chamilia, and Biagi (sorry, Troll folks). So if you have beads but want the toggle bracelet, chances are your beads will fit on this bracelet. We have compatibility issues every day with our computers. We don't need them with our jewelry. Product Specifications  Each bracelet is made of solid sterling silver. Toggle closure for easy on-off. Note: The weave of the silver will eventually cause it to stretch. If that happens to a bracelet that used to fit perfectly, pop another bead on. Contains small parts. Not for children under 3."
Star Trek TNG Mirror Universe Magnetic Badge,"These are the voyages of the I.S.S. Enterprise...

Star Trek fans sure are getting a lot of mirror universe action recently. And even if Discovery's portrayal of the Terran Empire isn't your thing, it's hard not to be a fan of IDW's Mirror Broken comic series, boldly going where TNG has not gone before.

Straight from the version of the Terran Empire created by writers Scott and David Tipton and artist JK Woodward, this Star Trek TNG Mirror Universe Magnetic Badge has everything. It's metal. It's got magnets on the back, so you don't have to stick holes in your uniform. The only thing it doesn't have is actual combadge functions. Which is good. Look, you don't want to call the Terran Empire; this is non-functioning for your own protection."
Rick and Morty Rick's Prisoner Bracelet,"Doing hard time

column3: Rick has a few transgressions lodged against him from a whole host of people and things. He's just so popular. Or maybe it's because he's wanted for ""everything."" That's a lot of things to be wanted for, but if there is anyone up for it, it's our Rick.This is the ID bracelet of one of the galaxy's most wanted criminals from that time when he did hard time in the Galactic Federal Prison. Orange bracelet featuring information such as Rick's ID number, mugshot, and all sorts of other details. Two snaps on the back to adjust for comfort."

The Star Wars ear cuff set is complete with a Rebel, Imperial, and Jedi logo ear cuff accompanied by a little stardust in the form of tiny sparkly rhinestones. column3: This poor Stegosaurus has no idea what it's gotten itself into. It's frolicking across this land with what it believes is its bestest buddy evar, Mr. Ceratosaurus, and then CHOMP. It's all over. We just hope the Stegosaurus got to use its thagomizer (Gary Larson should get to name all these things) before its untimely end. *sniff* This set of two dinosaur necklaces inspired by the beginning of the pilot for Firefly (well, okay, after the beginning beginning) lets you recreate our memorable introduction to Wash. column1: D&D Mimic Pendant Necklace,"Get a little something off your chest

column3: We're just going to say it. Mimics are a**holes. You power through some ultimate evil, you finally get to the treasure, and wham. You get bitten by the treasure chest. You haven't even had time to rest and heal or restore your spells, forPelor'ssake, and your reward is trying to kill you. Now when they're just hanging out in some random castle, we're okay with that, but when they're in the place of the ultimate treasure? A**. Holes. Actually, maybe our problem isn't so much with the monster as it is with the dungeon master at that point. Celebrate everybody's favorite This Is Not Treasure with this unmistakeable D&D Mimic Pendant Necklace. This little guy has so many pointy teeth, you can't ever claim to be confused about his intentions. This is also nice because it works for online gamers, too. Our favorite Torchlight II spell was the one where you could turn your pet into a Mimic. Ferret one moment. Bitey chest that whomps along at your heels the next. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. column1: D&D Breathing Dragon Cuff Bracelet,"DC 19 Dexterity saving throw

column3: The D&D Breathing Dragon Cuff Bracelet. ""Breathing Dragon"" sounds either like a hot yoga studio or like everybody better clear out because there's about to be a breath weapon unleashed. We're going to go with the former since we're asking you to put it on your wrist. A torc-style steel cuff bracelet features dragons' heads on the terminals at either end. We like to imagine it's an ouroboros, possibly Jormungand, given the torc's Norse heritage. Can an ouroboros have two heads? Seems all the better to eat each other with.... Or possibly it's literally Ouroboros, the Great-Great-Great Wyrm of Time, He Whom You Never Want to Encounter. Of course, if he's in your closet, that might be okay. Just don't forget to wear him. We hear that angers him.Oh, and also, this pairs nicely with the D&D Twin Dragon Ring.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. column1: Captain America Shield Watch,"Not made of vibranium-steel alloy

column3: Looking for a way to simultaneously support your country while wearing your love for comic books on near your sleeve? Look no further than the Captain America Shield Watch. This watch has red, silver, and blue accents and features Cap's shield as its face.Just a warning, though. While Cap's real shield can deflect bullets, swords, and the occasional space alien, these shields are made of steel and faux leather and are not designed to deflect deadly things. You'll have to wait until we get vibranium-steel alloy in stock for that. But for now, this watch will make a very patriotic addition to your collection."

column1: Batman Logo Watch,"The night watch

column3: What, you think Batman doesn't have a watch to keep track of time? Granted, a Batwatch might have a laser cutter or something cool attached to it, but Batman for sure has places to be. He needs a watch to know when to be at the bank that Two-Face is planning on robbing. Might be a little embarrassing if he showed up late to that party. And possibly even worse if Bruce Wayne kept some Gotham millionaire waiting.Have your very own bat-gadget with the Batman Logo Watch. This watch features the iconic Batman logo in the center of the clock face. It may not shoot out a grappling dart to hoist you up a building, but it will tell you the time just fine. And let everyone who sees it wonder about the tiny grappling hook possibility."

column1: Star Wars Imperial Chandelier Earrings,"Time to strike back... again!

As they say, the Empire's rule is more about fear of the Force than the Force itself. Is there a chance that people won't even know what this symbol is? Maybe. But anyone who is anyone important will know, and they will know to be afraid. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. column1: His Monster / Her Monster ID Bracelet,"You're my favorite monster

column3: It's important to remember that Mary Shelley never gave her monster a name. It is we who named him Frankenstein after his creator. Frankenstein may be about many things, but one of the topics the story broaches is loneliness - that feeling the monster has that he is the only one of his kind in the world. He needs his own monster to feel kinship in this world. We know that feeling of not fitting in, and maybe you do, too. Perhaps you also have a special monster in your life, or you are that special monster for someone else. This set of bracelets, reading ""His Monster"" and ""Her Monster,"" lets you declare both your relationship and your otherworldliness all in one. Note: This is how we got them from the manufacturer. If this is perfect for you but your relationship is a different combination of pronouns, perhaps you could hook up with someone in the comments who is also looking. For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. But the weak-willed need not apply - only the strongest shall prove themselves to the Iron Banner.Your Light has been tested, and now you may reap the reward of the Iron Banner: a medallion proving your worthiness. column1: Nightmare Before Christmas Jack Watch,"Only 364 days left till next Halloween

column3: Jack is on a strict timeline. He only has 364 days to plan the next big day, and that's not easy. He needs to keep track of time or else it's just going to be the same routine and he'll try and borrow another holiday again. We all know how that went last time.The Nightmare Before Christmas Jack Watch features our favorite Pumpkin King as the clock face. He's giving a bit of an inquisitive look, almost like he just crushed an ornament again and is fascinated by how it reacted with his science concoction."

column1: Black Panther Logo Watch,"Long live the movie

Black Panther has a long runtime. It clocks in at 135 minutes, which is apparently longer than any other Marvel movie that has a single superhero in it. But think about it: Black Panther doesn't have the same name-recognition that Cap has. Black Panther is fewer than ten minutes longer than Iron Man, and Tony Stark lives in a world we all know or quickly recognize. Sure, GotG was new for a lot of people, but it was sort of, ""Here's the 80s - now everything else is not as you know it."" Pretty cut and dry. Wakanda exists as part of our world, so it's more important to make minute distinctions so audiences are acquainted with what's the same and what's different.  If you so desire, you can track the movie runtime and also pay tribute to a king and superhero with your Black Panther Logo Watch. With a sleek matte black case with a faux leather band, this watch features Black Panther's mask in glossy black on the face. And check your watch before you shout ""Long live the king!"" so people know you're tracking exactly how long. Actually, that sounds kind of morbid, doesn't it? Scratch that. Just use it to time how long it takes to run out and get another small popcorn."
Deadpool Logo Watch,"Time to make the chimi-**cking-changas!

column3: Here's a weird thought: when Deadpool has to saw his hand off to get out of a situation by relying on his healing factor, do you think he cuts above or below the watch? Because the hand regenerates but the watch, not so much. Guess it depends on how much he likes the watch and whether or not he needs to be somewhere on time.This Deadpool Logo Watch is pretty special. We're particularly fond of the massive face. This is not a subtle watch. If you like it, too, add it to your cart now, because we promise that putting ""watch Deadpool"" in a search engine will not bring you back here."

column1: D&D Mind Flayer Ring,"Perish the thought

column3: Oh, the Illithid. How we loathe thee. The Underdark may be a lovely shade of purple but it contains lots of unpleasantness, including fungus, big ol' spiders, and you guys. To be clear: some people like fungus or spiders. Nobody likes you guys.Wear this D&D Mind Flayer Ring, the better to punch one in the face should you happen across it. Although we also hope you packed your Protection from Evil and a tinfoil hat. If the ring is a little loose when you put it on, but you then have an overwhelming thought that, no, actually it fits just right, take it off immediately and go find a safe, above-ground blanket fort.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. This item may have small amounts of nickel, but they're low enough to meet the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC.Product SpecificationsD&D Mind Flayer RingOfficially-licensed Dungeons & Dragons merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at Han CholoAn adjustable steel ring with a Mind FlayerThe back's hollow, much like your head will be once an Illithid meets itMaterials: Stainless steelImported Dimensions: 1.3"" from tip of frill to end of tentacleShips at a size 7 1/2(But it's austenitic steel so if you heat it, it's a little malleable)Weight: 0.4 oz. About Han Cholo Han Cholo (the DJ name given to creator Brandon Schoolhouse by The Beastie Boys) provides geek bling for such luminaries as Ewan McGregor, Gwen Stefani, and Snoop Dogg. And now you, too."

column1: Star Wars Darth Vader Dangling Lightsaber Earrings,"You have coverage for accidental death and dismemberment, yes?

column3: In general, we do not recommend putting lightsabers next to your face. Yes, it makes for cool lighting effects. But unless you are at a master-level, you may accidentally cut off your nose. We mean, look. When's the last time you missed with your straw and accidentally stuck it up your nose? Yes. We saw that. We were just being polite, because we know how mortified we are when we do it. Please be careful with these Star Wars Star Wars Darth Vader Dangling Lightsaber Earrings. These are stud earrings featuring the Imperial Crest, only they also come with a lightsaber charm that you put the post through to create a dangle effect. The result? Two different looks from a single pair of earrings. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel.Product Specifications Star Wars Darth Vader Dangling Lightsaber EarringsOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise Imperial Crest stud earringsButterfly-style, friction (push) backs feature a dangling lightsaber charm and rubber stoppersLightsaber has 3 positions for adjustable lengthMaterials: Stainless steelImported Dimensions: 0.3"" diameter stud with 1.5"" long lightsaberAges 13+"

column1: Pokémon Poké Ball Watch,"Roar of time

column3: As a Pokémon trainer, you have a bit of flexibility. You probably don't want to be walking in to a Poké gym at 2am. Or maybe you do - maybe you'll have an advantage because everybody else just wants to go to bed. Either way, you have to know the time, so we've got that part covered.Make sure you're a punctual trainer with the Pokémon Poké Ball Watch. The clock face is the iconic Poké Ball, but we cannot stress enough - DO NOT THROW THIS. We did that test for you; we promise it only keeps time."

column1: Ikarus Ear Wrap,"Don't fly too high!

column3: Did you have your parents' approval the first time you got your ears pierced? Or the second? How about the first time you got a tattoo or had a drink? Many of the wisest people out there ignore sound advice simply because it is coming from the mouths of authority figures. Icarus did the same. He and his father were set to escape from Crete with wings made of wax and feathers and his father warned him not to fly too low or too high. He ignored his father's advice and fueled by hubris (we get to use that word here because it's a Greek mythological tragedy) ventured to close to the sun. His wax wings melted and he plunged to his death in the sea. Show your rebellious side with this Steampunk-inspired Ikarus Ear Wrap. For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made of English pewter, which is a mixture of tin, antimony, and copper. It is free of both lead and nickel. The post is surgical-steel, which is a mixture of chromium, nickel, and molybdenum. The back is plastic.Product SpecificationsIkarus Ear WrapSteampunk-inspired left ear wrap featuring gears and a wingEar wrap - single for left ear onlyRequires one standard ear piercing in your left earGreat for any rebel that dares to fly too highMaterials: English Pewter with surgical steel postMade in EnglandDimensions: 1.9"" x 2.3"" x 0.7"""

column1: Star Wars Rebel Symbol Faux Leather Choker,"Chokers, not choke holds!

column3: Darth Vader may enjoy inflicting his special psychic choke holds, but we ""Rebel scum"" prefer our chokers to be accessories and not Sith Lords! This adorable necklace features the Alliance Starbird symbol hanging from the black band, proclaiming your Rebel spirit. But don't worry - at only a half an inch wide, it's subtle enough to pass through a checkpoint without getting you busted by any Stormtroopers. For our customers with nickel allergies: This may contain nickel.Product SpecificationsStar Wars Rebel Symbol Velvet ChokerOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseMetal pendant shaped like the Alliance Starbird symbolBlack band, because why should the Sith lords get all the cool black accessories?Features a lobster clasp with adjustable chainCapacity: one brave Rebel at a timeMaterials: Faux leather / zinc alloyDimensions: Pendant is 1/2"" wide. Choker band is 1/4"" wide, and adjusts from 6"" to 7 1/2"" in diameter."

column1: Pizza Charm Necklace,"A Little Slice of Heaven

column3: We love pizza so much, we're ready to throw down and say that it might just be the perfect food. All four food groups are represented: from the soft-yet-crispy carb crust, to the fruit/vegetable tomato sauce, to the calcium-rich dairy cheese, to our choice of protein-filled toppings (pepperoni is a classic favorite, of course). All in one dish that doesn't require any utensils or even a plate, if you're well-trained in the arts of slice balancing. And it can even feed a crowd... if we were willing to share, that is.We could wear our love for pizza on our sleeves, but that could get very messy. Instead, we keep this classy little pizza charm close to our hearts to show our undying affection. Strung around our necks, it's like a little trophy of all the slices we have conquered before, and will conquer again soon.For our customers with nickel allergies: Yellow gold typically does not contain nickel. Sterling silver version may contain nickel."

column1: Star Wars R2-D2 Charm Bead,"Bleep Bloop Beed

To purchase a silver bracelet with this bead, click here.  To purchase a leather bracelet with this bead, click here.  To see all our charm beads, click here. Everyone loves R2, and guess what? He loves you, too. He loves you so much, he wants to hug onto your wrist and hang out there. Awww. His back is plain, so don't flip him over. He's sensitive about that. PANDORA, Chamilia, Biagi, Troll) Back is plainMaterials: 316L surgical stainless steel Dimensions: 10mm along the bracelet, 4.7mm hole WARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age"
Necronomicon Necklace,"That Is Not Dead Which Can Eternal Lie

column3: The Necronomicon, the grimoire of the Cthulhu mythos is said to have originally been written by Abdul Alhazred, the ""Mad Arab"", in approximately 738 AD and to contain accounts of the Old Ones, their history and the means by which to summon them. The very act of studying the text is inherently dangerous, as those who attempt to master its arcane knowledge generally meet terrible ends. Will you take such a chance in unlocking the secrets of the Old Ones?Inspired by the gothic horror stories of HP Lovecraft, this locket-like Necronomicon necklace has been skillfully crafted in nickle-plated bronze and carefully hand finished. The book pendant is hinged so that it can open and close, if you dare. On the outside, you'll find hand carved designs containing ancient symbols to bind, contain, and capture the dark secrets held within the book. The patterns along the sides of the book are abstract depictions of Cthulhu and Yog-Sothoth. The corner caps of the book are engraved with the Elder Sign to hold the Old Ones and their servants at bay. Open the book to find the infamous rhyming couplet engraved in Arabic:   That is not dead which can eternal lie. And with strange aeons even death may die.  For our customers with nickel allergies: The pendant is made from nickle-plated bronze. The chain is made from stainless steel. That means it could contain nickel. This is implant-grade steel."

column1: GotG Groot Charm Bracelet,"Say the magic words!

column3: Groot (Flora colossus) is a very tall, very tree-like creature. He has very rigid vocal cords (they are made out of wood, ya know) which makes all his speech sound like, ""I am Groot."" Frankly, we think this is a bunch of bunk. We think Groot can say all sorts of things, he just chooses not to. Why? It's just one of those weird, movie star quirks.  Well, with this bracelet, at least you'll hear him coming, even if he doesn't say a word. Or just three words. One of those stylish, adjustable wire bangles, this bracelet has a charm with the the declaration ""I am Groot,"" baby Groot's head, a gold spore with crystal in the middle, and a Marvel logo hanging from it. The adorable charms are plated in sterling silver or gold, so don't expect them to be breaking out the ""I am Groot"" any time soon. For our customers with nickel allergies: Both the charms and bangle are nickel-free. Product Specifications GotG Groot Charm BraceletOfficially-licensed Guardians of the Galaxy vol. 2 merchandise Adjustable stainless steel bangle""I Am Groot,"" baby Groot's head, Marvel, and spore charmsMaterials: Nickel-free silver-plated charms, gold-plated charm, & stainless-steel bangle Dimensions: 0.7"" tall ""I Am Groot"" charmAbout RockLove Jewelry After an old-world apprenticeship in Florence, Italy, designer and jeweler Allison Hourcade Cimino fused her love of historical eras and geek culture to develop RockLove. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Star Wars I Love You / I Know  Faux Leather Bracelet,"Royalty and Nerf-Herder, Together

column3: When you're about to be encased in carbonite, the most important thing to know is not, ""How exactly am I supposed to breathe?"" or ""Is there a way to use the bathroom?"" No, it's whether or not the love of your life loves you in return. We all love a little reassurance, and while we don't get encased in carbonite around here too often, we regularly get buried in deadlines, which is much the same thing. That's why we're happy to present the officially-licensed Star Wars I Love You / I Know bracelet. It features silhouettes of Han and Leia in their final gaze before the carbonite freeze and an adjustable strap. It's the perfect way to remind the love of your life that even an untested hibernation sequence can't keep you apart. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel.Product Specifications Star Wars I Love You / I Know BraceletOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandiseA ThinkGeek exclusive Two adjustable snapsPerfect for the scruffy nerf-herder or the royal general in your lifeMaterials: Faux leather strap; stainless steel metalImported Dimensions: Adjusts from 7 1/2"" to 8 1/4"" aroundWARNING - SMALL PARTS - Not intended for children under 3 years of age."

column1: Sterling Pokémon Pikachu Dangle Charm Bead,"Pikachu's Charm is Electric

column3: To see all our charm beads, click here.Oh, what, so Pichu can learn ""Charm,"" but somehow Pikachu can't? We protest! Pikachu is perhaps the most charming of all the Pokémon! Observe how everyone seems to fall in love with Ash's Pikachu, immediately. Now tell us that doe-faced Poké isn't throwing out a super-effective Charm all the time! No, we know better. No matter what the moveset says, Pikachu always has Charm. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from nickel-free sterling silver.Product SpecificationsSterling Pokémon Pikachu Dangle Charm BeadOfficially-licensed Pokémon merchandiseFits all major brands of bracelet (inc. column1: Bob's Burgers "The Final Kraut Down" Burger Watch,"(Does not come with sauerkraut)

column3: We got these from the shop that was next door briefly. You know - We Will We Will Clock You, Watch and Clock Emporium. Window sign: It's about time. And that's why we're the exclusive retailers. We bought them all at their going-out-of-business sale.This Bob's Burgers watch will tell you when it's time for the next episode. Or your 4:30 meeting. Yeah. Your 4:30. The digital watch face decorated by flying hamburgers is protected by a flip-up hamburger. The band features the Bob's Burgers logo in case you or someone observing you is confused. column1: Wall-E Robot Watch,"12:30?! AUTO, why didn't you wake us for morning announcements?

Well, good morning, everybody, and welcome to Day 255,642 aboard the Axiom. As always, the weather is a balmy 72 degrees and sunny, and, uh... Oh, I see the ship's log is showing that today is the 700th anniversary of our five year cruise. Well, I'm sure our forefathers would be proud to know that 700 years later we'd be... doing the exact same thing they were doing. So, be sure next mealtime to ask for your ""Free Septuacentennial Cupcake In A Cup""! Wow, look at that.
- The Captain

Wall-E. He's a little robot with a lot of time on his hands. And now you can have both Wall-E and an infinite amount of time on your hands, literally with this Wall-E robot watch. With a face 2"" across, Wall-E's soulful black eyes will peer back at you every time you check your watch, as if to say, ""Why are you stuck in this meeting / class / boring thing you're doing? You're merely surviving. Don't you want to live?!"" Let this watch remind you to get out there in a timely manner."
Lion King Hakuna Matata Watch,"What a wonderful phrase

column3: It's always Hakuna Matata time. When they say for the rest of your days, they mean the rest of your days. It doesn't start at noon and end after dinner time - it means no worries 24x7. Just keep that in mind the next time your dog pees on the carpet again and makes you late for work. Imagine how much worse it'd be if he were a warthog.Make sure you have a constant reminder strapped to your wrist about Hakuna Matata. You're never late for that, because that would mean you're probably worried. For everything else, let Simba, Timon, and Pumbaa help keep you punctual."

column1: Player 1 Player 2 Pendant Necklace Set,"Button mashing discouraged

column3: Bring back memories of those classic arcade days with this Player 1 Player 2 Pendant Necklace Set. This comes as a set of 2 necklaces: the 1 Player Start button and the 2 Player Start button. Keep one for yourself and give one to your player 2, or keep 'em both for yourself and indicate your current play status by which one you're wearing.For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. This item may have small amounts of nickel, but they're low enough to meet the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC."

column1: Marvel Deadpool Cowabunga Pendant,"Stop worrying and love the bomb

column3: We can kind of imagine Deadpool popping up as an extra in the Kubrick classic Dr. Strangelove. He actually could survive a nuclear armageddon, and he would totally ride a bomb like a rodeo clown, and ""strangelove"" accurately describes most of his relationships (looking at you, Death). But the fact is that Deadpool doesn't need to take part in a darkly comic Hollywood satire - he's got his hands full making it through all the Marvel crossover events as it is! If you're looking to add some more 'Pool do your arsenal of accessories, then we have a necklace that'll be perfect for you. In fact, it's DA BOMB. See what we did there? CUZ IT'S A BOMB. We have fun here! Anyway, this nifty necklace comes on a stainless steel chain. The base metal studded bomb-shaped pendant has a painted heart and smiley Deadpool face on the front. It's cute and it's badass - just like the Merc with a Mouth!For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. They are usually reserved for the Hollywood elite, such as Meowzie's trainer in the Indigo League anime episode ""Go West Young Meowth,"" where we learned Meowth's heartbreaking backstory. Oh boy, the feels! But it also left us wondering... where can we get a jewel-encrusted Poké Ball!?!Right here, that's where! column3: This ring is for people who love all of Star Trek. You can't pick a division color, because they're all great. You can't pick a series, because they each had their strengths. You can't pick a favorite captain because - okay. Maybe you can pick a favorite captain. In honor of Star Trek's 50th anniversary, RockLove made this crystal version of their Star Trek Sterling Starfleet Trillion Ring exclusively for ThinkGeek. We said, ""What about the people who need more than one division color?"" This was their clever solution. Each of these rings is handmade in New York City from nickel-free artisan silver. column1: Krishina Crystal Floral Choker,"Online flower ordering

column3: Online flower ordering is one of the things that makes us think twice about online grocery ordering. Sometimes the bouquet you see on the site has only a passing resemblance to what ends up being delivered to your recipient, areweright? ""Look, that's not what an avocado looks like to me. You totally substituted a pear, and that's no good. Yes, they're both green and both plants, but they're not the same thing.""Don't worry about us substituting carnations for your roses in this bouquet. This sparkling open collar choker is set with 21 Swarovski pavé flowers and a dusty rose bloom at the center. It's a statement piece, and that statement is, ""These flowers won't die the day after you get them."" Another bonus. column1: Stitches Ring,"... and possibly after death, too

Those friends thou hast, and their adoption tried, Grapple them unto thy soul with hoops of steel - Polonius, Hamlet, Act I, Scene 3   The stitches and staples on the exterior of this ring? They're not the kind that dissolve. And they're not the type you go in to have removed. They're forever. And now you, too."
Daughters of Darkness Ear Wrap,"Immortal. Untouchable. Beautiful.

column3: The Pleiades were the seven daughters of Atlas (a Titan who led a war against Zeus) and the nymph Pleione. After Atlas lost his war, he was condemned to carry the heavens on his shoulders for all of eternity. (With no eternal chiropractor to help him, we're pretty sure.) Some stories say the Pleiades were heartbroken at the fate of their father and committed suicide - after which Zeus immortalized them in the stars, to comfort their father. Because looking up and being reminded your of your dead daughters while carrying a planet seems comforting? Greek gods were weird.Another story claims that Orion began pursuing the sisters in earnest after their father was condemned. Zeus devised a way to keep the Pleiades from Orion's clutches forever: he set them in the stars where Orion may always pursue them, but could never reach them. (That seems a bit more reassuring to a father with an eternally aching back.)Whichever version of the story you prefer, now you can wear the seven sisters in all their glory with the Daughters of Darkness Ear Wrap. Made with English pewter, the wrap depicts the Pleiades with seven Swarovski crystals, with the final one, Atlas, suspended on the dangle. The constellation can be gently bent to fit your right ear comfortably, while the post is fastened with a surgical steel post. (Yes, it's safe for those of us with nickel allergies!) For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made of English pewter, which is a mixture of tin, antimony, and copper. It is free of both lead and nickel. The post is surgical-steel, which is a mixture of chromium, nickel, and molybdenum. The back is plastic. Product Specifications Daughters of Darkness Ear WrapSingle ear wrap, for the right ear onlyRequires a single ear piercing in the right earPerfect for the lady at the center of your universeMaterials: Fine English pewter with Swarovski crystalsDimensions: 1.5"" wide x 3.4"" tall x 1.1"" deepTo adjust: Gently press the metal to fit the ear wrap around your ear. We like to warm ours with our hands or a hair dryer to make it more malleable."

column1: Rick and Morty Portal Watch,"And away we go!
Rick: Alright, listen, you two, we froze time for a pretty long time, so when I unfreeze it, the world's time is gonna be fine, but our time's gonna need a little time to, you know, stabilize.
Morty: Our time is gonna be unstable? What does that even mean?
- ""A Rickle in Time""

Yeah. We don't know either. However, you should know that Rick and Morty appear to have opened a portal on your wrist. And they seem to be stuck in it, as if someone's frozen time in the middle of them jumping. However, in your dimension time is clearly moving - you can watch it on this watch while you watch Rick and Morty swirl around endlessly. Note: Please notify us if Rick and Morty happen to get out of the portal on your wrist."
Star Wars Luke Skywalker Lightsaber Ear Jacket Earrings,"You have coverage for accidental death and dismemberment, yes?

column3: In general, we do not recommend putting lightsabers next to your face. Yes, it makes for cool lighting effects. But unless you are at a master-level, you may accidentally cut off your nose. We mean, look. When's the last time you missed with your straw and accidentally stuck it up your nose? Yes. We saw that. We were just being polite, because we know how mortified we are when we do it. Please be careful with these Star Wars Luke Skywalker Lightsaber Ear Jacket Earrings. See, the hilt has a post, and the lightsaber blade slides onto it. So, theoretically, you could put plain backs on the hilt and walk around with unlit lightsabers in your ears. Which is safer, but where's the fun in that?For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. column1: Kingdom Hearts Heartless Cuff Bracelet,"Darkness made real

column3: Wherever there is darkness, you'll find Heartless. Which means, basically, that we're everywhere. Oops. We mean ""they."" They're everywhere. Those Heartless scum. *shakes imaginary fist not entirely convincingly*Sometimes you gotta admit it'd be much easier to go through life without emotions. Isn't that what the Stoics aspired to? Well, they probably weren't thinking of video games back in ancient Greece and Rome, but they were on to something. If you don't have a heart, it can't get broken. Side with the Darkness today and don this bracelet. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel."

column1: Star Wars Vader Saber Bracelet & Ring - Exclusive,"The Force is within your grasp

column3: It's a Friday night and it's been a long week. Princess threatened, Alderaan destroyed, all those Stormtroopers. Sigh. It's times like these Vader is glad the door to his quarters has a lock. He makes a nice cup of tea, puts on some B'eEthoven, and treats himself to something to make him feel pretty. With the gloves and the cybernetics, he never gets to wear jewelry out, or at least not so anybody else can admire it. And what's the point of jewelry if nobody's checking out your bling, being jealous? At least it should be able to make you feel better in your quarters at the end of a long day.That's why Vader has his favorite personal weapon, a weapon for a more civilized age, immortalized as both a bracelet and a ring. Wear them on your right or your left, depending on your personal encounters with lightsabers. The all-gold version of these are a ThinkGeek exclusive. Our ring arrived with an interior diameter of c. 20mm, but it's adjustable, so it should fit at least one of your fingers by the time you're done. Bracelet is also adjustable. Oh, and always watch your hands when working with lightsabers.For our customers with nickel allergies: these are made from stainless steel.Product Specifications Vader Saber Bracelet & RingOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise Choose bracelet or ringAll gold version is a ThinkGeek exclusive One size fits lots of adult handsRing has tiny red CZ stone detail Bracelet inscription reads ""The power of the Dark Side""Materials: Stainless steelDimensions: Ring: 8mm wide at the handle, 20mm interior diameter out of the box (adjustable)Bracelet: 8mm wide at the handle, 65mm interior diameter, 185mm (7 1/3"") longWeight: .2 oz.About Han Cholo Han Cholo (the DJ name given to creator Brandon Schoolhouse by The Beastie Boys) provides geek bling for such luminaries as Ewan McGregor, Gwen Stefani, and Snoop Dogg. And now you, too."

column1: Voltron Red Lion Ring,"Bring a sword to a gunfight

column3: It's okay that Keith as the pilot of the Red Lion brings a sword to these fights where everybody else and their brother is equipped with laser guns. Know why? 1) He's a hero, 2) He's faster than everybody else, and 3) He also brought a flamethrower. *mic drop*Did you sense that this ring was here? Well, take on your rightful role as the Guardian Spirit of the Fire with this Voltron Red Lion Ring. A huge statement piece, this thing measures almost 2 inches in all directions. When you wear this behemoth, no one will doubt that you have the power to defend the universe. For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. column1: D&D Mind Flayer Pendant Necklace,"We have half a mind to get this pendant

column3: Oh, the Illithid. How we loathe thee. The Underdark may be a lovely shade of purple but it contains lots of unpleasantness, including fungus, big ol' spiders, and you guys. To be clear: some people like fungus or spiders. Nobody likes you guys.Prehensile is a quality we value in creatures who are cute and on our side. Not so much in Mind Flayers. This one appears to be clutching a d20 in his face tentacles, and look - he rolled a 20. We hear it's easier if you don't resist. In fact, perhaps we're carrying this necklace because our buyer's been coopted. If they ask to turn all the lights off in the warehouse, we're saving as many of the warehouse monkeys as we can before we split.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. (Some of us were still in grade school. It was our generation's version of, ""I cried when Hedwig died."") Imagine how we broke into applause when, just a few frames later, THERE'S ARTOO! Shiny, happy, and squeal-beeping with delight! Celebrate that moment with the Star Wars R2-D2 Ear Cuff and Crystal Stud Earrings Set. What does it mean to be a Warlock? Power. Only Warlocks understand true power. True power lies in knowledge. In understanding. Power channeled... not controlled. - Ikora Rey   The warrior scholars, the first to tap the power of the Traveler, Warlocks know that each new discovery offers new possibilities. column3: When we say Roxas is a ""Nobody,"" generic humans probably think that's an insult, but Kingdom Hearts fans know we're just tellin' the truth like it is. So it's only right that his symbol is a Nobody's, only a little off-kilter, just like Roxas himself.This pendant was modeled after Roxas's cross zipper pull during his time in Twilight Town. (With a pair of small pliers you can easily open the jump ring to turn it into a zipper pull.) Grab yourself a scoop of sea-salt ice cream, this necklace, and you'll have the easiest cosplay ever. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel."

column1: 8-Bit Hearts Watch,"Talk about a lifetime...

column3: Time means nothing when you're raiding that last dungeon. Well, it means nothing to *you*, unless you're on a speedrun. For some reason bosses and parents are still sticklers for timeliness. So if you're more likely to check your life bar than your watch, we have the solution: now you can wear your vitality right on your arm with this ThinkGeek exclusive watch, styled like a retro video game health meter! Three 8-bit inspired metal hearts, which can be repositioned along the watchband, surround the larger watch face heart. The bad news is: your health is already down a heart and a half. The good news? You've totally run a level on less!"

column1: Star Trek Vintage Style Brooch Set,"Warp core brooch!

column3: When we say ""brooch"" you probably think of your grandmother, right? These are a modern take on brooches. These are not your granny's brooches. Unless she's Nichelle Nichols.This Star Trek Vintage Style Brooch Set is a set of 4 acrylic brooches. Part of the ThinkGeek Star Trek Collection by Her Universe, these pins look equally at home putting the finishing touch on that fabulous scarf or hanging out with all your con badges on the strap of your laptop bag. Bonuses of the more modern form factor: they're lightweight and you won't lose any of the gemstones out of them (since there aren't any). Which means if you're hunting for dilithium crystals, it ain't our fault. column1: Pizza Charm Stud Earrings,"Little Slices of Heaven

column3: We love pizza so much, we're ready to throw down and say that it might just be the perfect food. All four food groups are represented: from the soft-yet-crispy carb crust, to the fruit/vegetable tomato sauce, to the calcium-rich dairy cheese, to our choice of protein-filled toppings (pepperoni is a classic favorite, of course). All in one dish that doesn't require any utensils or even a plate, if you're well-trained in the arts of slice balancing. And it can even feed a crowd... if we were willing to share, that is.We could wear our love for pizza on our sleeves, but that could get very messy. Instead, we have these classy little pizza charms on our ears to show our undying affection. The little pizzas rest lightly, whispering to us all day long a sweet serenade of the tasty treat that awaits us when we get our hands on that next ooey-gooey slice of heaven. For our customers with nickel allergies: Yellow gold typically does not contain nickel. column1: Black Panther Claw Pendant Necklace,"""I am the king of a small African nation.""

column3: T'Challa is one of the most versatile Marvel heroes. As Black Panther he has served on several teams, including the Avengers and the Fantastic Four. He's one of their smartest minds, on par with Reed Richards and Tony Stark. He was married to Storm from the X-Men for a time. He's been the King of Wakanda and also the King of the Dead. He's fought nearly every foe under the sun to save his people, his world, and all of reality - and he does it all in a mysterious head-to-toe black costume with a claw collar.  We can't seem to pull off footy pajamas-as-daywear (not that we haven't tried! #lifegoals), but we can take a page out of the Black Panther lookbook with this stainless steel claw pendant necklace. This goth-edgy piece is inspired by his costume, but subtle enough to wear every day. The claw pendants have a contrasting black PVD coating - because obviously we aren't going to risk any heroic wrath by using actual animal claws! Each one hangs from the end of the long 30"" chain, which crosses in the front for a long lariat style look. It probably won't give you any added athletic prowess (only the Panther God can do that), but you can still look fierce! For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel. column1: Geistalon Pendant Necklace,"Guy-Sta-Lon

column3: Everyone assumes that all unicorns are these happy-go-lucky, rainbow-pooping magical creatures. Children love them. Ladies adore them. But anyone living in the real world should know that nothing is ever quite as good as it seems. Even the unicorn species has its dark side. Enter the Geistalon (pronounced guy-sta-lon), an armored cataphract unicorn known for its terrifying and decisive intervention in battle. This Geistalon necklace will perfectly represent you if you have a bit of a dark side. This fine English pewter necklace from Alchemy jewelry features a Geistalon pendant with a 20-inch black chain and morningstar ball suspended beneath. For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made of English pewter, which is a mixture of tin, antimony, and copper. It is free of both lead and nickel."

Plus, won't this whole place be run by a single Stormtrooper eventually if Lord Vader keeps up his termination and promotion practices?As an Imperial, you should dress your best for the job you want to keep. column1: New Moon Charmed Simplicity Necklace,"Dark Side of the Moon

column3: What we now call the New Moon - the moon phase where the it is not seen from Earth due to sharing the same ecliptical longitude with the Sun - used to be referred to as the Dark Moon. And there's also such a thing as a Black Moon: it's the New Moon equivalent of a Blue Moon; the second New Moon in a single month.  Enjoy this period of rebirth, the start of a new cycle, with a New Moon Charmed Simplicity Necklace. A darkened blue image of the moon's face, set in silver, to represent the darkened moon that we cannot see from Earth. Like the moon itself, it captures the rays of the sun by day to illuminate the night's darkness... in other words, it glows in the dark! A magnificent moon charm by day or night, hanging from a delicate 18-inch sterling silver link chain. For our customers with nickel allergies: Both the pendant and chain are nickel-free. column1: Solar Eclipse Moonstock Bangle Bracelet,"Timelessly sublime

column3: There are all sorts of trends in jewelry. There were the jelly bracelets, the big chains, and the puffy heart pendant back in the 80s. The chokers and toe rings of the 90s. The silicone bracelets and druzy of the 2000s. But natural phenomena have one advantage over all of these - they're pretty much guaranteed to be timelessly sublime.Pick up a Solar Eclipse Moonstock Bangle Bracelet today as a remembrance of the 2017 eclipse. It's guaranteed not to go out of style, because, well, space doesn't go out of style. Nobody says, ""Kepler-186f is SO last week."" Enjoy your own personal solar eclipse for many years to come. For our customers with nickel allergies: Both the pendant and chain are nickel-free."

column1: 8-Bit Watch,"20 Minutes into the Past

column3: In the heyday of Atari, the coveted watches were either Swatches with their awesome silicone bands or digital watches with calculators built in. For those, basically the bigger they were the better they were. So although this watch never would have been popular back in the day, it lets us remember back to a simpler time. Say... 5:30. This 8-Bit Watch is analog with an understated face and a pixelated jaggy silicone band. With black stainless steel findings and a black band, it's extra sleek, almost sucking in the light around it. Okay. It's just a watch. It's not going to cause a hole in the time-space continuum. But it's a neat looking watch, and one you won't find anywhere else."

Masters of the Universe Tri-Klops Ring,"Eyes in the back of your hand

column3: If you could have only one of Tri-Klops's powers (which, for today's exercise are Gammavision, the ability to see through solid objects; Night-vision, the ability to see in the dark; and Dista-vision, the ability to see long distances), which one would you choose? Dista-vision seems like a weird thing to have if you presumably can't see in 3D since you have one eye doing all the work. You wouldn't know if something was right next to you and small or really far away and huge. Heck, with two eyes, we still have trouble with that sometimes. Moving on. With this Masters of the Universe Tri-Klops Ring, you don't have to choose. Fashioned after Tri-Klops's rotating visor helmet, it features all three eyes. Spin the band to have a specific eye facing up. This is particularly useful if you're following a canon where they shoot energy bolts. Pew pew pew all the annoying things. So they took them back to the studio and turned them into cuffs, complete with ominous skulls on the pommel, guard, and chappe. column1: Steamhammer Pendant,"The hammer for blowing off some steam

column3: Thor's Hammer actually was forged from steam. Well, okay, not so much steam as metal and Dwarf-power. But it's because of hot air (yeah, fine, no water = no steam) that the handle's so short. Or, rather, it's because Loki's kind of an asshole (it's his thing) and he turned into a fly so he could bite the dwarf manning the bellows providing oxygen to the fire in the forge which made blood run into said Dwarf's eye, and when he reached up to wipe it away, the handle got messed up because the fire cooled down. The moral of the story being if you interact with Loki, you should probably hang flypaper. But we digress. This huge Steamhammer Pendant is a statement piece. It's a great size for guys, but it also works for women who like chunky jewelry. Good for fans of Norse mythology, Thor, and steampunk - really, anybody who falls into any part of that Venn diagram, but especially folks smack dab in the middle. For our customers with nickel allergies: These are made of English pewter, which is a mixture of tin, antimony, and copper. It is free of both lead and nickel.Product Specifications Steamhammer Pendant22"" fixed curb chain with 1"" extender and lobster-clasp closureGreat for steampunk-loving guys and women who like chunky jewelryFront of pendant has non-working cogs and gaugesReverse has a relief of the cogs all in brass  - it's almost like two different pendantsMaterials: Two-tone fine English pewter with brass inlayDimensions: 1 1/2"" wide x 2 1/2"" tall x 1/3"" deepWeight: 1 1/4 oz."

column1: New Moon Moonstock Bangle Bracelet,"New Moon, New You

column3: What we now call the New Moon - the moon phase where the it is not seen from Earth due to sharing the same ecliptical longitude with the Sun - used to be referred to as the Dark Moon. And there's also such a thing as a Black Moon: it's the New Moon equivalent of a Blue Moon; the second New Moon in a single month.  Enjoy this period of rebirth, the start of a new cycle, with a New Moon Moonstock Bangle Bracelet. A darkened blue image of the moon's face, set in silver, to represent the darkened moon that we cannot see from Earth. Like the moon itself, it captures the rays of the sun by day to illuminate the night's darkness... in other words, it glows in the dark! A magnificent moon charm by day or night, set in silver and hanging from an adjustable stainless steel bangle. For our customers with nickel allergies: Both the charm and bangle are nickel-free."

column1: Kingdom Hearts Sora Cosplay Necklace,"Key to our heart

column3: We love Kingdom Hearts. What's not to like? RPGs? Good! Fast-paced combat? Good! Disney? Goooooood! Good luck following the timeline of all the events through all the spinoff games, though. No matter if we can keep everything straight, Sora will always be our anchor. We may not be able to pull of those crazy balloon pants like he does, but we can at least rock the accessories.Represent one of your favorite video game franchises and one of your favorite keyblade masters with this cosplay necklace. Chain is 21"" long and comes with a 4"" extender, just in case, and features Sora's iconic crown pendant. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel."

column1: Star Trek Friendship Necklace,"Make Friends and Prosper

column3: Travel back to the time of friendship bracelets, secret handshakes, passing notes, sleepovers, and Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan. It was in this movie that Spock uttered those famous words to James T. Kirk: ""I have been, and always shall be, your friend."" After Spock saved the Enterprise and its crew, he spoke these words to the man that had been his best friend since their Starfleet Academy days. If you have a bestie who is also a Trekkie, or a partner who shares your love of the original series, this Star Trek Friendship Necklace is the perfect gift for yourself and for them. Wear one half and give the other to whomever you like. Or, the two halves of the Starfleet insignia pendant also fasten together with magnets and can be worn together, if you're still looking for your ideal Star Trek counterpart. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel.Product SpecificationsStar Trek Friendship NecklaceOfficially-licensed Star Trek merchandisePendant is shaped like a Starfleet insignia deltaPendant splits in half with one half of the quote on each half - two chains includedTwo halves lock together with magnetsWear one half; have a good friend wear the otherAlso perfect for Star Trek-loving couplesCloses with lobster claspsMaterials: Metal with hand burnishingIncludes magnetic fasteners on each pendantDimensions: 18 1/2"" long chains, pendants are 2"" tall and 3/4"" wide when separated"

column1: Star Wars Leia Stacked Pendants Necklace,"Keep Carrie Close to your Heart

column3: We knew her as the feisty Princess Leia, who grew to be a General in the resistance. Her very presence in the Star Wars universe taught us so much: Sometimes, you have to take your rescue into your own hands. Sometimes, you're the last remaining chance for victory when the guy everyone *else* pins their hopes on proves to be a little impulsive. Sometimes, you've gotta put your hair in some buns and get the dirty work done yourself.We want to help you keep her close to your heart with this Star Wars Leia Stacked Pendants Necklace. The two 3/4"" discs are the right size for daily wear, and the 16"" chain comes with an extension to 18"", so you can fit it to any outfit. Including that great Hoth one with the puffer vest.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is plated with rhodium.Product SpecificationsStar Wars Leia Stacked Pendants NecklaceOfficially-licensed Star Wars merchandise Two 3/4 inch discsOne with a cut-out silhouette of Princess Leia's iconic hairOne stamped with ""May the Force Be With You"" Perfect for every self-rescuing princess on your gift list16"" chain with 2"" extender (for a total length of 18"") and spring ring claspMaterials: Rhodium plated zinc alloyDimensions: pendants are 3/4"" diameter16"" chain with 2"" extender (for a total length of 18"")Ages 13+"

column1: D&D Twin Dragon Ring,"Two heads are better than one

column3: Halt, adventurer! No one should enter these lands unaccompanied, for there is danger at every turn. But the protection and friendship of a magical creature companion would keep you safe. There are, of course, owls and newts and black cats, but for an adventurer such as you? We think only a dragon (or two) will do!Protect yourself with this D&D Twin Dragon Ring. These metallic dragons are made from steel and pair well with our D&D Breathing Dragon Cuff Bracelet for a total of four protective dragons wrapped around your body. Nobody's going to mess with that.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. This item may have small amounts of nickel, but they're low enough to meet the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC.Product SpecificationsD&D Twin Dragon RingOfficially-licensed Dungeons & Dragons merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at Han CholoAn adjustable steel ring with dragons' heads at either endMaterials: Stainless steelImported Right off the shelf, it's made to fit a size 8 1/2(But it's austenitic steel so if you heat it, it's a little malleable)Weight: 1/4 oz. About Han Cholo Han Cholo (the DJ name given to creator Brandon Schoolhouse by The Beastie Boys) provides geek bling for such luminaries as Ewan McGregor, Gwen Stefani, and Snoop Dogg. And now you, too."

column1: D&D Dragon Claw Drop Earrings,"Technically, this is a Steel Dragon, but that's a fictional rock band...

column3: In Forgotten Realms lore, Silver Dragons are often encountered masquerading as humans, because they apparently like hanging out with us (and also like pie, which is much easier to consume when you can use a fork). So, you know, these earrings would be the perfect gift for your favorite Silver Dragon in human form. Coming in at 2"" long total dangle, these are impressive Dungeons & Dragons earrings. They are each a not-insignificant quarter of an ounce in weight. No, you cannot remove the d20s from the dragon's grasp, and, no, you cannot use these in your game. For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316 grade surgical stainless steel. This item may have small amounts of nickel, but they're low enough to meet the guidelines set forth in EU Nickel Directive 94/27/EC.Product SpecificationsD&D Dragon Claw Drop EarringsOfficially-licensed Dungeons & Dragons merchandise A ThinkGeek exclusive from our friends at Han CholoDangle earrings of a silver dragon's claw gripping a golden d20Earwires with rubber stoppersMaterials: Stainless steelImported Dimensions: 2"" total dangle x 1/2"" acrossWeight: 1/4 oz. eachAbout Han Cholo Han Cholo (the DJ name given to creator Brandon Schoolhouse by The Beastie Boys) provides geek bling for such luminaries as Ewan McGregor, Gwen Stefani, and Snoop Dogg. And now you, too."

column1: Voltron Ring - Shadow Series ,"Defends your hand from robeast attack

From days of long ago, from uncharted regions of the universe, comes a legend. The legend of Voltron: Defender of the Universe. A mighty robot, loved by good, feared by evil. As Voltron's legend grew, jewelry was forged and sold across the galaxy. Okay, not really across the galaxy. Just here on Earth. Well, we're willing to sell across the galaxy, but UPS can't even manage P.O. boxes, let alone Mars. Sorry, Curiosity. That Astronaut Ice Cream's gonna have to wait.This Voltron Ring is ready to join with you to form something awesome. Fashioned from two-tone gold and silver stainless steel with black CZ stones, this is a serious statement piece. It works for guys or gals, but since we have it only in sizes 9-11, most gals will  need to wear it as a thumb ring. Speaking of which, why doesn't Voltron have thumbs? How can you be Defender of the Universe without a thumb?Product Specifications Voltron Ring - Shadow SeriesOfficially-licensed DreamWorks Animation merchandise Two-tone gold and silver steel with black CZ stoneAvailable in sizes 9, 10, and 11Great for guys or gals (thumb ring?)Materials: Stainless steelWeight: 1.2 oz.Note: If you thought this looked familiar, you're correct. This is, in fact, the same make as the one that Ryan Reynolds dons as Wade Wilson in Deadpool. No, we still won't accept tickets for it.About Han Cholo Han Cholo (the DJ name given to creator Brandon Schoolhouse by The Beastie Boys) provides geek bling for such luminaries as Ewan McGregor, Gwen Stefani, and Snoop Dogg. And now you, too."
Kingdom Hearts Keyblade Master Cuff Bracelet,"Have you passed the Mark of Mastery exam?

column3: It's good to be the Keyblade Master. You get to travel the universe to various worlds, take on and train worthy apprentices, and unlock and/or remove people's hearts. You know, likeyado. This bracelet is perfect if by day you appear to be a mild-mannered student or employee and it isn't practical for you to carry your keyblade around with you all the time. Wear this bracelet to let other fans of Kingdom Hearts know your true secret. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel."

column1: Guardians of the Galaxy Dancing Baby Groot Pendant Necklace,"Groovin' & Growin'

column3: Baby Groot literally steals the show every time he appears on screen, and we aren't even mad about it. He's pint-sized, adorable, and knows how to move. He's a twig of few words (but apparently they are generally well-chosen ones, according to Rocket and Star-Lord). We just want to carry him around everywhere.Thanks to the Guardians of the Galaxy Dancing Baby Groot Pendant Necklace, he can finally join you and even dance! The 1"" Baby Groot pendant is accompanied by a 17"" chain and 2"" extender. Articulated on two axes, Baby Groot dances as you move.For our customers with nickel allergies: This item may contain nickel.Product SpecificationsGuardians of the Galaxy Dancing Baby Groot Pendant NecklaceOfficially-licensed Guardians of the Galaxy merchandiseBaby Groot (in his flower pot) pendant dances as you moveMaterials: Base metalDimensions: 1"" tall pendant, 17"" chain with 2"" extender (19"" total)"

column1: GotG Sterling Climbing Groot Earrings,"Climbing the charts

column3: If we met adult Groot, we imagine it'd be super hard to avoid pulling a Rocket and scrambling up him for a better view. Especially when we were kids it would have been. Any tree with a foothold low enough was fair game for our mad climbing skillz. And Groot would be no exception.  This Groot is climbing. If he were on a tree, he could be a tree climbing tree. Of course, he's not really a tree, but imagine it for a second, just because it makes us giggle. And you are not a tree; it's your ear he's climbing. See, this Groot is soldered onto an earwire, and he looks like he's climbing up or dangling from your ear lobe. Whichever you'd prefer to imagine. They're your earrings, after all. For our customers with nickel allergies: This item is made from solid nickel-free sterling silver.Product Specifications GotG Sterling Climbing Groot EarringsOfficially-licensed Guardians of the Galaxy vol. 2 merchandiseGroot on an earwire looks like he's ready to climb up your earIncludes rubber stoppersMaterials: Solid nickel-free sterling silver with sterling earwiresDimensions: 1.4"" tall from where it goes through your hole to the bottom of Groot's footAbout RockLove JewelryAfter an old-world apprenticeship in Florence, Italy, designer and jeweler Allison Hourcade Cimino fused her love of historical eras and geek culture to develop RockLove. Each piece of jewelry is handcrafted from start to finish in NYC using precious metals, gemstones, and eco-friendly organic materials."

column1: Deadpool Product Placement Pack,"Deadpool without the Deadpool

column3: This is so meta - it's a Deadpool product without any Deadpool involved. What?! Yup. These are some of the products that the Merc with the Mouth sported in his cinematic masterpiece. We assume he got paid for them big time, because everybody knows it's all about the product placement. Now you can look like Deadpool even if red and black aren't your colors (an Autumn, are you? very flattering.) and your skin isn't constantly trying to regrow itself. Bonus.    What's included in the Deadpool Product Placement Pack?        Adventure Time Watch What time is it? CHIMICHANGA TIME! No wait. Adventure Time?       Voltron Ring - Shadow Series Skeeball tickets cannot be redeemed for this ring. sry.       Deadpool's Hello Kitty Backpack It'll tote your books, your laptop, your paperwork... or whatever.       Questions about individual products? Click on them to check out their full descriptions, including dimensions, materials, ingredients, and more."

column1: Harry Potter Lumos Hufflepuff Charm Bracelet,"Dedication, patience, and jewelry

A charm bracelet seems a very innocent trinket. What other piece of jewellery is so imbued with memory and sentiment? Why do we call those little masterpieces ""charms"" if not in allusion to their talismanic properties? They have meaning beyond the mercenary. They are personal amulets. - J.K. Rowling   When we heard we were getting a bunch of Harry Potter charms, we thought that was awesome, but we wondered how we were going to store said charms at the warehouse. Have a wizard sitting on one of the shelves, ready to incant when someone orders one? Magical logistics are complicated.Then we realized we were talking about a different kind of charm. This Lumos Hufflepuff Charm Bracelet lets you show off your HP fandom with three exclusive jewelry charms: the Hufflepuff House Crest (double-sided), the Sorting Hat, and a Lumos butterfly. We have more than a dozen additional charms for you to choose from. And, of course, if Hufflepuff isn't your House, we also have the other Houses available: Gryffindor, Ravenclaw, and Slytherin.For our customers with nickel allergies: Yellow gold typically does not contain nickel."
Marvel Infinity Gauntlet Stud Earrings,"Most Powerful Earrings in the Universe

column3: Now, you might have some objections to these Infinity Gauntlet earrings. First of all, there are two of them, but that's not actually much of a problem - we've already seen that there are, in fact, two Infinity Gauntlets out there (the right-handed one in Odin's Treasure room, and the left-handed one in Thanos's grubby mitts). But both of these Infinity Gauntlets are loaded up with Infinity Stones, and that's a problem, since there is definitely only one of each stone out there. Right? Whoa, we hope we're right about that...Thankfully, each of these Infinity Gauntlet Stud Earrings is loaded up with replicas of the real Infinity Stones, so you don't have to worry about say, accidentally blinking half the universe out of existence with a mere thought when you wear them. Because that would be awkward. But they are shiny and nice to look at, and they're such convincing little replicas that you might even throw Thanos off for a second, which could give the time to swipe the real thing from him. Once you obtain the ultimate power in the universe, please just remember the friends at ThinkGeek who sold you those earrings in the first place, okay? We don't so much want to be blinked out of existence.For our customers with nickel allergies: This is made from 316L grade surgical stainless steel. That means the five main components are iron, chromium, nickel (10-14%), molybdenum, and manganese. This is implant-grade steel.Product SpecificationsMarvel Infinity Gauntlet Stud EarringsOfficially-licensed Marvel merchandise Goldtone gauntlets with small gems attached. Large green gem on back of hand, small red gem on thumb, small yellow, blue, sky blue and clear gems on fingers. Perfect gift for the aspirational go-getter in your life that just wants to rule the universe.Friction push backsMaterials: Gold-tone 316L surgical stainless steelCare Instructions: Clean jewelry daily with warm soapy water. If irritation occurs remove jewelry.Dimensions: Each earring measures 3/4"" from front to end of backing. Fist measures approximately 1/4"" wide x 1/3"" long x 1/4"" tall Ages 13+"

column1: Crit Success D20 Belt and Wallet Gift Set,"Pick a little something up at Gnome Depot

column3: Sure, gold pieces may have inherent value, more than a piece of paper or plastic, but they're kind of complicated to carry around. When the Sacagawea dollar coins came out, we pondered bringing some with us to the Renaissance festival, but once you cover your obligatory turkey leg and your mead and your pointy princess hat with the tulle, you've got some serious mass hanging from your belt. Possibly enough to call for a new belt. Show off your D&D fandom with this Crit Success D20 Belt and Wallet Gift Set. The canvas belt features an oversized d20 buckle worthy of Wolowitz and the bifold wallet has a small metal d20 on front."

column1: Periodic Table Belt and Wallet Gift Set,"Periodically useful

column3: While we call this set ""periodically useful,"" we have to admit that keeping your money and your pants in place are pretty useful skills all the time. And if you've ever wanted to quiz yourself on the elements while paying for gas or putting your pants on, we have the ultimate gift set for you. This canvas wallet and belt set will help you remember the symbols for Astatine, Phosphorus, Cesium, Barium, Lead, Hydrogen, Lithium, Titanium, Aluminum, Fluorine, Helium, Beryllium, Argon, Nickel, Calcium, Potassium, Bromine, Indium, Carbon, Silver, Xenon, Radium, Francium, Radon, Gold, Sulfur, Gallium, Chlorine, Neon, Nitrogen, Magnesium, Sodium, Iron, Rubidium, Oxygen, Thallium, Zinc, Strontium, Krypton, Iodine, Ununseptium (now known as Tennessine - Go Vols!), and Tin. After all, who ever remembers that Sn = tin? Not us, that's for sure."

column1: Batman Light Up Buckle,"Light it up

column3: Usually Batsy and light don't go together, but for this, we are willing to make an exception. We have a belt buckle for those of you who want to scream out your favorite fandoms from the mountain tops (under which you keep your Batcave) - especially if those fandoms include Batman.  The Batman Light Up Buckle is a belt buckle that looks just like the iconic Bat Signal, and just like it, lights up! Clip this bad boy on any standard belt and let everyone know that you're a big fan of the caped crusader and his work. Really top notch stuff.  Product Specifications Batman Light Up BuckleOfficially-licensed Batman merchandiseLight up belt buckle that looks like the Bat SignalLatches on to standard belt On/off switch for when you need to signal the Bat and when all is safeCharges by micro-USB - no batteries requiredCharging cord included - 12"" lengthDimensions: 4 1/2"" x 2 1/2"" x 3/4"""

column1: Overwatch Belt,"The world could always use more heroes

column3: Just like the characters from Overwatch, your apparel choices clarify your abilities. And if you choose to wear this belt, we bet your super ability has something to do with playing Overwatch. Or possibly it has something to do with keeping your pants on in challenging situations. We don't need to know the backstory there, hero. Thanks, though.This Overwatch Belt is reversible! It's black on one side and grey on the other, because the creators didn't want to go all crazy and apparently they've seen our wardrobes. The metal buckle features Overwatch logo in glossy enamel. And instructions are included so you can can trim the belt to customize the fit."

column1: Atomic Belt and Wallet Gift Set,"The next small thing

This is a belt worthy of our favorite Wolowizard. Although we're not sure if he ever wears the old atomic model featured in the show's logo as a belt buckle. That might just be too self-referential even for The Big Bang Theory.

Whether you're a fan of atoms or the show, this belt and wallet set are sure to make you feel positive, just like a proton. The strap of the belt is decorated with the planetary version of the atomic model, and the buckle is an oversized atomic model. The wallet has a small metal atomic model on front to remind you that your wallet, your pants - well, everything physical - is made up of atoms."
Green Lantern Light Up Buckle,"No evil shall escape (your pants)

column3: Imagine if the buckle on your belt wasn't just a large, eye-catching, and particularly attractive accessory - but instead it was an intergalactic peacekeeping weapon. A weapon limited only by your imagination. A weapon powered by the force of your will... or a micro-USB cable. Okay, so this buckle won't automatically grant you membership to the Green Lantern Corps. But just because you're not really a cosmic cop doesn't mean you can't rock some serious cosmic bling. This buckle lights up to show off the Green Lantern symbol. Just charge it using the included micro-USB cable, hit the on/off switch on the base, and let your glow shine! In brightest day, in blackest night, you'll always know exactly where your pants are.** Hint: look down. You're probably wearing them.Product SpecificationsGreen Lantern Light Up BuckleOfficially-licensed DC Comics merchandiseMove aside, rings! This is perfect statement piece to wear in brightest day OR blackest night!On/off switch on base of buckleEvil better beware of the power of your bucklePerfect for superheroes and pants-wearersCapacity: one belt + anything you can imagineMaterials: metal baseDimensions: 3"" diameter x 5/8"" thickWeight: 5 oz.Includes micro-USB cable for charging"

column1: Gaming Dice Soap Set,"Roll the dice to see if I'm getting clean

column3: Gaming is a good way to pick up germs. You're sitting together at a table. Breathing on each other. For hours. Passing around food (and possibly dice depending on your personal preferences). Our Amber group came down with Norovirus this past holiday, and not a single player managed to walk the Pattern to avoid it.So it's important to stay clean. Do it with this Gaming Dice Soap Set and you can stay in character while you scrub. A ThinkGeek exclusive, this set of 3 individually wrapped soaps - a d20, a d10, and a d8 - are great for sharing with your group and sudsing up to get rid of dirt, grime, and con crud. Plus, these are like little maracas. Each one has a die inside. Once you've washed all the way through your Gaming Dice Soap Set, you'll have a squeaky clean set of 3 dice. Just like good hygiene, this Gaming Dice Soap Set is the gift that keeps on giving. Product SpecificationsGaming Dice Soap SetA ThinkGeek exclusive Set of 3 individually wrapped soaps - d20, d10, and d8 (great for sharing with your group)Soaps are hollow with a Chessex Gemini die of the same type inside (Dice are inside little capsules embedded in the soap, so shaking hard won't damage your soap.)Numbers are in a Tolkienesque-fontUnisex energy citrus scentBiodegradable and made from food-grade oilsPalm oil from companies that comply with RSPOGluten and soy-free (full ingredient list)No animal testingDimensions:d20 - 2"" acrossd8 and d10 - 2 1/2"" across"

column1: Harry Potter Gryffindor Spa Set,"For when you're caught in devil's snare

column3: One of the best things about going to a spa is how you feel totally pampered. Sometimes you need a spa day but you don't want to shell out $300. Or where you're going isn't really set up with all the amenities. All you have is a nice soaking tub and your favorite polish for a pedicure. That's when you bring this spa set with you, and you'll be fully prepared to luxuriate in comfort for hours.This Harry Potter Gryffindor Spa Set lets you make your own magical spa day. The convenient tote is packed with a robe, slippers, a satin eye mask, and toe separators, all with a wizarding theme. Throw in a bottle of polish, your favorite bath bomb, and you'll be ready to relax droid style. Get a couple and treat your friends to a girls' night out. They also make perfect bridesmaids' gifts! Just unzip one and let the rest of the world slip away.Because that super-plush robe will work its way into your regular rotation and you'll lose the toe separators, once the bag is empty, repurpose it as the perfect al fresco picnic tote. It fits a bottle of wine upright perfectly. Also, you could probably wedge a bottle of wine in there in addition to the spa supplies. Just sayin'.
