column1: Shower Shock Caffeinated Soap,"Mornings Have Never Been So Invigorating!

Tired of waking up and having to wait for your morning java to brew? Are you one of those groggy early morning types that just needs that extra kick? Know any programmers who dont regularly bathe and need some special motivation? Introducing Shower Shock, the original and world's first caffeinated soap from ThinkGeek. When you think about it, ShowerShock is the ultimate clean buzz ;) It Works! Featured On...  TechTV NBC MSNBC CNN Good Morning America Washington Post Ripley's Believe It Or Not Your Bathroom!  Shower Shock is an all vegetable based glycerine soap which does *not* contain any harsh ingredients like ethanol, diethanolamine, polyethylene glycol or cocyl isethionate. So it's a gently invigorating soap ;) Scented with peppermint oil and infused with caffeine anhydrous, each bar of Shower shock contains approximately 12 servings/showers per 4 ounce bar with 200 milligrams of caffeine per serving. No, we're not kidding and no you don't eat it. Caffeine can be absorbed through the skin. For maximum effect, ThinkGeek recommends that you build up a good Shower Shock lather across your entire body before rinsing! Have smelly co-workers that sleep in too much? Give them the gift of Shower Shock...  For ingredients, click here."
Pusheen Glitter Graphic Cosmetic Bag,"Lookin' cute!

column3: Did you realize Pusheen has a fragrance? ""I'm a Unicorn Eau de Toilette."" Smells like flowers and apples. We were sorta expecting cupcakes and doughnuts. But we'll take it. After all, we pretty much smell like cupcakes and doughnuts every day.This little sparkly bag is ready to hold all your fabulous makeup supplies. Or your fabulous pens and pencils. Or other fabulous small items. The only requirement is fabulousness, which we know you'll have no problem with."

column1: Star Wars R2-D2 Spa Set,"Ready for your next oil bath?

column3: One of the best things about going to a spa is how you feel totally pampered. Sometimes you need a spa day but you don't want to shell out $300. Or where you're going isn't really set up with all the amenities. All you have is a nice soaking tub and your favorite polish for a pedicure. That's when you bring this spa set with you, and you'll be fully prepared to luxuriate in comfort for hours.This Star Wars R2-D2 Spa Set lets you make your own intergalactic spa day. The convenient tote is packed with a robe, slippers, a satin eye mask, and toe separators, all with an Artoo theme. Throw in a bottle of polish, your favorite bath bomb, and you'll be ready to relax droid style. Get a couple and treat your friends to a girls' night out. They also make perfect bridesmaids' gifts! Just unzip one and let the rest of the world slip away.Because that super-plush robe will work its way into your regular rotation and you'll lose the toe separators, once the bag is empty, repurpose it as the perfect al fresco picnic tote. It fits a bottle of wine upright perfectly. Also, you could probably wedge a bottle of wine in there in addition to the spa supplies. Just sayin'."

column1: Anime Pigtails Wig,"Cartoon color made easy

column3: It takes time and commitment to transform your hair into the brightest, boldest shades that always look so simple on the ladies of anime. Time and commitment that we don't have. Get the color right, and then watch it fade. Do you think Bulma ever has to perform serious blue hair color upkeep? If she does, they don't show it!So why not commit to a wig instead, and keep your hair as-is! These clever wigs even give you styling options. Wear it as a cute bob with bangs, or clip-on the additional wavy long pigtails. Choose pink or blue, and get ready to rock your best Chibiusa or Sailor Mercury look. Or wear them whenever you want a little cartoon fun in your style. Which is always. Anime all day 4 life!  Product SpecificationsAnime Pigtails WigSleek bob with bangsComes with long wavy pigtails that clip-onChoose pink or blue Get bold hair color that never fades - and comes off at the end of the day!Perfect for costumes and people who can't commit to serious hair upkeepMaterials: Not real hair. We couldn't get Bulma to donate."

column1: Hello Kitty Narikiri Face Mask ,"Terrifyingly Adorable Transformation

column3: These Hello Kitty Narikiri Face Masks are the complete package. Narikiri is a Japanese term meaning ""to turn completely into"" something, as in ""turn yourself completely into the beautiful and adorable Hello Kitty."" But in a really scary way, for anyone who happens to see you wearing one of these things. Nothing is quite so satisfying as rejuvenating your skin while terrorizing spouses, siblings, neighbors, and possibly even the family dog!Any one of these five narikiri face masks will cute-ify your self care experience with luxurious spa ingredients such as witch hazel and Damask rose water. Just clean your face, then take out one of the masks to transform yourself into X-Ray Hello Kitty, Kawaii Hello Kitty, Zombie Hello Kitty, Rose Hello Kitty (red bow), or Cherry Blossom Hello Kitty (pink bow). Enjoy 15-20 minutes of relaxation... or spend the time chasing someone around the house. Then simply remove the mask, and pat your skin gently until the leftover essence is absorbed into your face. Your skin will be completely refreshed and your family will be totally freaked out at your miraculous transformation. For ingredients and warnings, click here.Product SpecificationsHello Kitty Narikiri Face MaskOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandise5 Hello Kitty themed face masks in 4 packs:Hello Kitty Narikiri Face Mask X-RayHello Kitty Narikiri Face Mask KawaiiHello Kitty Narikiri Face Mask ZombieHello Kitty Narikiri Face Mask Rose / Cherry Blossom (2-pack)Directions: Wash your face. Remove face mask sheet from the pouch. Place it over your eye area first, then spread face mask sheet over your entire face. Leave it on for 15-20 minutes. Remove mask. Imported - Made in KoreaNet Weight: 0.67 fl. oz. per face maskAges 13+"

column1: Blackout Sleep Masks,"I wear my sunglasses at night

column3: Circadian rhythms say light and sleep don't tend to go hand-in-hand. Whether you're trying to nap in the middle of the day or there's a streetlight outside your window late at night, light can keep you from dreaming those good dreams. A sleep mask can fix that problem, but why stop at a plain old sleep mask? Go for something with a bit more edge.Keep your cool, even while you sleep, with the Blackout Bands Sleep Masks. Choose between the awesome looking Ninja or Night Hawk versions - both of which are guaranteed to block out that pesky light so you can get your well deserved shut-eye. The cool kids need their shut-eye.Product SpecificationsBlackout Bands Sleep MasksLight blocking sunglassesChoose between Night Hawk (95% tint mirrorshades) and Ninja (98% tint) stylesTrust us, you won't need to worry about any light getting through (we tested them during a super-boring meeting with the overlords)Blocks out 98% light received by your eyesMaterials: Polycarbonate frameDo not look directly into the sun or operate motor vehicles with these on"

column1: 8-Bit Soap Set,"Woo-hoo! Bath time!

column3: When we play our favorite games some of the more mundane parts of a hero's or heroine's adventure are left out. They need to eat, but we never see them cook. Do they take potty breaks or do they just hold it the whole way through? Do they ever get a chance to clean up and take a bath? Our favorite protagonists meet some pretty important people in their adventures - might give off a really bad first impression if they haven't showered after trekking through four dungeons.The 8-Bit Soap Set comes with three old-school game themed cleansing blocks: a sword, a heart, and a coin. Take a nice warm bath after saving your local neighborhood princess - you earned it.Product Specifications8-Bit Soap SetSet of three 8-bit style soaps - heart, coin, and swordEven the heroes and heroines need a shower sometimesScents: Enchanted woods (sword & coin) and vanilla (heart)Biodegradable and made from food-grade oilsPalm oil from companies that comply with RSPOGluten and soy-free (full ingredient list)No animal testingDimensions:Heart/Coin: 3"" x 3"" x 3/4""Sword: 3 3/4"" x 2"" x 3/4"""

column1: Yuri!!! on ICE Folding Mirror,"Ready for the Kiss and Cry

column3: You've practiced your short program and your free skate, endlessly. Your costumes are picked out, pressed, and every last sequin and crystal is in place. (Though you could always use more sequins. Never enough!) You've been waiting for this moment forever. But wait just a moment longer - are you ready to take to the ice, and then face the Kiss and Cry, and get your score? Better take just a moment to prepare yourself. Maybe just a momentary check in the mirror, to catch your breath. Compose yourself now, because there will be waterworks!Your favorite anime figure skaters are here as adorable chibi illustrations, on these little Yuri!!! on Ice folding mirrors. Featuring artwork of their Nendoroid likenesses, you can get your choice of Viktor Nikiforov, Yuri Katsuki, or Yuri Plisetsky. Perfect for any time you want a little motivation from your idol - just let the cuteness wash over you, then flip the top open to reveal the next big skating star hiding inside: you!Product SpecificationsYuri!!! on Ice Folding MirrorOfficially-licensed Yuri!!! on Ice merchandise Folding mirrors featuring chibi illustrations of Yuri!!! on Ice charactersChoose Viktor Nikiforov, Yuri Katsuki, or Yuri PlisetskyPlastic case folds open to reveal the mirror insideMaterials: Plastic and GlassDimensions: approximately 4 1/2"" long x 3 1/2"" wide x 1/4"" thick (when closed)"

column1: DIY Men's Body Care Kit,"Don't be a scruffy-lookin' nerf herder

column3: Taking care of yourself isn't just for the ladies. Men may scoff at the idea of overcomplicated skincare routines, but trust us, people will take note. Whether you're cleaning up for that job interview, a night on the town, or because gosh darn it, you deserve it - we know you'll love the results. Clean yourself up real nice and be the man you were meant to be. One who wants to look and feel great. The DIY Men's Body Care Kit features all the ingredients for 8 recipes to keep yourself fresh from head-to-toe. Supplies will last for about 6 months of use. Keep yourself spick-and-span and be the model of human cleanliness.  Product Specifications DIY Men's Body Care KitIngredients and recipes to make your own skincare and haircare products Clean yourself up real niceSupply lasts for 6 monthsCreates 4 shaving serums, a body scrub, a massage oil, hair & scalp serum, and a hair rinseIncludes:Plant-based oils: Hazelnut 2 fl oz, Jojoba 2 fl oz, Tamanu 1 fl oz, Plant-based Glycerin 1 fl oz, and Non-GMO Vitamin E 0.5 fl ozEssential Oils: Lemongrass 0.17 fl oz, Peppermint 0.17 fl oz, Cedarwood 0.17 fl oz, and Frankincense 0.17 fl ozAccessories: Spray bottle, dropper vial, scrub jar, funnel, and recipe bookletWarning: This is not food. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes."

column1: Hello Kitty Foot Cooling Sheet,"Treat your paws right

column3: Hello Kitty has been a worldwide pop culture icon for decades now. And after that long on the go, she's probably got a lot of helpful relaxation tips that keep her looking perma-adorbs 24/7. Stuff like finding a masseuse that doesn't talk too much, or treating yourself to a new hair bow every once in awhile. And if she says cool your feet - then take her word for it and cool your feet!Being cute is a state of mind... uh, feet. Mind and feet. You know what? Being cute starts at your feet and works its way to your head. You can't ignore your feet, is what we're saying. Because self-care is adorable! These refreshing sheets are perfect for soothing tired tootsies. Just kick your feet up, stick these to the bottom, relax and let them work their cooling magic! Pro tip: store them in your refrigerator for a super-chill experience. For ingredients and warnings, click here.Product SpecificationsHello Kitty Foot Cooling SheetOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandiseHello Kitty knows what it takes to be cuteAnd nothing is cuter than comfort and self-carePerfect for fans of Hello Kitty and comfy, cute feetCapacity: one paw at a timeIncludes 6 sheetsAges 13+"

column1: Hello Kitty 3-Pack Hand Cream Set ,"Cute and comforting

column3: She was born in 1974, but her looks betray that number. She is a fashion and music icon, a star of television and video games, and adored by millions of kids and adults worldwide. She is Hello Kitty, of course! The diminutive Japanese Bobtail cat is worth approximately $7 billion annually - that's not a bad gig for a little white cat who has no mouth, we think! Let a little of Hello Kitty's success and vitality rub off on you with the Hello Kitty Hand Cream Set, featuring three natural, revitalizing floral scents: Sakura (Cherry Blossom), Rose, and Lavender. Each hand cream weighs 0.7 oz. For ingredients and warnings, click here."

column1: Hello Kitty Face Towel,"Unlimited Spa Days with Hello Kitty

column3: A spa day with Hello Kitty would really be something special: getting a manicure for those claws, gossiping about what Badtz-Maru has been up to, and picking out new bows together.  But alas, Hello Kitty is a busy kitty, so our spa days with Miss Kitty White are severely limited. She's got a lot of surfing, dressing up, baking cookies, and collecting cute things to do, after all!But with this Hello Kitty Face Towel, everyday can be an at-home spa day with Hello Kitty! It's a soft cotton terrycloth towel, with embroidered details and cutouts for your eyes and mouth to make you look just like Hello Kitty when you put it on your face! With just a little water, you can use this hot or cold: warm it up for a pore-opening heat treatment, or leave it chill for a refreshing wind-down. Soft to the touch, it's the perfect way to sooth your face, Hello Kitty style!Product SpecificationsHello Kitty Face TowelOfficially-licensed Sanrio merchandiseTerrycloth towel face mask in the shape of Hello Kitty with embroidered detailsPurrfect for your at-home spa routineInstructions:HOT: Wet with water and microwave for NO MORE than 1 minute. Set aside to cool to desired temperature, then place on face for no more than 5 minutes.COLD: Wet with water and place on face for 10-20 minutes.Capacity: 1 adorable faceMaterials: 100% cottonCare Instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach.ImportedDimensions: 9"" wide x 14"" long"

column1: Hello Kitty Cherry Blossom Essence Face Pack (7Sheets X 5Pack),"Hello Kitty Spa Day!

column3: It's time for a Korean skin care in-home spa day with your Hello Kitty-loving friends! With the Hello Kitty Cherry Blossom Essence Face Pack, there are plenty of facial sheets to share with your spa buddies (the set includes 35 sheets). Simply wash your face, then remove a face mask sheet from the pouch. Place it over your eye area first, and then work outward, spreading the mask over the rest of your face. Leave it on for 15-20 minutes and then remove. column1: Hello Kitty Lip Cream,"Adorably Moisturized!

column3: Hello Kitty meets Korean skin care with this adorable Hello Kitty Lip Cream! Hello Kitty may not have a mouth herself, but she wants your lips to be hydrated and healthy. This Lovely Ribbon no-color lip balm will do the trick in adorable style. Simply remove the cap, twist the base, and apply. With their iconic red bows, Hello Kitty and her little stuffed bear are perfectly adorable companions who will make you smile whenever you take this tube out of your bag or pocket. column1: Hello Kitty 7Pcs Mask Pearl,"Smooth as a Pearl

column3: How does Hello Kitty keep such a youthful appearance, year after year? For most kitties, we'd say there was something special about the usual tongue-and-paw cleaning. But Hello Kitty (or Miss Kitty White, as we know her) lacks a mouth, so... that's not it. Could it be that Hello Kitty is just as obsessed with Korean face masks as we are?For that bright, beautiful Hello Kitty look, you need her Pearl Essence Face Packs. This set includes seven individual packets of Hello Kitty face masks, made with real pearl powder to make your skin more luminous. Simply cleanse your face, then apply the mask for 15-20 blissful minutes of Hello Kitty home spa time, then remove and gently pat your skin until the leftover pearl essence has been absorbed into your face.
